If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope
entries: This poison is created from blood harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitated} lycanthrope in its animal or hybrid form. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy (see the Monster Manual). The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell 移除詛咒} spell or similar magic.
The type of lycanthropy depends on the lycanthrope used to create the poison. To determine the type of lycanthropy randomly, roll a d6:

rows: {@creature Wererat}
{@creature Werewolf}
{@creature Wereboar}

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope Antidote
entries: This clear potion has dark red flecks within, resembling clotted blood. When you drink this potion, it removes the curse of lycanthropy from you if that curse was imposed by a lycanthrope's bite or similar effect.

item.name: Blood Spear
entries: Kavan was a ruthless chieftain whose tribe lived in the Balinok Mountains centuries before the arrival of {@creature Strahd von Zarovich|CoS}. Although he was very much alive, Kavan had some traits in common with vampires: he slept during the day and hunted at night, he drank the blood of his prey, and he lived underground. In battle, he wielded a spear stained with blood. His was the first blood spear, a weapon that drains life from those it kills and transfers that life to its wielder, imbuing that individual with the stamina to keep fighting.
When you hit with a melee attack using this magic spear and reduce the target to 0 hit points, you gain {@dice 2d6} temporary hit points.
Any creature can wield the spear, but only the character {@adventure chosen by Kavan|CoS|14|Blood Spear of Kavan} to wield it gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

item.name: Bloodaxe
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic axe. The axe deals an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage to creatures that aren't constructs or undead. If you reduce such a creature to 0 hit points with an attack using this axe, you gain 10 temporary hit points.
This axe is forged from a dark, rust-colored metal and once belonged to the goliath barbarian Grog Strongjaw of Vox Machina.

item.name: 血石
entries: 帶紅斑的深灰色不透光寶石。

item.name: Blue Dragon Mask
entries: This mask of glossy azure has spikes around its edges and a ridged horn in its center. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: You have resistance against lightning damage. If you already have resistance to lightning damage from another source, you instead have immunity to lightning damage. If you already have immunity to lightning damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to lightning damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Charisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense blindsight} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Draconic. You also have advantage on any Charisma check you make against Blue Dragons.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/Day) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Lingering Shock
entries: If you deal lightning damage to a creature, it can't take reactions until its next turn.

item.name: 藍龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿著這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對閃電傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30哩內最近的藍龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 青石英
entries: 淡藍色的透光寶石。

item.name: 青藍寶石
entries: 藍白色至中等藍色的透光寶石。

item.name: 藍尖晶石
entries: 深藍色的透光寶石。

item.name: Bob
entries: This +1 battleaxe floats on water and other liquids, and grants its bearer advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to swim.

item.name: 炸彈
entries: 以一個動作，一個角色可以點燃炸彈並將它投擲到最多60呎遠的一點。每個距離該點5呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，否則受到{@dice 3d6}火焰傷害。

item.name: Bonecounter
entries: This weapon is a magical +2 mace called Bonecounter. Whenever this weapon is used to destroy an undead creature, a single silver piece appears in the wielder's pocket.

item.name: 書
entries: 一本書可能包含了詩集、歷史紀錄、與特定領域知識有關的資料、地侏發明品的示意圖和筆記、或任何其它可以用文字或圖片呈現的內容。一本記錄著法術的書則是{@spell 法術書}（於本節稍後介紹）。

item.name: Book of Exalted Deeds
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: The definitive treatise on all that is good in the multiverse, the fabled Book of Exalted Deeds figures prominently in many religions. Rather than being a scripture devoted to a particular faith, the book's various authors filled the pages with their own vision of true virtue, providing guidance for defeating evil.

The Book of Exalted Deeds rarely lingers in one place. As soon as the book is read, it vanishes to some other corner of the multiverse where its moral guidance can bring light to a darkened world. Although attempts have been made to copy the work, efforts to do so fail to capture its magical nature or translate the benefits it offers to those pure of heart and firm of purpose.

A heavy clasp, wrought to look like angel wings, keeps the book's contents secure. Only a creature of good alignment that is attuned to the book can release the clasp that holds it shut. Once the book is opened, the attuned creature must spend 80 hours reading and studying the book to digest its contents and gain its benefits. Other creatures that peruse the book's open pages can read the text but glean no deeper meaning and reap no benefits. An evil creature that tries to read from the book takes {@dice 24d6} radiant damage. This damage ignores resistance and immunity, and can't be reduced or avoided by any means. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage disappears in a blinding flash and is destroyed, leaving its possessions behind.

Benefits granted by the Book of Exalted Deeds last only as long as you strive to do good. If you fail to perform at least one act of kindness or generosity within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform an evil act, you lose all the benefits granted by the book.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Exalted Deeds has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial properties}

entries.name: Increased Wisdom
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, your Wisdom score increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. You can't gain this benefit from the book more than once.

entries.name: Enlightened Magic
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, any spell slot you expend to cast a cleric or paladin spell counts as a spell slot of one level higher.

entries.name: Halo
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, you gain a protective halo. This halo sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. You can dismiss or manifest the halo as a bonus action. While present, the halo gives you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with good creatures and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks made to interact with evil creatures. In addition, fiends and undead within the halo's bright light make attack rolls against you with disadvantage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: It is rumored that the Book of Exalted Deeds can't be destroyed as long as good exists in the multiverse. However, drowning the book in the River Styx removes all writing and imagery from its pages and renders the book powerless for {@dice 1d100} years.

item.name: Book of Vile Darkness
entries: The contents of this foul manuscript of ineffable wickedness are the meat and drink of those in evil's thrall. No mortal was meant to know the secrets it contains, knowledge so horrid that to even glimpse the scrawled pages invites madness.

Most believe the lich-god Vecna authored the Book of Vile Darkness. He recorded in its pages every diseased idea, every unhinged thought, and every example of blackest magic he came across or devised. Vecna covered every vile topic he could, making the book a gruesome catalog of all mortal wrongs.

Other practitioners of evil have held the book and added their own input to its catalog of vile knowledge. Their additions are clear, for the writers of later works stitched whatever they were writing into the tome or, in some cases, made notations and additions to existing text. There are places where pages are missing, torn. or covered so completely with ink, blood, and scratches that the original text can't be divined.

Nature can't abide the book's presence. Ordinary plants wither in its presence, animals are unwilling to approach it, and the book gradually destroys whatever it touches. Even stone cracks and turns to powder if the book rests on it long enough.

A creature attuned to the book must spend 80 hours reading and studying it to digest its contents and reap its benefits. The creature can then freely modify the book's contents, provided that those modifications advance evil and expand the lore already contained within.
Whenever a non-evil creature attunes to the Book of Vile Darkness, that creature must make a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's alignment changes to neutral evil.

The Book of Vile Darkness remains with you only as long as you strive to work evil in the world. If you fail to perform at least one evil act within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform a good act, the book disappears. If you die while attuned to the book, an entity of great evil claims your soul. You can't be restored to life by any means while your soul remains imprisoned.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness has the following random properties:

items: 3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries.name: Adjusted Ability Scores
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, one ability score of your choice increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. Another ability score of your choice decreases by 2, to a minimum of 3. The book can't adjust your ability scores again.

entries.name: Mark of Darkness
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, you acquire a physical disfigurement as a hideous sign of your devotion to vile darkness. An evil rune might appear on your face, your eyes might become glossy black, or horns might sprout from your forehead. Or you might become wizened and hideous, lose all facial features, gain a forked tongue, or some other feature the DM chooses. The mark of darkness grants you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with evil creatures and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks made to interact with non-evil creatures.

entries.name: Command Evil
entries: While you are attuned to the book and holding it, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 支配怪物} spell on an evil target (save DC 18). You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Dark Lore
entries: You can reference the Book of Vile Darkness whenever you make an Intelligence check to recall information about some aspect of evil, such as lore about demons. When you do so, double your proficiency bonus on that check.

entries.name: Dark Speech
entries: While you carry the Book of Vile Darkness and are attuned to it, you can use an action to recite word from its pages in a foul language known as Dark Speech. Each time you do so, you take {@dice 1d12} psychic damage, and each non-evil creature within 15 feet of you takes {@dice 3d6} psychic damage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness allows pages to be torn from it, but any evil lore contained on those pages finds its way back into the book eventually, usually when a new author adds pages to the tome.
If a {@creature solar} tears the book in two, the book is destroyed for {@dice 1d100} years, after which it reforms in some dark corner of the multiverse.

A creature attuned to the book for one hundred years can unearth a phrase hidden in the original text that, when translated to Celestial and spoken aloud, destroys both the speaker and the book in a blinding flash of radiance. However, as long as evil exists in the multiverse, the book reforms {@dice 1d10 × 100} years later.
If all evil in the multiverse is wiped out, the book turns to dust and is forever destroyed.

item.name: Bookmark
entries: This +3 dagger belongs to {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}. While you have the dagger drawn, you can use a bonus action to activate one of the following properties:

items: Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, or make the gem go dark.
Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
Cast {@spell 次元門} from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Cast {@spell 強迫術} (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 精靈之靴
entries: 當你穿著這雙靴子時，無論你移動經過什麼樣的地形表面，你的腳步都不會發出任何聲音。你同時在依賴無聲移動的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

item.name: 偽跡之靴
entries: 只有類人生物可以穿著這雙靴子。當穿著這雙靴子時，你可以選擇讓它們留下像是其他與你體型相同類人生物的足跡。

item.name: 浮空之靴
entries: 當你穿著這雙靴子時，你可以使用一個動作以對自己隨意施放{@spell 浮空術}法術。

item.name: 速度之靴
entries: 當你穿著這雙靴子時，你可以使用一個附贈動作以使這雙靴子的腳後跟互相輕觸。若你這麼做，這雙靴子將使你的步行速度變為兩倍，且任何生物在對你進行藉機攻擊時將在該攻擊檢定中承受劣勢。若你再次互觸你的腳後跟，則你終止這個效果。
當這雙蠍子的特性被使用總共10分鐘，則其魔法將停止作用直到你完成一次長休。

item.name: 跑跳之靴
entries: 當你穿著這雙靴子時，除非你的步行速度為30呎或更高，否則你的步行速度將變為30呎。且你的速度不會因為負載狀態或穿戴重甲而被減少。此外，你可以跳躍至原本三倍的距離，但不能超過你剩餘的移動速度所允許的距離。

item.name: 雪地之靴
entries: 這雙毛絨絨的靴子溫暖且舒適。當你穿著這雙靴子時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你具有對寒冰傷害的抗性。
你無視由冰或雪所構成的困難地形。
你可以在沒有額外保護的情況下忍受最低華氏-50度的低溫。若你穿著厚重的衣物，則你可以忍受最低華氏-100度的低溫。

item.name: Boros Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Boros, allows you to cast {@spell 英雄氣概}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Boros' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Boros Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Boros guild
entries: Carved from red sandstone with white granite elements to resemble a member of the Boros Legion, this keyrune can become a {@creature veteran} (human) for up to 8 hours. In addition to fighting on your behalf, this {@creature veteran} cheerfully offers tactical advice, which is usually sound. Anyone who talks with the transformed keyrune or examines it closely can easily recognize that it is an artificial human.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature veteran} (human). If there isn't enough space for the {@creature veteran}, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Dodge} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 壓印著金箔葉並鑲有紫晶的軟木瓶塞
item.ENG_name: Bottle stopper cork embossed with gold leaf and set with amethysts

item.name: 瓶裝氣息
entries: 這個瓶子裡存有一股來自風元素的氣流。當你將其吸入後，你可以選擇呼出它，或者屏住呼吸。
如果你選擇吐出氣息，則你獲得{@spell 造風術}法術的效果。如果你選擇屏住呼吸，則你在1小時內將不再需要呼吸，你可以提前結束這個好處（例如，開口說話），但提前結束這個效果並不會給你帶來吐出氣息的好處。

item.name: 命令水元素水缽
entries: 當這個碗缽被裝滿水時，你可以使用一個動作以說出這個碗缽的命令語，並如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣召喚出一個{@creature 水元素}。這個碗缽直到下次日出之前都不能再次被這個方式使用。
這個碗缽直徑約莫1呎，深約半呎。它的重量為3磅，且可以容納大約3加侖的液體。

item.name: 一盒綠松石製的動物雕像
Bracelet of Rock Magic
entries: While you wear this gold bracelet, it grants you immunity to being {@condition petrified}, and it allows you to cast {@spell 石化術} (save DC 15) as an action. Once the spell has been cast three times, the bracelet can no longer cast it. Thereafter, you can cast {@spell 塑石術} as an action. After you have done this thirteen times, the bracelet loses its magic and turns from gold to lead.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The bracelet's affinity with earth manifests as an unusual curse. Creatures of flesh that are strongly related to earth and stone, such as stone giants and dwarves, have advantage on the saving throw against {@spell 石化術} cast from the bracelet. If such a creature's save is successful, the bracelet breaks your attunement to it and casts the spell on you. You make your saving throw with disadvantage, and on a failed save you are {@condition petrified} instantly.

item.name: Bracer of Flying Daggers
entries: This armband appears to have thin {@item dagger|phb|daggers} strapped to it. As an action, you can pull up to two magic daggers from the bracer and immediately hurl them, making a ranged attack with each dagger. A dagger vanishes if you don't hurl it right away, and the daggers disappear right after they hit or miss. The bracer never runs out of daggers.

item.name: 射手護腕
entries: 當穿戴這對護腕時，你將熟練於{@item 長弓|phb}和{@item 短弓|phb}，且你使用這類武器所進行遠程攻擊的傷害骰中獲得+2加值。

item.name: ​防禦護腕
entries: 當穿戴這對護腕時，若你未穿著護甲或使用盾牌，則你的AC獲得+2加值。

item.name: 黃銅龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿著這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對火焰傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30哩內最近的黃銅龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 鑲有翡翠的黃銅馬克杯
命令火元素火盆
entries: 當這個火盆內燃燒著火焰時，你可以使用一個動作以說出這個火盆的命令語，並如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣召喚出一個{@creature 火元素}。這個火盆直到下次日出之前都不能再次被這個方式使用
這個碗缽的重量為5磅。

item.name: Breathing Bubble
entries: This translucent, bubble-like sphere has a slightly tacky outer surface, and you gain the item's benefits only while wearing it over your head like a helmet.
The bubble contains 1 hour of breathable air. The bubble regains all its expended air daily at dawn.

item.name: 釀酒師設備
additionalEntries: Brewing is the art of producing beer. Not only does beer serve as an alcoholic beverage, but the process of brewing purifies water. Crafting beer takes weeks of fermentation, but only a few hours of work.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Brewer's supplies include a large glass jug, a quantity of hops, a siphon, and several feet of tubing.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: Proficiency with brewer's supplies gives you additional insight on Intelligence ({@skill History}) checks concerning events that involve alcohol as a significant element.

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: This tool proficiency grants additional insight when you treat anyone suffering from alcohol poisoning or when you can use alcohol to dull pain.

additionalEntries.name: Persuasion
entries: A stiff drink can help soften the hardest heart. Your proficiency with brewer's supplies can help you ply someone with drink, giving them just enough alcohol to mellow their mood.

additionalEntries.name: Potable Water
entries: Your knowledge of brewing enables you to purify water that would otherwise be undrinkable. As part of a long rest, you can purify up to 6 gallons of water, or 1 gallon as part of a short rest.

additionalEntries.caption: Brewer's Supplies
rows: Detect poison or impurities in a drink
Identify alcohol
Ignore effects of alcohol

item.name: Bridle of Capturing
entries: This fine leather bridle tugs at the hand when first held, as though it longs to reach out for a beast nearby. When you hold one end of the bridle, you can use an action to speak its command word, causing the other end to lash out at a beast you can see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or have the bridle tie itself around its neck, then fall under your command as if subjected to the {@spell 支配野獸} spell. Once the targeted is affected, you do not need to hold the other end of the bridle to command it. With a successful saving throw, the target becomes immune to the bridle's power until the next dawn.

A creature controlled by the bridle can be released by the creature that bound it as a bonus action. A creature controlled by the bridle can make a DC 17 Charisma check each day at dawn. On a success, the creature is no longer affected by the bridle.

item.name: 青銅龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿著這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對閃電傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30哩內最近的青銅龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Brooch of Living Essence
entries: While wearing this nondescript brooch, spells and anything else that would detect or reveal your creature type treat you as humanoid, and those that would reveal your alignment treat it as neutral.

item.name: 護盾胸針
entries: 當穿戴這個胸針時，你具有對力場傷害的抗性，且你免疫於來自{@spell 魔法飛彈}法術的傷害。

item.name: 飛天掃帚
entries: 這把3磅重的木製掃帚平時的功能就如同一把尋常掃帚，直到你跨坐它並說出它的命令語。它接著將在你身下浮空，並可以載著你在空中飛行。它具有50呎的飛行速度。它可以承載最多400磅的重量，但當它承載超過200磅的重量時，它的飛行速度將變為30呎。這把掃帚將在你著陸時停止浮空。
若你說出它的命令語，並指定一個距離你1哩內且你所熟悉的場所，你就可以差遣這把掃帚自行飛到該處。只要這把掃帚仍在距離你1哩內的位置，它就會在你說出另一個命令語時回到你身邊。

item.name: 水桶
entries: 一個水桶可以容納3加侖的液體或½立方呎的固體。

item.name: 牛眼提燈
entries: 一盞牛眼提燈散發出60呎錐形的明亮光照以及再延伸60呎的微光光照。一旦被點亮，每一扁瓶(1品脫)的{@item 燈油(扁瓶裝)|phb|燈油}都可以讓它燃燒持續6小時。

item.name: 竊賊套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 背包|phb}
{@item 滾珠(一袋1,000粒)|phb|一袋1,000粒的滾珠}
10呎弦線
一個{@item 鈴鐺|phb}
5根{@item 蠟燭|phb}
一根{@item 撬棍|phb}
一把{@item 鐵鎚|phb}
10根{@item 岩釘|phb}
一盞{@item 附蓋提燈|phb}
2瓶{@item 燈油(扁瓶裝)|phb|燈油}
5天份的{@item 口糧(1天份)|phb|口糧}
一個{@item 打火匣|phb}
一個{@item 水袋|phb}
{@item 麻繩(50呎)|phb|50呎的麻繩}

item.name: 焦引薰煙
entries: 受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})毒素傷害，且必須在它的每個回合開始時重複進行這個豁免檢定。該角色每次連續豁免失敗都將受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素傷害。在豁免成功三次後，此毒藥的效果結束。

item.name: Butcher's Bib
entries: This black leather apron is perpetually covered by blood, even after being washed off. You gain the following benefits while wearing the apron:

items: Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee attack with a weapon, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice. If you do so, you must use the second total.
Your weapon attacks that deal slashing damage score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

item.name: 書法家設備
additionalEntries: Calligraphy treats writing as a delicate, beautiful art. Calligraphers produce text that is pleasing to the eye, using a style that is difficult to forge. Their supplies also give them some ability to examine scripts and determine if they are legitimate, since a calligrapher's training involves long hours of studying writing and attempting to replicate its style and design.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Calligrapher's supplies include ink, a dozen sheets of parchment, and three quills.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Although calligraphy is of little help in deciphering the content of magical writings, proficiency with these supplies can aid in identifying who wrote a script of a magical nature.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: This tool proficiency can augment the benefit of successful checks made to analyze or investigate ancient writings, scrolls, or other texts, including runes etched in stone or messages in frescoes or other displays.

additionalEntries.name: Decipher Treasure Map
entries: This tool proficiency grants you expertise in examining maps. You can make an Intelligence check to determine a map's age, whether a map includes any hidden messages, or similar facts.

additionalEntries.caption: Calligrapher's Supplies
rows: Identify writer of nonmagical script
Determine writer's state of mind
Spot forged text
Forge a signature

item.name: 鐵蒺藜
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將一袋鐵蒺藜灑落覆蓋一個5呎平方的區域。任何進入該區域的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則停止移動並受到1穿刺傷害。直到該生物回復至少1點生命值之前，它的步行速度將減少10呎。一個以半速移動經過該區域的生物不需要進行該豁免檢定。

item.name: 鐵蒺藜(20)
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將一袋鐵蒺藜灑落覆蓋一個5呎平方的區域。任何進入該區域的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則停止移動並受到1穿刺傷害。直到該生物回復至少1點生命值之前，它的步行速度將減少10呎。一個以半速移動經過該區域的生物不需要進行該豁免檢定。

item.name: 蠟燭
entries: 一根蠟燭可以燃燒1小時，散發出5呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸5呎的微光光照。

item.name: Candle Mace
entries: The head of this mace sheds bright light in a 5-foot-radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet. When you wield this mace, you can extinguish or ignite its light as an action.

item.name: 祈神蠟燭
entries: 這根纖細的蠟燭奉獻給了某個神祇，並共享著該神祇的陣營。這根蠟燭的陣營可以透過{@spell 偵測善惡}法術被偵測。由DM選擇或隨機決定一尊神明和其所屬的陣營。

rows: 混亂邪惡
混亂中立
混亂善良
中立邪惡
絕對中立
中立善良
守序邪惡
守序中立
守序善良

entries: 這根蠟燭的魔法會在它被點燃時被啟動，且點燃它需要一個動作。在燃燒4小時之後，這根蠟燭將被摧毀。你可以提早熄滅它以備日後使用。將它燃燒的時間以1分鐘為單位從這根蠟燭總燃燒時間中扣除。
當被點燃時，這根蠟燭將散發出30呎半徑的微光光照。任何在該光照範圍內，且陣營與此蠟燭符合的生物將在攻擊檢定、豁免檢定、和屬性檢定中具有優勢。此外，陣營與此蠟燭符合的牧師或德魯伊可以施放他或她所準備的1環法術而無須消耗法術位，該法術的效果將如同被以1環法術位施放。
或者，當你第一次點燃此蠟燭時，你可以使用它施放{@spell 異界之門}法術。這麼做會摧毀這根蠟燭。

item.name: 深淵蠟燭
entries: 這根蠟燭的火焰不會在被浸入水中時熄滅。它會如同普通蠟燭一樣散發出光芒和熱度。

item.name: Canoe
entries: A canoe can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru for 50 gp. It holds up to six Medium creatures and has a maximum speed of 2 mph. It is otherwise identical to a {@item rowboat}.

item.name: 水下呼吸帽
entries: 當在水中穿戴這個帽子時，你可以使用一個動作說出它的命令語，以創造出一個環繞你頭部的氣泡。這個氣泡將讓你得以在水下正常呼吸。這個氣泡將會維持直到你再次說出命令語、這頂帽子被脫卸、或你不再處於水中。

item.name: 郎中披肩
entries: 這件披肩聞起來帶有淡淡的硫磺味。當穿戴它時，你可以使用它以一個動作施放{@spell 次元門}法術。這件披肩的這個特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。
當你消失時，你將留下一團煙霧，且你會伴隨著一團類似的煙霧出現在你的目的地。這團煙霧輕度遮蔽著你離開時所在的空間和你出現時所在的空間，且它將在你的下個回合結束時消散。一陣微風或更強的風將吹散這陣煙霧。

item.name: 紅玉髓
entries: 橙色到紅棕色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 木匠工具
additionalEntries: Skill at carpentry enables a character to construct wooden structures. A carpenter can build a house, a shack, a wooden cabinet, or similar items.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Carpenter's tools include a saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: This tool proficiency aids you in identifying the use and the origin of wooden buildings and other large wooden objects.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: You gain additional insight when inspecting areas within wooden structures, because you know tricks of construction that can conceal areas from discovery.

additionalEntries.name: Perception
entries: You can spot irregularities in wooden walls or floors, making it easier to find trap doors and secret passages.

additionalEntries.name: Stealth
entries: You can quickly assess the weak spots in a wooden floor, making it easier to avoid the places that creak and groan when they're stepped on.

additionalEntries.name: Fortify
entries: With 1 minute of work and raw materials, you can make a door or window harder to force open. Increase the DC needed to open it by 5.

additionalEntries.name: Temporary Shelter
entries: As part of a long rest, you can construct a lean-to or a similar shelter to keep your group dry and in the shade for the duration of the rest. Because it was fashioned quickly from whatever wood was available, the shelter collapses {@dice 1d3} days after being assembled.

additionalEntries.caption: Carpenter's Tools
rows: Build a simple wooden structure
Design a complex wooden structure
Find a weak point in a wooden wall
Pry apart a door

item.name: 飛天魔毯，3呎x5呎
entries: 你能夠以一個動作說出這張魔毯的命令語，以使這張魔毯浮空並飛行。只要你距離它30呎內，它就會依照你的口頭指令移動。
一張3呎x5呎的魔毯可以在承載最多200磅重量的情況下以80呎的飛行速度移動。一張魔毯可以承載最多其兩倍的重量，但若它承載超過它正常負載量的重量，則它將以原本一半的速度飛行。

item.name: 飛天魔毯，4呎x6呎
entries: 你能夠以一個動作說出這張魔毯的命令語，以使這張魔毯浮空並飛行。只要你距離它30呎內，它就會依照你的口頭指令移動。
一張4呎x6呎的魔毯可以在承載最多400磅重量的情況下以60呎的飛行速度移動。一張魔毯可以承載最多其兩倍的重量，但若它承載超過它正常負載量的重量，則它將以原本一半的速度飛行。

item.name: 飛天魔毯，5呎x7呎
entries: 你能夠以一個動作說出這張魔毯的命令語，以使這張魔毯浮空並飛行。只要你距離它30呎內，它就會依照你的口頭指令移動。
一張5呎x7呎的魔毯可以在承載最多600磅重量的情況下以40呎的飛行速度移動。一張魔毯可以承載最多其兩倍的重量，但若它承載超過它正常負載量的重量，則它將以原本一半的速度飛行。

item.name: 飛天魔毯，6呎x9呎
entries: 你能夠以一個動作說出這張魔毯的命令語，以使這張魔毯浮空並飛行。只要你距離它30呎內，它就會依照你的口頭指令移動。
一張6呎x9呎的魔毯可以在承載最多800磅重量的情況下以30呎的飛行速度移動。一張魔毯可以承載最多其兩倍的重量，但若它承載超過它正常負載量的重量，則它將以原本一半的速度飛行。

item.name: 食腐蟲黏液
entries: 這種毒藥必須從死亡或陷入{@condition 無力}狀態的{@creature 食腐蟲}身上採集獲取。受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1分鐘。因此陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態的生物也將陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態。該生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

entries.name: Map of Shortcuts
entries: At rank 3, your map case becomes a common magic item. In addition to storing normal maps, your cartographer's map case can be used to generate a special map identifying a shortcut. You can use your action to make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, with a success revealing a map buried in your cartographer's map case noting a relevant shortcut. Your travel time is reduced by half while you follow that route. If you succeed at the check by 5 or more, the map includes notes on the terrain, granting you advantage on the next ability check you make to travel through the mapped area in the next hour. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Map of the Moment
entries: Starting at rank 3, you can use an action to make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check and search your cartographer's map case to find a map either related to your current mission or inspiring a new one. On a success, you find a map with a prominent landmark. The map has information on the natural terrain within one mile of the landmark. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until dawn seven days later.

entries.caption: Possible Map Mission Landmarks
rows: The Ancient Sarcophagus of Gerald Smith
A tree labeled "This tree"
"The Last Resting Place of My Rich Brother that is Also a Bear Cave"
A range of peaks known as the Slightly Wobbly Spires
An ever-flowing, nonmagical spigot of pure, clear water in the middle of nowhere
A cave filled with screaming bioluminescent worms
The most haunted forest for ten miles in any direction
A huge pile of rocks with no other rocks within sight

item.name: 制圖師工具
additionalEntries: Using cartographer's tools, you can create accurate maps to make travel easier for yourself and those who come after you. These maps can range from large-scale depictions of mountain ranges to diagrams that show the layout of a dungeon level.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Cartographer's tools consist of a quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History, Religion
entries: You can use your knowledge of maps and locations to unearth more detailed information when you use these skills. For instance, you might spot hidden messages in a map, identify when the map was made to determine if geographical features have changed since then, and so forth.

additionalEntries.name: Nature
entries: Your familiarity with physical geography makes it easier for you to answer questions or solve issues relating to the terrain around you.

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: Your understanding of geography makes it easier to find paths to civilization, to predict areas where villages or towns might be found, and to avoid becoming lost. You have studied so many maps that common patterns, such as how trade routes evolve and where settlements arise in relation to geographic locations, are familiar to you.

additionalEntries.name: Craft a Map
entries: While traveling, you can draw a map as you go in addition to engaging in other activity.

additionalEntries.caption: Cartographer's Tools
rows: Determine a map's age and origin
Estimate direction and distance to a landmark
Discern that a map is fake
Fill in a missing part of a map

item.name: 異國木材雕製且鑲有象牙和鋯石的豎琴
item.ENG_name: Carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems

item.name: Cauldron of Plenty
entries: This cauldron is made of thick copper that has turned green with age. It is 4 feet wide, has a mouth 3½ feet in diameter, weighs 50 pounds, and can hold up to 30 gallons of liquid. Embossed on its bulging sides are images of satyrs and nymphs in repose, holding ladles. The cauldron comes with a lid and has side handles. It sits on five little clawed feet that keep it from tipping.

If water is poured into the cauldron and stirred for 1 minute, it transforms into a hearty, hot stew, which can provide one nourishing meal for up to four people per gallon. The stew remains hot while in the cauldron, then cools naturally after it is removed. The outside of the cauldron remains safe to touch despite the heat of the stew.
The cauldron can create stew three times. It then ceases to function until the next dawn, when it regains all its uses.

item.name: Cauldron of Rebirth
entries: This Tiny pot bears relief scenes of heroes on its cast iron sides. You can use the cauldron as a spellcasting focus for your druid spells, and it functions as a suitable component for the {@spell 探知} spell. When you finish a long rest, you can use the cauldron to create a {@item potion of greater healing}. The potion lasts for 24 hours, then loses its magic if not consumed.

As an action, you can cause the cauldron to grow large enough for a Medium creature to crouch within. You can revert the cauldron to its normal size as an action, harmlessly shunting anything that can't fit inside to the nearest unoccupied space.

If you place the corpse of a humanoid into the cauldron and cover the corpse with 200 pounds of salt (which costs 10 gp) for at least 8 hours, the salt is consumed and the creature returns to life as if by {@spell 喚醒死者} at the next dawn. Once used, this property can't be used again for 7 days.

item.name: 控制氣元素香爐
entries: 當薰香在這個香爐中焚燒時，你可以使用一個動作以說出這個香爐的命令語，並如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣召喚出一個{@creature 氣元素}。這個香爐直到下次日出之前都不能再次被這個方式使用。
這個6吋寬，1呎高的容器看起來就像是一個附有精雕杯蓋的酒杯。它的重量為1磅。

item.name: 柄端鑲有黑珍珠的珀金儀式匕首
item.ENG_name: Ceremonial electrum dagger with a black pearl in the pommel

item.name: Ceremonial silver dagger with gold pommel and black pearl (Legion of Dusk)
鎖鍊(10呎)
entries: 一條鎖鏈具有10點生命值。透過成功通過一次DC 20的力量檢定可以將它給掙斷。

item.name: 玉髓
entries: 乳白色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 詐欺師之骰
entries: 每當你骰這顆六面骰時，你都可以控制它的擲骰結果。

item.name: Charm of Plant Command
entries: This fist-sized charm is made from a bundle of dried plant stems wrapped in silver thread. Hung on a leather thong, it is typically worn around the neck or attached to a belt.

This charm has 3 charges. While you bear the charm, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell 植物交談術} spell. For the duration of the spell, you also have advantage on Charisma checks made to influence the behavior, demeanor, and attitude of plants. The charm regains all expended charges at dawn each day.

entries.items: Each time you expend a charge from this wand, there is a 50 percent chance that nothing happens and the charge is wasted.

item.name: 箱子
entries: 一個箱子可以容納12立方呎或300磅重的裝備。

item.name: Chest of Preserving
entries: Food and other perishable items do not age or decay while inside a Chest of Preserving. The chest is 2½ feet long, 1½ feet wide, and 1 foot tall with a half-barrel lid. The chest has a lock, which can be picked with thieves' tools and a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Smashing the lock or any other part of the chest renders it nonmagical.

item.name: 開門鐘琴
entries: 這個中空的金屬管約莫1呎長，且重約1磅。你可以用一個動作敲擊它，並將它指向一個距離你120呎內且可以被打開的物體，像是門、蓋子、或鎖。這個鍾琴將會發出一聲清澈的音調，且除非這個聲音無法傳到該物體，否則該物體上的一道鎖或閂將被打開。若該物體沒有其餘的鎖或閂，則該物體本身將被打開。
這個鍾琴可以被使用十次。在第十次使用之後，它將龜裂並變得毫無用處。

item.name: Chronolometer
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Intelligence saving throws. The first time you attune to the chronolometer, you choose one language you don't know. You subsequently know that language while attuned to the device.

entries.name: Time Bandit
entries: At the start of your turn, roll a d6 (no action required). On a 1–3, you slow down time, gaining an additional action on your turn and doubling your speed until the end of the turn. On a 4–6, you go forward in time to warn yourself of what is to come. The next time you fail a saving throw, attack roll, or ability check, you can reroll the check and take either result. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Fate Swap
entries: As a reaction when a creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, that creature gains an additional action if it is the creature's turn, or can take an action immediately even though it isn't the creature's turn. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 金綠寶石
entries: 黃綠色到淡綠色的透光寶石。

item.name: 綠玉髓
entries: 綠色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 爆裂頭飾
entries: 當穿戴這個頭飾時，你可以使用一個動作以使用它施放{@spell 灼熱射線}法術。當你進行該法術的攻擊時，你將以{@hit 5}的攻擊加值進行其檢定。這個頭飾直到下次日出之前都不能再被這個方式使用。

item.name: Circlet of Human Perfection
entries: The Circlet of Human Perfection transforms its attuned wearer into an attractive human of average height and weight. The circlet chooses the physical characteristics of the form, such as age, gender, skin color, hair color, and voice. Except for size, the wearer's statistics and racial traits don't change, nor do items worn or carried by the wearer. Removing the circlet ends the effect.

item.name: 黃水晶
entries: 淡黃褐色的透光寶石。

item.name: 龍爪符文
entries: 這條龍的爪子被一層熔化的銀所覆蓋，上面刻著飛龍(龍)符文。 爪子具有以下屬性。

entries.name: 飛龍殺手
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將爪子指向離你 30 英尺內的龍。 龍必須通過 DC 15 體質豁免，或者在你的下一個回合結束前獲得對所有傷害類型的易商。 此屬性可使用三次。 在下一個黎明，爪子將恢復所有的充能。

entries.name: 飛龍護盾
entries: 當爪子顯現在你身上時，你對任何龍的吐息武器有抗性。

entries.name: 飛龍防護
entries: 你可以通過用手指在地上畫出飛龍符文符文來轉移魔法。 你所指向的地點， 它會變成了一個半徑為 100 英尺的魔法球形區域的中心。 轉移需要 8 小時的工作， 這需要你在爪子 5 英尺之內。 最後，爪子被摧毀，該區域獲得以下屬性:
而在 100 英尺半徑的範圍內，任何龍在豁免檢定都有劣勢，飛行速度無法超過 10 英尺。

item.name: 土巨怪的爪子
entries: 這對沉重的棕色鐵護手被鍛造成一個{@creature 土巨怪}爪子的形狀，且它們會適應其穿戴者的雙手，並一路套到手、前臂、甚至到肘部的位置。當穿戴這對爪子時，你獲得20呎的掘地速度，且你能夠以每輪1呎的速度掘穿堅硬的岩石。
此外，當你穿戴它們時，你可以將這對爪子作為近戰武器使用。你熟練於這對爪子，且它們將在命中後造成{@dice 1d8}劈砍傷害（你的力量調整可以如常應用於該攻擊檢定和傷害骰）。
當你穿戴這對爪子時，你不能操作物件、或施放任何帶有姿勢構材的法術。

item.name: Cleansing Stone
entries: A cleansing stone is a sphere 1 foot in diameter, engraved with mystic sigils. When touching the stone, you can use an action to activate it and remove dirt and grime from your garments and your person.
Such stones are often embedded in pedestals in public squares in Aundair or in high-end Ghallanda inns.

item.name: 攀爬工具組
entries: 這套工具組包括了一些特殊岩釘、鞋釘、手套、和一個保護帶。你能夠以一個動作使用攀爬工具組以固定你自己；若你這麼做，則你不會從你固定自己的地方摔落超過25呎，且你在解除固定之前也無法從你固定自己的地方攀爬超過25呎。

item.name: 節肢斗篷
entries: 這件精美的服飾是由黑色絲綢製成，交織著銀色絲線描繪的花紋。當穿著此斗篷時，你將獲得下列好處：

items: 你具有對毒素傷害的抗性。
你具有等同於你步行速度的攀爬速度。
你可以在垂直表面上下移動、或甚至在天花板上下顛倒的移動，而無須使用你的雙手。
你不會被任何類型的蛛網給困住，且可以將其視為困難地形而移動穿過蛛網。
你可以使用一個動作以施放{@spell 蛛網術}法術（豁免DC 13）。這個被該法術創造的蛛網將充斥在比原本大兩倍的區域。一旦被使用，這個斗篷的此特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 翻騰斗篷
entries: 當穿著此斗篷時，你可以使用一個附贈動作以使它誇張地翻騰。

item.name: 位移斗篷
entries: 你穿著此斗篷時，它將投射出一個幻象，使你看起來像是站在你實際位置的附近，並使任何生物對你所進行的攻擊檢定承受劣勢。若你受到傷害，則這個特性將停止運作直到你的下個回合開始。這個特性將在你陷入{@condition 無力}、{@condition 束縛}、或其他使你無法移動的狀態時被壓抑。

item.name: 精靈斗篷
entries: 當你穿著此斗篷並戴上其兜帽時，任何為了看見你而進行的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定都將具有劣勢，且你在為了躲藏而進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定，將因為此斗篷的顏色改變以將你藏起而具有優勢。將兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一個動作。

item.name: 隱形斗篷
entries: 當穿著此斗篷時，你可以將其兜帽拉起罩住你的頭以使自己變得{@condition 隱形}。當你處於{@condition 隱形}狀態時，任何你所攜帶或穿戴的事物都將隨著你{@condition 隱形}。當你脫下兜帽時，你將變為可見。將兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一個動作。
這件斗篷隱形效果的持續時間上限為2個小時，將你隱形的時間以1分鐘為單位從中扣除。在2個小時的使用時間被用盡後，這件斗篷將停止發揮作用。這件斗篷在沒被使用的狀況下每經過不間斷的12小時,就可以恢復1小時的使用時間。

item.name: 萬眾時尚斗篷
entries: 當穿著此斗篷時，你可以使用一個附贈動作以改變它的造型、顏色、和這件衣裝的外觀品質。這件斗篷的重量不會改變。無論它的外觀如何改變，這件斗篷都只能是一件斗篷。儘管它可以複製出其他魔法斗篷的外觀，但它無法因此獲得它們的魔法特性。

item.name: 防護斗篷
entries: 當你穿著此斗篷時，你在AC和豁免檢定中獲得+1加值。

item.name: 蝙蝠斗篷
entries: 當穿著此斗篷時，你在敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。在微光光照或黑暗的區域中，你可以用雙手抓住斗篷的邊緣，並使用它以40呎的速度飛行。若你在用這個方式飛行的期間失手鬆開斗篷的邊緣、或你不再處於微光光照或黑暗的環境中，則你將失去這個飛行速度。
當在微光光照或黑暗的環境中穿著此斗篷時，你可以使用你的動作對你自己施放{@spell 變形術}法術，將你自己轉變成一隻{@creature 蝙蝠}。當你處於蝙蝠型態時，你保留你的智力、睿知、和魅力屬性值。這個斗篷直到下次日出之前都無法再次以這個方式被使用。

item.name: 魟魚斗篷
entries: 當穿著此斗篷並戴上其兜帽時，你可以在水中呼吸，且你將具有60呎的游泳速度。將兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一個動作。

item.name: 發條護符
entries: 這個黃銅護符包含著許多互相咬合的微型齒輪，且被來自機械境，一個可預測發條位面，的魔力所驅動。將耳朵靠在這個護符上的生物可以聽見模糊的滴答聲和颼颼作響的噪音從內部發出。
當你在穿戴這個護符期間進行一次攻擊檢定，你可以放棄擲{@dice d20}骰，而改為在該擲骰中取10。一旦被使用，這個特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Clockwork Dog
entries: This Tiny clockwork dog made of copper and tin comes with a copper wind-up key. As an action, you can use the key to wind the dog, after which it follows you for 12 hours. At the end of that duration, the clockwork dog stops until wound again. The dog has AC 5, 1 hit point, and a walking speed of 30 feet.

item.name: 修補之衣
entries: 這套典雅的旅行者全套服裝可以用魔法修補自己以抵銷每日的穿著磨損。這套衣裝中被摧毀的部分將無法透過這個方式被修復。

item.name: Clothing, cold weather
entries: This outfit consists of a heavy fur coat or cloak over layers of wool clothing, as well as a fur-lined hat or hood, goggles, and fur-lined leather boots and gloves.
As long as cold weather clothing remains dry, its wearer automatically succeeds on saving throws against the effects of {@hazard extreme cold}.

item.name: 鞋匠工具
additionalEntries: Although the cobbler's trade might seem too humble for an adventurer, a good pair of boots will see a character across rugged wilderness and through deadly dungeons.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Cobbler's tools consist of a hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: Your knowledge of shoes aids you in identifying the magical properties of enchanted boots or the history of such items.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: Footwear holds a surprising number of secrets. You can learn where someone has recently visited by examining the wear and the dirt that has accumulated on their shoes. Your experience in repairing shoes makes it easier for you to identify where damage might come from.

additionalEntries.name: Maintain Shoes
entries: As part of a long rest, you can repair your companions' shoes. For the next 24 hours, up to six creatures of your choice who wear shoes you worked on can travel up to 10 hours a day without making saving throws to avoid {@condition exhaustion}.

additionalEntries.name: Craft Hidden Compartment
entries: With 8 hours of work, you can add a hidden compartment to a pair of shoes. The compartment can hold an object up to 3 inches long and 1 inch wide and deep. You make an Intelligence check using your tool proficiency to determine the Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check DC needed to find the compartment.

additionalEntries.caption: Cobbler's Tools
rows: Determine a shoe's age and origin
Find a hidden compartment in a boot heel

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo has long intertwining designs.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, as an action, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} force damage and be {@condition grappled} by you. As an action, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no action required), if the creature is ever more than 15 feet away from you, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: This tattoo has long intertwining designs. While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, as an action, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} force damage and be {@condition grappled} by you. As an action, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no action required), if the creature is ever more than 15 feet away from you, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Coin of Decisionry
entries: Starting at rank 2, your coin of decisionry becomes a common magic item. When you flip the coin, it always lands with the Acquisitions Incorporated sigil face down, and a message appears on the "tails" face. Roll a {@dice d4} on the following table to determine the message.

rows: Lucrative
Brand Appeal
Indeterminate
Ruinous

entries: The coin has absolutely no divination abilities, and its results when you use it are random. But nobody else knows that. When a creature within 10 feet of you flips the coin (after having had its powerful prognostication powers dutifully explained), you can exert your will to control its operation as a bonus action, choosing the result that appears after it lands as a means of gently coercing the user toward a specific course of action. The creature flipping the coin can detect your manipulation with a successful DC 13 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

entries.name: Better Odds
entries: When you reach rank 3, your coin of decisionry gains a measure of actual divination power and becomes an uncommon magic item. In addition to its normal function, you can use an action to flip the coin of decisionry twice while pondering a specific plan or objective, noting both random results. If you succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check, you learn which of the two results is more applicable to the course of action. This property of the coin can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Coin of Delving
entries: This scintillating copper coin sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. If dropped a distance greater than 5 feet, the coin issues a melodious ringing sound when it hits a surface. Any creature that can hear the chime can determine the distance the coin dropped based on the tone.

item.name: Cold Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Common Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave is clothing imbued with harmless illusory magic. While wearing the common version of these clothes, you can use a bonus action to create a moving illusory pattern within the cloth.

item.name: 材料包
entries: 材料包是一個小巧、防水的皮革腰包，有著許多隔間，收納著所有你所需要用於施展法術的材料構材或其他特殊道具。但它並不包括那些有著指定價格（記載於法術敘述中）的構材。

item.name: Concertina
entries: A concertina is a less charming kind of accordion.
In addition to knocking out a killer polka, a creature playing the concertina can use an action to cause an area of mist or water up to 30 feet in diameter and 6 inches deep to freeze solid.
Once used, this feature of the concertina can't be used again until the next dawn.

Any creatures touching the floor must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by the ice. As an action, a {@condition restrained} creature can attempt to free itself or another creature within its reach from the ice, doing so with a successful DC 20 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. A character freed from the ice is no longer restrained by it. The ice melts in an hour.

item.name: Conch of Safe Rest
entries: You can use an action to blow this pearlescent conch like a horn, creating an effect identical with that of a {@spell 李歐蒙小屋} spell. The conch disappears once the spell takes effect. The effect ends if you leave the spell's area.

item.name: 傳送海螺
entries: 這是一個普通，但是相當大的海螺殼 ，上面鐫刻著尤瓦(風暴)符文。 海螺有 2½ 英尺長，重達 20 磅。
以一個動作，你可以通過向外殼吹氣來施展 {@spell 傳送術} 。 目標是固定的， 並且沒有發生事故或法術偏離目標的機會。 任何通過海螺傳送的人都將出現在該物品的創造者刻上尤瓦(風暴)符文時所指定的特定位置。 它不允許傳送到任何其他目的地。 一旦它的法術被釋放，海螺就不能再使用，直到第二天黎明。

item.name: 廚師炊具
additionalEntries: Adventuring is a hard life. With a cook along on the journey, your meals will be much better than the typical mix of hardtack and dried fruit.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Cook's utensils include a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: Your knowledge of cooking techniques allows you to assess the social patterns involved in a culture's eating habits.

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: When administering treatment, you can transform medicine that is bitter or sour into a pleasing concoction.

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: When foraging for food, you can make do with ingredients you scavenge that others would be unable to transform into nourishing meals.

additionalEntries.name: Prepare Meals
entries: As part of a short rest, you can prepare a tasty meal that helps your companions regain their strength. You and up to five creatures of your choice regain 1 extra hit point per Hit Die spent during a short rest, provided you have access to your cook's utensils and sufficient food.

additionalEntries.caption: Cook's Utensils
rows: Create a typical meal
Duplicate a meal
Spot poison or impurities in food
Create a gourmet meal

item.name: 銅幣(cp)
entries: 一般的貨幣會有數個不同的幣值單位在市面上流通，且其面額會根據鑄造它們所使用的金屬的相對價值來決定。三種最常見的貨幣是金幣(gp)、銀幣(sp)、和銅幣(cp)。
一枚金幣，可以讓一個角色購買一個腰包、50呎的優質繩索、或一頭山羊。一名純熟（但並不傑出）的工匠每天可以賺取一枚金幣。儘管金幣本身並不常被直接使用，但黃金仍然是衡量財富的標準單位。當商人們商談著的交易涉及價值千百金幣的貨物或服務，其交易本身通常不會涉及貨幣的交換。更確切的說，金幣只是衡量價值的標準，而實際交易中使用的則是金條、信用狀、或其他值錢的商品。
一枚金幣值十枚銀幣，銀幣是普通人之間最盛行的貨幣。一枚銀幣可以僱傭一名勞動者工作一整天、購買一扁瓶的燈油、或是在簡陋旅館的一夜休眠。
一枚銀幣值十枚銅幣，銅幣則常見於勞動者和乞丐之間。一枚銅幣能買一根蠟燭、一支火炬、或是一支粉筆。
除此之外，使用其他貴重金屬鑄造的罕見貨幣有時也會出現在寶藏中。珀金幣(ep)和鉑金幣(pp)源自於衰落帝國和失落的王國，且當它們被用於交易時也偶爾會引起猜忌與懷疑。一枚珀金幣價值五枚銀幣，而一枚鉑金幣則價值十枚金幣。
一枚標準貨幣的重量約為三分之一盎司，所以五十枚貨幣重約一磅。

item.name: 赤銅龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿著這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對酸蝕傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30哩內最近的赤銅龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Copper stein with silver filigree (Brazen Coalition)
珊瑚
entries: 緋紅色的不透光寶石。

item.name: Crampons
entries: A crampon is a metal plate with spikes that is strapped to the sole of a boot. A creature wearing crampons can't fall {@condition prone} while moving across {@hazard slippery ice}.

item.name: Crook of Rao
entries: Ages ago, the serene god Rao created a tool to shield his fledgling faithful against the evils of the Lower Planes. Yet, as eons passed, mortals developed their own methods of dealing with existential threats, and the crook was largely forgotten. In recent ages, though, the Crook of Rao was rediscovered and leveraged against the rising power of the Witch Queen Iggwilv (one of the names of the wizard Tasha). Although she was defeated, Iggwilv managed to damage the crook during the battle, infecting it with an insidious curse-and the potential for future victory. In the aftermath, the crook was again lost. Occasionally it reappears, but the famed artifact is not what it was. Whether or not the artifact's bearers realize its full threat, few risk using the Crook of Rao -potentially for the final time.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} properties
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property

entries.name: Spells
entries: The crook has 6 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 生命靈光} (2 charges), {@spell 淨化靈光} (2 charges), {@spell 放逐術} (1 charge), {@spell 希望信標} (1 charge), {@spell 群體治療傷勢} (3 charges). The crook regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Absolute Banishment
entries: While you are attuned to the crook and holding it, you can spend 10 minutes to banish all but the mightiest fiends within 1 mile of you. Any fiend with a challenge rating of 19 or higher is unaffected. Each banished fiend is sent back to its home plane and can't return to the plane the Crook of Rao banished it from for 100 years.

entries.name: Failing Matrix
entries: Whenever the Crook of Rao 's Absolute Banishment property is used, or when its last charge is expended, roll on the Extraplanar Reversal table. Any creatures conjured as a result of this effect appear in random unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you and are not under your control.

entries.name: Iggwilv's Curse
entries: When the Crook was last used against Iggwilv, the Witch Queen lashed out at the artifact, infecting its magical matrix. Over the years, this curse has spread within the crook, threatening to violently pervert its ancient magic. If this occurs, the Crook of Rao, as it is currently known, is destroyed, its magical matrix inverting and exploding into a 50-foot-diameter portal. This portal functions as a permanent {@spell 異界之門} spell cast by Iggwilv. The gate then, once per round on initiative count 20, audibly speaks a fiend's name in Iggwilv's voice, doing so until the gate calls on every fiend ever banished by the Crook of Rao. If the fiend still exists, it is drawn through the gate. This process takes eighteen years to complete, at the end of which the gate becomes a permanent portal to Pazunia, the first layer of the Abyss.

entries.caption: Extraplanar Reversal
rows: A portal to a random plane opens. The portal closes after 5 minutes.
{@dice 2d4} imps and {@dice 2d4} quasits appear.
{@dice 1d8} succubi/incubi appear.
{@dice 1d10} barbed devils and {@dice 1d10} vrocks appear.
1 arcanoloth, 1 night hag, and 1 rakshasa appear.
1 ice devil and 1 marilith appear.
1 balor and 1 pit fiend appear. At the DM's discretion, a portal opens into the presence of an archdevil or demon lord instead, then closes after 5 minutes.
Iggwilv's Curse (see the Iggwilv's Curse property).

entries.name: Destroying or Repairing the Crook
entries: The Crook of Rao can either be destroyed or repaired by journeying to Mount Celestia and obtaining a tear from the eternally serene god Rao. One way to make the emotionless god cry would be to reunite Rao with the spirit of his first worshiper who sought revelations beyond the multiverse long ago. The Crook dissolves if immersed in the god's tear for a year and a day. If washed in the tear daily for 30 days, the Crook loses its Failing Matrix property.

item.name: 弩矢匣
entries: 這個木製小盒可以容納最多20支弩矢。

item.name: 撬棍
entries: 在撬棍的槓桿原理可以適用的地方使用撬棍可以讓相應的力量檢定獲得優勢。

item.name: Crown of the Forest
entries: While wearing this crown, a character automatically fails any Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check made to see through an illusion. An illusion that is touched still has its true nature revealed. However, a character wearing a crown has such a strong sense that the illusion is real that they might not know which of their senses to believe.

If this crown is closely examined by a character who succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) or Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, or with a {@spell 偵測魔法} spell cast using a 3rd-level or higher spell slot, the nature of its magic is discovered.

item.name: 水晶球
entries: 這顆水晶球的直徑約莫6吋。當觸碰這顆水晶球時，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法術（豁免DC 17）。

item.name: 讀心水晶球
entries: 這顆{@i 水晶球}的直徑約莫6吋。當觸碰這顆水晶球時，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法術（豁免DC 17）。
當你以這顆{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期間，你可以使用一個動作以施放{@spell 偵測思想}法術（豁免DC 17），並指定距離該法術感應器30呎內一個你所能看見的生物做為目標。你不需要專注於這個{@spell 偵測思想}以維持其持續時間，但它會在{@spell 探知}法術結束時一併結束。

item.name: 心靈感應水晶球
entries: 這顆{@i 水晶球}的直徑約莫6吋。當觸碰這顆水晶球時，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法術（豁免DC 17）。

當你以這顆{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期間，你可以透過心靈感應與距離該法術感應器30呎內的生物溝通。你也可以使用一個動作，透過該感應器對其中一個這些生物施放{@spell 暗示術}法術（豁免DC 17）。你不需要專注於這個{@spell 暗示術}以維持其持續時間，但它會在{@spell 探知}法術結束時一併結束。一旦被使用，這顆{@i 水晶球}的暗示能力直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 真知水晶球
entries: 這顆{@i 水晶球}的直徑約莫6吋。當觸碰這顆水晶球時，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法術（豁免DC 17）。
當你以這顆{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期間，你具有以該法術感應器為中心120呎範圍的真實視覺。

item.name: Crystalline Chronicle
entries: An etched crystal sphere the size of a grapefruit hums faintly and pulses with irregular flares of inner light. While you are touching the crystal, you can retrieve and store information and spells within the crystal at the same rate as reading and writing. When found, the crystal contains the following spells: {@spell 偵測思想}, {@spell intellect fortress|TCE},* {@spell 拉瑞心靈聯結}, {@spell 短訊術}, {@spell 心靈遙控}, {@spell Tasha's mind whip|TCE},* and {@spell 譚森浮碟術} (spells with an asterisk appear in this book). It functions as a spellbook for you, with its spells and other writing psychically encoded within it.

While you are holding the crystal, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells, and you know the {@spell 法師之手}, {@spell mind sliver|TCE} (appears in this book), and {@spell 傳訊術} cantrips if you don't already know them.
The crystal has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the information within the crystal, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book.
When you cast a wizard spell, you can expend 1 charge to cast the spell without verbal, somatic, or material components of up to 100 gp value.

item.name: 力場魔方
entries: 這個魔方的直徑約1吋。它的各面都有著獨特的標記，且可以被按壓。這個魔方起始含有36發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d20}發已消耗的充能。

你可以使用一個動作以按下這個魔方的其中一面，並參照力場魔方各面的表格，根據所選的面消耗對應的充能數。每個面都有著不同的效果。若這個魔方沒有足夠的充能，則什麼事也不會發生。除此之外，一道{@condition 隱形}的力場屏障將會憑空出現，形成一個各邊邊長15呎的立方體。這個屏障將以你為中心，會隨著你移動，且會持續長達1分鐘、或直到你使用一個動作按下這個魔方的第六面、或直到這個魔方的充能耗盡。你可以藉由按下這個魔方的不同面並消耗所需的充能，以改變這道屏障的效果並重置其持續時間。若你的移動導致這道屏障撞上一個無法穿過立方體力場的固態物體，則你在這道屏障存在的期間，將無法再更移動靠近該物體。

entries.caption: 力場魔方各面
rows: 氣體、風、和霧無法穿過這道屏障。
非活體物質無法穿過這道屏障。由你決定牆壁、地板、和天花板是否可以穿過這道屏障。
活體物質無法穿過這道屏障。
法術效果無法穿過這道屏障。
任何事物都無法穿過這道屏障。由你決定牆壁、地板、和天花板是否可以穿過這道屏障。
這道屏障被解除。

entries: 這個魔方會在其屏障被做為特定法術的目標、或接觸到特定法術或魔法物品的效果時失去充能，如下表所示。

rows: {@spell 解離術}
{@dice 1d12}
{@item 音爆號角}
{@dice 1d10}
{@spell 穿牆術}
{@dice 1d6}
{@spell 虹光噴射}
{@dice 1d20}
{@spell 火牆術}
{@dice 1d4}

item.name: 界門魔方
entries: 這個魔方的直徑為3吋，且散發著明顯可見的魔法能量。這個魔方的六個面都各自對應著一個不同的存在位面，其中一個是物質位面，而其他各面所聯繫的位面則由DM決定。
你可以使用一個動作以按下這個魔方的其中一面，以使用它施放{@spell 異界之門}法術，開啟一扇通往該面對應位面的傳送門。或者，若你使用一個動作以按下同一面兩次，則你可以使用這個魔方施放{@spell 異界傳送}法術（豁免DC 17），並將目標傳送到該面所對應的位面。
這個魔方含有3發充能。每次使用這個魔方都會消耗1發充能。這個魔方會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Cursed Luckstone
entries: This flat, gray-and-black river stone is inscribed with an unknown arcane symbol and feels cool to the touch. While carrying the stone, you can gain advantage on one ability check of your choice. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This item is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by a remove curse spell or similar magic. As long as you remain cursed, you cannot discard the stone, which immediately teleports back into your pocket or pack. After you use the stone's magic, your next two ability checks are made with disadvantage.

item.name: 戴恩的瞬間要塞
entries: 你可以使用一個動作將這個1吋的金屬立方體放置在地面上並說出它的命令語。這個立方體將瞬間長成一座要塞，且它將持續存在直到你使用一個動作說出將它解除的命令語，這個命令語只有在這座要塞內空無一物時才能發揮效果。

這座要塞是一座方形的高塔，各牆面的寬20呎，高30呎，各牆面上都設有箭孔，且頂端設有城垛。它的內部被分隔成二層樓，透過一個沿著其中一面牆往上的樓梯互相連通。這個樓梯向上通往一扇設置在屋頂的活板門。當它被啟動時，這座高塔朝向你的牆面上將會出現一扇小門。這扇門只會在你的命令下開啟，且你可以使用一個附贈動作說出其命令語。這扇門免疫於{@spell 敲擊術}法術和類似魔法效果的影響，例如{@item 開門鐘琴}。
在要塞出現時，每個在其區域內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 10d10}鈍擊傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。無論成功與否，該生物都將被推至一處位於要塞外且鄰近該要塞的未被佔據空間。在該區域內且未被穿戴或攜帶的物體將自動受到該傷害並被推離。
這座高塔是由精金製成，且它的魔法保護它不被推倒。這座高塔的屋頂、門、和牆壁都各自具有100點生命值，免疫於來自除了攻城武器以外的非魔法武器的傷害，且對所有其它傷害具有抗性。只有{@spell 祈願術}法術可以修復這座要塞（該法術的這種用法將被視為複製一個8環或更低的法術）。每次以這種方式施放{@spell 祈願術}將會使屋頂、門、或其中一面牆壁回復50點生命值。

item.name: Dagger of Blindsight
entries: This rare magic item requires attunement. A creature attuned to it gains {@sense blindsight} out to a range of 30 feet. The dagger has a saw-toothed edge and a black pearl nested in its pommel.

item.name: Dagger of Guitar Solos
entries: This drow-made dagger is decorated with silver web filigree. It magically plays a fragment of a guitar solo when struck or used to strike a foe.

item.name: 淬毒匕首
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。
你可以使用一個動作以使厚重、漆黑的毒液裹住刀刃。這個毒液將持續長達1分鐘，或直到一次使用此武器的攻擊命中一個生物。該生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則受到{@dice 2d10}毒素傷害，並陷入{@condition 中毒}狀台長達1分鐘。這把匕首直到下次日出之前都不能再次被以此方式使用。

item.name: Dancing Monkey Fruit
entries: This rare magical fruit produces enough juice to fill a vial. Any humanoid that eats a dancing monkey fruit or drinks its juice must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or begin a comic dance that lasts for 1 minute. Humanoids that can't be {@condition poisoned} are immune to this magical effect.

The dancer must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws, and other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. Each time it takes damage, the dancer can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. When the dancing effect ends, the humanoid suffers the {@condition poisoned} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: Danoth's Visor
entries: These mithral-frame goggles with clear diamond lenses were used by the evoker Danoth Oro to spot {@condition invisible} enemies and scout areas from afar.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the goggles in their dormant state, you can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 60 feet. Additionally, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Danoth's Visor reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: You see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects within 60 feet of you as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word and use the goggles to see into and through solid matter. This vision has a radius of 60 feet and lasts for 1 minute. To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word to switch the goggles into spyglass mode. While in this mode, creatures and objects viewed through the goggles are magnified to twice their size. Speaking the command word again reverts the goggles to their normal operation.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Danoth's Visor reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: You automatically detect illusions you can see and automatically succeed on saving throws against them. In addition, you see a bright aura around any creature that isn't in its true form.
As an action, you can cast the {@spell 反魔法結界} spell from the visor. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 黑暗碎片護符
entries: 這個護符是由源自你契術師宗主所在國度的一塊具恢復力的異位面物質碎片所製作而成。當你穿戴它時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以使用這個護符做為你契術師法術的法器。
你可以嘗試施放一個你不知道的戲法。這個戲法必須被列在契術師法術列表中，且你必須進行一次DC 10的智力（{@skill 奧秘}）檢定。若檢定成功，則你成功施放該法術。若檢定失敗，則該法術也將施放失敗，且用於施放該法術的動作也將被浪費。無論成功與否，你直到完成一次長休之前都不能再使用這個特性。

item.name: Dawnbringer
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-evil alignment
entries: Lost for ages in the Underdark, Dawnbringer appears to be a gilded longsword hilt. While grasping the hilt, you can use a bonus action to make a blade of pure radiance spring from the hilt, or cause the blade to disappear. While the blade exists, this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or {@item longsword|phb|longswords}, you are proficient with Dawnbringer.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} radiant damage.

The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.
While holding the weapon, you can use an action to touch a creature with the blade and cast {@spell 次級復原術} on that creature. Once used, this ability can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Dawnbringer is a sentient neutral good weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
The sword can speak, read, and understand Common, and it can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is kind and feminine. It knows every language you know while attuned to it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Forged by ancient sun worshippers, Dawnbringer is meant to bring light into darkness and to fight creatures of darkness. It is kind and compassionate to those in need, but fierce and destructive to its enemies.

Long years lost in darkness have made Dawnbringer frightened of both the dark and abandonment. It prefers that its blade always be present and shedding light in areas of darkness, and it strongly resists being parted from its wielder for any length of time.

item.name: 無盡水瓶
entries: 這個被瓶塞塞住的細頸瓶會在搖晃時發出液體晃動的聲音，彷彿裏頭裝有水一樣。這個水平重2磅。
你可以使用一個動作以拔出其瓶塞並說出三個命令語的其中之一，接著大量的清水或鹹水（由你決定）將從這個瓶子中湧出。這些水將在你的下個回合開始時停止湧出。其命令語如下列選項所示：

items: 「溪流」產生1加侖的水。
「泉源」產生5加侖的水。

「噴泉」產生30加侖的水，並噴湧形成一道30呎長，1呎寬的噴泉水柱。當持握這個水瓶時，以一個附贈動作，你可以以這道噴泉水柱瞄準一個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物。目標必須成功通過一次DC 13的力量豁免，否則將受到{@dice 1d4}鈍擊傷害並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。你也可以不瞄準生物，而是選擇一個未被穿戴或攜帶，且重量不超過200磅的物體。該物體將被擊倒打翻、或被推離你最多15呎距離。

item.name: 幻象牌組
entries: 這個盒子內裝有一套羊皮紙製成的卡牌。一套完整的牌組有34張卡牌。而一個做為寶藏被發現的牌組通常會遺失{@dice 1d20-1}張卡牌。
這套牌組的魔法只會在卡牌被隨機抽出時發揮作用（你可以使用一套調整過的撲克牌以模擬這套牌組）。你可以使用一個動作從牌組中隨機抽出一張卡牌，並將它丟到距離你30呎內地面上一點。

一個或多個生物的幻象將會從被扔出的該卡牌上成形，且維持其存在直到被解消。一個幻象生物看起來跟真的一模一樣，有著相仿的體型，且其行為就如同它是真實的生物一樣，但它無法造成任何傷害。當你距離該幻象生物120呎內且可以看見它時，你可以使用一個動作讓它用魔法移動到任何距離其卡牌30呎內的地方。由於東西會穿過幻象，與幻象的任何物理性互動都將暴露它是幻象的事實。一個使用它的動作去檢視該幻象的生物，可以藉由成功通過一次DC 15的智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定以辨識出它是幻象。該幻象接著對該生物而言將變得半透明。
這個幻象將持續直到它的卡牌被移除、或是該幻象被解消。當這個幻象結束，其卡牌上的圖樣將會消失，且該卡牌將無法再被使用。

item.name: 萬象無常牌
entries: 通常被發現於盒子或囊袋中，這套牌組包含著數張由象牙或羊皮紙製成的卡牌。這些牌組大部分（75%）只有13張卡牌，但其他則會有22張。
在你抽牌之前，你必須宣告你打算抽取幾張卡牌，並接著隨機抽取（你可以使用一套調整過的撲克牌以模擬這套牌組）。任何在抽出宣告張數之後被抽出的卡牌將不會發揮任何效果。除此之外的情況，一旦你從這套牌組中抽出卡牌，它的魔法將立即發揮效果。你在該次宣告中抽取每張卡牌之間的間隔不能超過1小時，如果你沒能抽出所宣告數量的卡牌，則宣告張數中剩餘數量的卡牌將從牌組中自行飛出，並同時發揮效果。
一旦卡牌被抽出，它將會隨之消散。除了愚者和弄臣之外，該卡牌將會重新出現在牌組中，讓你有可能再次抽到同樣的牌。

entries.name: 關於敵意的問題
entries: 這套萬象無常牌中的二張牌將會讓角色受到另一個存在的敵視。以烈焰牌來說，這個敵意相當明顯。角色將會在許多場合中經歷這名魔鬼惡毒的計畫。尋找這名邪魔不該是個簡單的任務，且冒險者們必須在與魔鬼本體對峙之前，多次擊潰魔鬼的盟友和追隨者。
而至於盜賊牌，這個敵意則隱藏難辨，且必須來自某個被認為是朋友或盟友的對象。做為地下城主，你應該要等到一個戲劇性的時刻才揭露這股敵意，讓冒險者們在此之前瞎猜著究竟誰可能會是背叛者。

rows: 大臣*
在你抽出這張卡牌一年內的任何時候，你可以選擇在冥想中詢問一個問題，並透過心靈接收到關於該問題的真實答案。除了情報之外，這個答案也會協助你解決一個艱難的問題或其他困境。換句話說，這個回答也伴隨著如何實踐它的智慧。
太陽
你獲得50,000經驗值，且一件奇物（由DM隨機決定）將出現在你的手中。
月亮
你被賦予施放{@dice 1d3}次{@spell 祈願術}法術的能力。
星星
你的其中一個屬性值增加2點。這個屬性值可以超過20，但不能超過24。
彗星*
若你單獨地擊敗你下一次遭遇到的敵對怪物或怪物群體，則你將獲得剛好足以讓你升級的經驗值。除此之外的情況，這張卡牌不會發揮任何效果。
命運三女神*
現實的紡線被解開並重新編就，讓你得以避開或消除一個事件，就如同它從未發生過。你可以在你抽出這張卡牌的瞬間、或在你死亡前的任何時候使用這張卡牌的魔法。
君王
你獲得{@skill 說服}技能的熟練，且你的熟練加值在使用該技能所進行的檢定中變為兩倍。此外，你獲得位於這個世界某處一座小型城堡的所有權。然而，這座城堡現在被怪物們所佔領，你必須先清除它們才能聲稱你擁有這座城堡。
鑰匙
一把你所熟練，稀有度為珍稀或更高的魔法武器將出現在你的手中。由DM選擇該武器。
騎士
一個4級戰士出現在距離你30呎內你所選擇的空間，並為你服務。這個戰士與你有著相同的種族，相信命運已安排他或她來到你身邊，並會忠誠地服侍你直到死亡。由你控制這名角色。
寶石*
二十五顆各自價值2,000金幣的珠寶、或五十顆各自價值1,000金幣的寶石將出現在你的腳邊。
禽爪*
所有你正穿戴或攜帶的魔法物品被解離成塵。你所擁有的神器並不會被摧毀，但仍會消失。
虛空
這張漆黑的卡牌將帶來災難。你的靈魂被抽離你的身體，並被囚禁在DM所選擇的場所中的一個物體內。一個或多個強大的存在將守護著該場所。當你的靈魂被這個方式囚禁期間，你的身體將陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。{@spell 祈願術}法術無法喚回你的靈魂，但該法術可以揭露出囚禁著你靈魂物品的所在場所。抽出此卡後，你就不再抽取其他卡牌。
烈焰
一個強大的魔鬼將成為你的敵人。這個魔鬼渴望著你的墮落並折磨你的人生，希望在嘗試殺死你之前享受你的痛苦。這個敵意會持續直到你或者該魔鬼死亡。
頭骨

你召喚出一個{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}──一個身著漆黑長袍，手持幽靈鐮刀，鬼魅般的類人骷髏。它將出現在距離你10呎內一處DM所選擇的空間並攻擊你，同時警告其他所有人你必須獨自一人在這場戰鬥中勝出。這個化身將戰鬥直到你死亡或是它的生命值歸零，並會隨之消失。若任何人嘗試幫助你，則幫助者將會召喚出它自己的{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}。一個被{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}殺死的生物將無法被復活。
傻瓜*
你的智力值將永久降低{@dice 1d4+1}點（最低降至1）。你可以在你宣告的抽牌數量之外再額外抽取一張卡牌。
城堡*
你將消失並以靜滯狀態被禁錮在某個球型異次元空間之中。所有你所穿戴和攜帶的事物都將留在你消失時所佔據的空間。你將維持被囚禁的狀態直到你被發現，且被從球體中移出。你無法被任何預言系魔法給定位，但{@spell 祈願術}法術可以揭示出你被囚禁的場所。抽出此卡後，你就不再抽取其他卡牌。
廢墟
你所攜帶或擁有的任何形式的財富，除了魔法物品之外，都將從你身上遺失。可攜帶的財產將直接消失。你所擁有的生意、建築、以及土地將以最小幅度改變現實的方式遺失。任何能證明你擁有某個因為此卡牌而遺失事物的文件也都將消失。
蛇髮女妖
這張卡牌上那{@creature 梅杜莎}一般的面容將詛咒你。在受到這個方式詛咒的期間，你在豁免檢定中承受-2的罰值。只有神祇或命運三女神卡牌上的魔法可以終止這個詛咒。
盜賊
一個由DM所選擇的非玩家角色將對你抱有敵意。直到該NPC或某人揭露其身分之前，你將無法知道你這名新敵人的身分。只有{@spell 祈願術}法術或神力干預能夠終止該NPC對你的敵意。
平衡*
你的心靈經歷了劇烈的變化，以至於你的陣營發生改變。守序將變為混亂，善良則變為邪惡，反之亦然。如果你的陣營為絕對中立或無陣營，則這張卡牌對你不會有任何效果。
愚者*
你失去10,000經驗值，捨棄這張卡牌，並再從牌組中抽取一張卡牌，將這二次抽牌視作你宣告抽牌數量的其中一次。若失去這些經驗值將導致你降低一個等級，則你改為失去足以讓你剛好維持當前等級的經驗值。
弄臣
你獲得10,000經驗值，或者你可以在你宣告的抽牌數量之外再額外抽取二張卡牌。

entries: * 只會在擁有22張卡牌的牌組中被發現

item.name: Deck of Several Things
entries: Stored in a leather pouch, this unique deck contains twenty-two colored cards made of some strong but unknown metal, each of which features a design printed as a mosaic of raised dots. Before you draw a card, you must declare how many cards you intend to draw and then draw them randomly (you can use an altered deck of playing cards to simulate the deck). Any cards drawn in excess of this number have no effect. Otherwise, as soon as you draw a card from the deck, its magic takes effect. You must draw each card no more than 1 hour after the previous draw. If you fail to draw the chosen number, the remaining number of cards fly from the deck on their own and take effect all at once.
Once a card is drawn, it fades from existence. Unless the card is the Fool or the Jester, the card reappears in the deck, making it possible to draw the same card twice.
