entries.name: Balance
entries: Your mind suffers a wrenching alteration, causing your alignment to change for the duration of the adventure. Lawful becomes chaotic, good becomes evil, and vice versa. If you are true neutral or unaligned, this card has no effect on you.

entries.name: Comet
entries: If you single-handedly defeat the next hostile monster or group of monsters you encounter, you have advantage on ability checks made using one skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure. Otherwise, this card has no effect.

entries.name: Donjon
entries: You are instantly teleported to and confined within the prison of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M6). Everything you were wearing and carrying stays behind in the space you occupied when you disappeared. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Euryale
entries: The card's medusa-like visage curses you. You take a −1 penalty on saving throws for the duration of the adventure.

entries.name: The Fates
entries: Reality's fabric unravels and spins anew, allowing you to avoid or erase one event as if it never happened. You can use the card's magic as soon as you draw the card or at any other point during the adventure.

entries.name: Flames
entries: The Grand Master of the Monastery of the Distressed Body becomes your enemy. The bone devil seeks your ruin, savoring your suffering before attempting to slay you. If the Grand Master has already been defeated, you gain the enmity of Garret Levistusson's patron—a similarly powerful devil.

entries.name: Fool
entries: For the duration of the adventure, you lose proficiency with one skill or gain disadvantage on all checks made with one skill (with the skill and the penalty determined by the DM). Discard this card and draw from the deck again, counting both draws as one of your declared draws.

entries.name: Gem
entries: The 1,000 gp hoard of the leprechaun from the Wilderness Encounters table (see appendix A) appears at your feet. If that treasure has already been claimed, you gain an equivalent hoard.

entries.name: Idiot
entries: Reduce your Intelligence by {@dice 1d4 + 1} (to a minimum score of 1) for the duration of the adventure. You can draw one additional card beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Jester
entries: You gain proficiency in a skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure, or you can draw two additional cards beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Key
entries: A common or uncommon magic weapon with which you are proficient, or a {@item spell scroll} featuring a spell of a level you can cast, appears in your hands. The DM chooses the weapon or spell, which you possess for the duration of this adventure.

entries.name: Knight
entries: You gain the service of any of the NPCs in the "{@book Hirelings|phb|5|services}" section not currently with the party, who appears in a space you choose within 30 feet of you. The NPC serves you loyally for the duration of the adventure, believing that the fates have drawn them to you. You control this character.

entries.name: Moon
entries: You are granted the ability to cast any spell of 5th level or lower, and can use that ability {@dice 1d3} times for the duration of the adventure.

entries.name: Rogue
entries: An NPC of the DM's choice becomes secretly hostile toward you. The identity of your new enemy isn't known until the NPC or someone else reveals it. Any enchantment spell cast on the NPC at 6th level or higher can end the NPC's hostility toward you.

entries.name: Ruin
entries: All forms of wealth that you carry or own, other than magic items, are lost to you. This wealth can be recovered either in the treasury of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M10) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure.

entries.name: Skull
entries: You summon an avatar of death—a mechanical skeleton (use bone naga statistics) clad in a tattered black robe. It appears in a space of the DM's choice within 10 feet of you and attacks you, warning all others that you must win the battle alone. The avatar fights until you die or it drops to 0 hit points, whereupon it disappears. If anyone tries to help you, the helper summons its own avatar of death. A creature slain by an avatar of death can't be restored to life.

entries.name: Star
entries: Increase one of your ability scores by 1 for the duration of the adventure. The score can exceed 20 but can't exceed 24.

entries.name: Sun
entries: You gain proficiency in the skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure. In addition, a common or uncommon wondrous item appears in your hands. The DM chooses the item, which you possess for the duration of this adventure.

entries.name: Talons
entries: Every magic item you wear or carry is lost to you. These items can be recovered either in the treasury of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M10) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure.

entries.name: Throne
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Persuasion} skill and you double your proficiency bonus on checks made with that skill for the duration of the adventure. In addition, the Monastery of the Distressed Body's brains in jars regard you thereafter as the monastery's rightful master. You must defeat or otherwise clear out the Grand Master and its servants before you can claim the monastery as yours.

entries.name: Vizier
entries: At any one time you choose within the duration of the adventure, you can ask a question in meditation and mentally receive a truthful answer to that question. Besides information, the answer helps you solve a puzzling problem or other dilemma. In other words, the knowledge comes with wisdom on how to apply it.

entries.name: The Void
entries: This black card spells disaster. Your soul is drawn from your body and held within machinery in either the control room of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M8) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure. While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is {@condition incapacitated}. {@spell 預言術}, {@spell 異界探知}, or a similar spell of 4th level or higher reveals the location of the machinery that holds your soul. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Using the Deck of Several Things
entries: The special nature of this deck (carried by Mary Greymalkin if she is used as an NPC) means that many of its effects operate only within and with respect to this specific adventure. This typically covers any time the characters spend between setting out for the Barrier Peaks and the resolution of whatever events transpire in Kwalish's lab (area O7).

For cards that effectively remove a character from play for a period of time (Donjon and the Void), you can allow a player to take on the role of one of the party's NPC hirelings, or introduce a temporary character as an NPC met during the party's journey. Alternatively, you can decide that only some aspect of the character's will disappears and is imprisoned, leaving the character to operate in a robotic state until freed.

item.name: Dekella, Bident of Thassa
entries: Thassa wields Dekella, a two-pronged weapon gifted to her by Purphoros. When the god of the sea bestows her weapon on a mortal, it's often so they might work her will far from the ocean, right some wrong affecting those she'd prefer not to harm, or give a mortal a glimpse of her terrible responsibilities.

entries.name: Bident of the Deep
entries: Thassa's signature weapon thrums with the icy currents of the deep ocean. This weapon functions as a trident that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using the bident, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d10} cold damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Deep
entries: If you are a worshiper of Thassa, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: You can breathe underwater, and you gain a swimming speed of 60 feet.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Thassa, the bident has 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property and 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property, both randomly determined.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Command the Deep
entries: The bident holds the power to command the waves and its creatures. As an action, you can change the condition of the sea within 1 mile of you, creating strong winds and heavy rain that cause violent waves (see "Weather at Sea" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide) or calming a storm. In either case, the unnatural weather lasts for 1 hour before returning to normal. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

Additionally, you can cast the {@spell 支配怪物} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but only on beasts and monstrosities that have an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Aquatic Metamorphosis
entries: You can cast the {@spell 完全變形術} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but you must cast it on a creature to turn it into a kind of creature that has an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Bident
entries: To destroy the bident, it must be heated by the breath of an {@creature ancient red dragon} and then, while still hot, immersed in the Tartyx River.

item.name: 惡魔護甲
entries: 當穿著此護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，且你可以理解並說深淵語。此外，這個護甲的帶爪護手將使以你雙手進行的徒手打擊變為魔法武器，該徒手打擊造成劈砍傷害，傷害骰為{@dice 1d8}，且在攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。

entries.name: 詛咒
entries: 一旦你穿上這個被詛咒的護甲，則你將無法將它脫下，除非你被做為{@spell 移除詛咒}法術或其他類似魔法的目標。當穿著此護甲時，你在對惡魔進行的攻擊檢定和對抗其法術和特殊能力的豁免檢定中具有劣勢。

item.name: Demonomicon of Iggwilv
entries: An expansive treatise documenting the Abyss's infinite layers and inhabitants, the Demonomicon of Iggwilv is the most thorough and blasphemous tome of demonology in the multiverse. The tome recounts both the oldest and most current profanities of the Abyss and demons. Demons have attempted to censor the text, and while sections have been ripped from the book's spine, the general chapters remain, ever revealing demonic secrets. And the book holds more than blasphemies. Caged behind lines of script roils a secret piece of the Abyss itself, which keeps the book up-to-date, no matter how many pages are removed, and it longs to be more than mere reference material.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the follow random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} properties
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property

entries.name: Spells
entries: The book has 8 charges. It regains {@dice 1d8} expended charges daily at dawn. While holding it, you can use an action to cast {@spell 塔莎狂笑術} from it or to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 20) from it: {@spell 防護法陣} (1 charge), {@spell 魔魂壺} (3 charges), {@spell 異界盟友} (3 charges), {@spell 異界誓縛} (2 charges), {@spell 異界傳送} (to layers of the Abyss only; 3 charges), {@spell summon fiend|TCE} (3 charges).

entries.name: Abyssal Reference
entries: You can reference the {@i Demonomicon} whenever you make an Intelligence check to discern information about demons or a Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check related to the Abyss. When you do so, you can add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

entries.name: Fiendish Scourging
entries: Your magic causes pain to fiends. While carrying the book, when you make a damage roll for a spell you cast against a fiend, you use the maximum possible result instead of rolling.

entries.name: Ensnarement
entries: While carrying the book, whenever you cast the {@spell 防護法陣} spell naming only fiends, or the {@spell 異界誓縛} spell targeting a fiend, the spell is cast at 9th level, regardless of what level spell slot you used, if any. Additionally, the fiend has disadvantage on its saving throw against the spell.

entries.name: Containment
entries: The first 10 pages of the {@i Demonomicon} are blank. As an action while holding the book, you can target a fiend that you can see that is trapped within a {@spell 防護法陣}. The fiend must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw with disadvantage or become trapped within one of the {@i Demonomicon's} empty blank pages, which fills with writing detailing the trapped creature's widely known name and depravities. Once used, this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

When you finish a long rest, if you and the {@i Demonomicon} are on the same plane of existence, the trapped creature of the highest challenge rating within the book can attempt to possess you. You must make a DC 20 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, you are possessed by the creature, which controls you like a puppet. The possessing creature can release you as an action, appearing in the closest unoccupied space. On a successful save, the fiend can't try to possess you again for 7 days.
When the tome is discovered, it has {@dice 1d4} fiends occupying its pages, typically an assortment of demons.

entries.name: Destroying the Demonomicon
entries: To destroy the book, six different demon lords must each tear out a sixth of the book's pages. If this occurs, the pages reappear after 24 hours. Before all those hours pass, anyone who opens the book's remaining binding is transported to a nascent layer of the Abyss that lies hidden within the book. At the heart of this deadly, semi-sentient domain lies a long-lost artifact, {@i Fraz-Urb'luu's Staff}. If the staff is dragged from the pocket plane, the tome is reduced to a mundane and quite out-of-date copy of the {@i Tome of Zyx}, the work that served as the foundation for the {@i Demonomicon}. Once the staff emerges, the demon lord Fraz-Urb'luu instantly knows.

item.name: 毀滅法球(氣)
entries: 毀滅法球是一種可以藉由在元素節點，以邪惡元素武器施展儀式以製造出來的元素炸彈。被製造的法球類型取決於其製造儀式施展時所在的節點。例如，在氣元素節點施展儀式將會製造出一個毀滅法球(氣)。這個儀式需要花費1個小時的時間，且需要2,000金幣的特殊材料，且這些材料會在儀式過程中被消耗。
毀滅法球的直徑12吋，重10磅，外殼堅固。這個球體會在被製造後經過{@dice 1d100}小時後爆炸，並釋放出它所蘊含的元素能量。在爆炸之前，這個球體完全不存在任何能夠顯示它爆炸時間的跡象。但使用像是{@spell 鑑定術}和{@spell 預言術}之類的法術可以用來確定毀滅法球爆炸的時間。毀滅法球具有AC 10，15點生命值，且免疫於毒素和精神傷害。將其生命值歸零會導致毀滅法球立刻爆炸。
毀滅法球可以透過一個特別打造的特殊容器來存放，以防止它爆炸。這個容器必須刻有該毀滅法球相對元素的符文。例如，一個刻有大地符文的盒子可以用來封存一個毀滅法球(氣)。當被存放在容器時，球體會發出單調的輕擊聲。若它在經過本應引爆的時間之後才被從容器中取出，則該毀滅法球將會在{@dice 1d6}輪之後爆炸，除非它在引爆之前再度被放回容器。
無論毀滅法球的類型如何，它的影響範圍都會涵蓋一個1哩半徑的球體區域。這個區域的中心即是該法球所在的位置。毀滅法球將在使用後立即被摧毀。

entries.name: 狂風法球
entries: 當這個法球爆炸時，它會產生持續1小時的強大風暴。每當一個生物在暴露於狂風中的情況下結束它的回合時，該生物必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免，否則將因為狂風和碎石的衝擊而受到{@dice 1d4}鈍擊傷害。暴露在狂風之下超過10分鐘後，脆弱的樹木將被連根拔起，輕型建築物也會被強風摧毀。除此之外，影響範圍內也將適用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介紹的強風規則。

entries.name: 大地法球
entries: 當這個法球爆炸時，它會使該區域受到{@spell 地震術}法術的影響長達1分鐘（法術豁免DC 18）。在決定該法術的效果時，將該法術的施放時間視作球體爆炸的回合。

entries.name: 烈焰法球
entries: 當這個法球爆炸時，它會產生一道持續長達24小時的乾燥熱浪。其影響區域將適用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介紹的極端酷熱規則。每經過一個小時，熱浪就有10%的機率在影響區域內的隨機地點引發野火。這陣野火最初會覆蓋10呎平方的區域，且隨後每一輪都將再延伸擴大另一片10呎平方的範圍，持續直到野火被撲滅或自行燃燒殆盡。當一個生物在一個回合內第一次進入距離野火10呎內的區域，或在該區域內開始它的回合時，該生物將會受到{@dice 3d6}火焰傷害。

item.name: 毀滅法球(水)

entries.name: 暴雨法球
entries: 當這個法球爆炸時，它會產生持續長達24小時的暴雨。其影響區域將適用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介紹的大雨規則。若區域內存在大型水體的話，則它將會在大雨後{@dice 2d10}小時因此氾濫，淹漲超過堤岸10呎高度，並淹沒周遭地區。在這之後，氾濫洪水將以每輪100呎的速度，從水體向外吞沒陸地，直到它抵達影響區域的邊界：當淹沒到邊界後，水將會向低處流動（並可能因此流回它的源頭）。輕型建築物將被洪水沖垮並帶走。任何位於洪水淹沒路徑上，且體型為大型或更小的生物都將被一併沖走。洪水會毀壞莊稼，且根據當地的地形甚至可能引發土石流。

entries.items: If you attune to this staff, you transform into a goat-humanoid hybrid over the course of 3 days. Tieflings are immune to this curse. Throughout the first day, shaggy fur begins to grow all over your body. After 24 hours, your eyes become goat-like, and stumpy horns sprout from your brow. On the last day, your fingers and toes meld into double digits, and the horns grow to full length. This transformation doesn't prevent you from wielding weapons or casting spells. {@spell 移除詛咒}, {@spell 高等復原術}, or any other effect that ends a curse restores your original appearance, but only a {@spell 祈願術} spell can rid the staff of its power to transform those who attune to it.

item.name: Devotee's Censer
entries: The rounded head of this flail is perforated with tiny holes, arranged in symbols and patterns. The flail counts as a holy symbol for you. When you hit with an attack using this magic flail, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.

As a bonus action, you can speak the command word to cause the flail to emanate a thin cloud of incense out to 10 feet for 1 minute. At the start of each of your turns, you and any other creatures in the incense each regain {@dice 1d4} hit points. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 鑽石
entries: 藍白色、鮮黃色、粉紅色、棕色、或藍色的透光寶石。

item.name: Dimensional Loop
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Strength saving throws, and you have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, its range increases by 30 feet.

entries.name: Dimensional Cloak
entries: As a bonus action, you send your body out of phase with the material world for 1 minute, granting you advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, and imposing disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Once you use this feature of the dimensional loop, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Fold Space
entries: Choose a space you can see within 60 feet of you (no action required). You treat that space as if it were within 5 feet of you until the end of your turn. This allows you to move immediately to that space without provoking opportunity attacks, or to interact with objects or creatures in that space as though they were next to you (including allowing you to make melee attacks into that space). Once you use this feature of the dimensional loop, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 次元鐐銬
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以將這對鐐銬銬住一個陷入{@condition 無力}的生物。這對鐐銬會自行調整以適應一個體型在小型至大型範圍的生物的尺寸。除了尋常鐐銬的功能外，這對鐐銬可以防止被其束縛的生物使用任何異次元移動手段，包括傳送或異位面旅行。然而它們無法阻止生物穿過連接異次元位面的傳送門。
你和任何你在使用這對鐐銬時所指定的生物可以使用一個動作將其移除。每30天一次，被銬住的生物可以進行一次DC 30的力量（{@skill 運動}）檢定。若檢定成功，則該生物從中逃脫並摧毀這對鐐銬。

item.name: Dimir Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Dimir, allows you to cast {@spell 易容術}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Dimir's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Dimir Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Dimir guild
entries: This keyrune, carved from black stone accented with steel, resembles a stylized horror. On command, it transforms into an {@creature intellect devourer} that resembles the Dimir guild symbol, with six bladelike legs. The creature exists for up to 24 hours. During that time, it pursues only a single mission you give it—usually an assignment to take over someone's body, either to impersonate that person for a brief time or to extract secrets from their mind. When the mission is complete, the creature returns to you, reports its success, and reverts to its keyrune form.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature intellect devourer}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Dodge} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 大使套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 箱子|phb}
2個{@item 地圖或卷軸筒|phb}
一套{@item 高級服裝|phb}
一瓶{@item 墨水(1盎司小瓶裝)|phb|墨水}
一支{@item 墨水筆|phb}
一盞{@item 油燈|phb}
2瓶{@item 燈油(扁瓶裝)|phb|燈油}
5張{@item 紙(一張)|phb|紙}
一瓶{@item 香水(小瓶裝)|phb|香水}
{@item 封蠟|phb}
{@item 肥皂|phb}

item.name: 易容工具組
entries: 這個囊袋裡的化妝品、染髮劑、以及小道具讓你能夠做出改變你外在面容的偽裝。熟練於這套工具組能讓你將你的熟練加值加到任何你在為了創造視覺易容時所進行的屬性檢定中。
additionalEntries: The perfect tool for anyone who wants to engage in trickery, a disguise kit enables its owner to adopt a false identity.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: A disguise kit includes cosmetics, hair dye, small props, and a few pieces of clothing.

additionalEntries.name: Deception
entries: In certain cases, a disguise can improve your ability to weave convincing lies.

additionalEntries.name: Intimidation
entries: The right disguise can make you look more fearsome, whether you want to scare someone away by posing as a plague victim or intimidate a gang of thugs by taking the appearance of a bully.

additionalEntries.name: Performance
entries: A cunning disguise can enhance an audience's enjoyment of a performance, provided the disguise is properly designed to evoke the desired reaction.

additionalEntries.name: Persuasion
entries: Folk tend to trust a person in uniform. If you disguise yourself as an authority figure, your efforts to persuade others are often more effective.

additionalEntries.name: Create Disguise
entries: As part of a long rest, you can create a disguise. It takes you 1 minute to don such a disguise once you have created it. You can carry only one such disguise on you at a time without drawing undue attention, unless you have a bag of holding or a similar method to keep them hidden. Each disguise weighs 1 pound.
At other times, it takes 10 minutes to craft a disguise that involves moderate changes to your appearance, and 30 minutes for one that requires more extensive changes.

additionalEntries.caption: Disguise Kit
rows: Cover injuries or distinguishing marks
Spot a disguise being used by someone else
Copy a humanoid's appearance

item.name: Dispelling Stone
entries: This smooth, rainbow-colored, egg-shaped stone can be thrown up to 30 feet and explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere of magical energy on impact, destroying the stone. Any active spell of 5th level or lower in the sphere ends.

item.name: Docent
entries: A docent is a small metal sphere, about 2 inches across, studded with dragonshards. To attune to a docent, you must embed the item somewhere on your body, such as your chest or your eye socket.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: A docent is a sentient item of any alignment with an Intelligence of 16, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 14. It perceives the world through your senses. It communicates telepathically with you and can speak, read, and understand any language it knows (see "Random Properties" below).

entries.name: Life Support
entries: Whenever you end your turn with 0 hit points, the docent can make a Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check with a +6 bonus. If this check succeeds, the docent stabilizes you.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: A docent has the following properties:

{@b Languages}. The docent knows Common, Giant, and {@dice 1d4} additional languages chosen by the DM. If a docent knows fewer than six languages, it can learn a new language after it hears or reads the language through your senses.
{@b Skills}. The docent has a +7 bonus to one of the following skills (roll a {@dice d4}): (1) {@skill Arcana}, (2) {@skill History}, (3) {@skill Investigation}, or (4) {@skill Nature}.

{@b Spells}. The docent knows one of the following spells and can cast it at will, requiring no components (roll a {@dice d6}): (1–2) {@spell 偵測善惡} or (3–6) {@spell 偵測魔法}. The docent decides when to cast the spell.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A docent is designed to advise and assist the warforged it's attached to. One of the simple functions of a docent is to serve as a translator. The docent's properties are under its control, and if you have a bad relationship with your docent, it might refuse to assist you.

item.name: Documancy Satchel
entries: At rank 2, your documancy satchel becomes a common magic item, allowing you to magically send and receive documents to and from Head Office through a special pouch. Your documancy satchel magically produces prewritten and signature-ready contracts at your request, covering most common contractual needs. It also occasionally produces sticky notes printed with useful information and inspirational quotes from Head Office.

entries.name: Satchel of Holding
entries: At rank 3, your documancy satchel gains additional features and becomes an uncommon magic item. One of the satchel's pouches now functions as a {@item bag of holding}.

Additionally, you can use an action to draw forth from the documancy satchel a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell 通曉語言}. The scroll vanishes when used, or ten minutes after it appears. This property of the bag can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Scroll Humidor
entries: At rank 4, your documancy satchel gains additional power and becomes a rare magic item. Within the satchel, a dedicated extradimensional space can hold up to thirty documents or {@item spell scroll||spell scrolls}. Placing a single document into the scroll humidor is an action. Drawing forth a desired scroll is a bonus action.

item.name: Dodecahedron of Doom
entries: This twelve-sided metal die is 12 inches across and bears the numbers 1 through 12 engraved on its pentagonal sides. The dodecahedron contains arcane clockwork mechanisms that whir and click whenever the die is cast.

The dodecahedron can be hurled up to 60 feet as an action. A random magical effect occurs when the die comes to rest after rolling across the ground for at least 10 feet. If an effect requires a target and no eligible target is within range, nothing happens. Spells cast by the dodecahedron require no components. Roll a {@dice d12} and consult the following table to determine the effect:

rows: The dodecahedron explodes and is destroyed. Each creature within 20 feet of the exploding die must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@dice 9d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 光亮術} on itself. The effect lasts until a creature touches the die.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 冷凍射線} (+5 to hit), targeting a random creature within 60 feet of it that doesn't have total cover against the attack.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 電爪} (+5 to hit) on the next creature that touches it.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 黑暗術} on itself. The effect has a duration of 10 minutes.
The next creature to touch the dodecahedron gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points that last for 1 hour.

item.name: Dogsled
entries: An empty sled costs 20 gp, weighs 300 pounds, and has room at the back for one driver.

item.name: Draakhorn
entries: The Draakhorn was a gift from {@creature Tiamat|RoT} in the war between dragons and giants. It was once the horn of her {@creature ancient red dragon} consort, Ephelomon, that she gave to dragonkind to help them in their war against the giants. The Draakhorn is a signaling device, and it is so large that it requires two Medium creatures (or one Large or larger) to hold it while a third creature sounds it, making the earth resonate to its call. The horn has been blasted with fire into a dark ebony hue and is wrapped in bands of bronze with draconic runes that glow with purple eldritch fire.

The low, moaning drone of the Draakhorn discomfits normal animals within a few miles, and it alerts all dragons within two thousand miles to rise and be wary, for great danger is at hand. Coded blasts were once used to signal specific messages. Knowledge of those codes has been lost to the ages.

Those with knowledge of the Draakhorn's history know that it was first built to signal danger to chromatic dragons—a purpose the Cult of the Dragon has corrupted to call chromatic dragons to the Well of Dragons from across the North.

Within 50 feet of any enclosed space where the horn is blown, the air begins to shimmer from the sound. Any character within 20 feet of the entry to the enclosed space must succeed on a DC 12 Strength check to continue pushing against the pressure of the sound. A failure indicates the character can advance no farther toward the entry.

For any character entering the enclosed space, the sound fades to silence—because any creature that enters the enclosed space is temporarily {@condition deafened} and must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. Success indicates the deafness ends 2 minutes after the Draakhorn ceases to sound. Failure indicates the character remains {@condition deafened} for 1 hour after the Draakhorn ceases to sound.

While the horn is sounding, a creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw the first time on a turn the creature enters a 150-foot cone in front of the horn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@dice 6d8}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Draconic Longsword
entries: This longsword has a dragon-shaped hilt. While you carry it, you gain the ability to speak and understand the Draconic language.

item.name: Dragon
entries: Gold coin, half again as large as a {@item nib|wdh} (1 dragon = 100 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Dragon Sensing Longsword
entries: This +1 longsword is made of dragon bone and with a dragon-leather grip. It has rubies in its pommel and hilt. The sword grows warm and the rubies glow slightly when the sword is within 120 feet of a dragon.

item.name: Dragon Thighbone Club
entries: This red dragon's thighbone is 14 feet long, 250 lbs, and is wrapped in old leather, suggesting that it was once used as a giant's greatclub.
When you hit a creature of the dragon type with this weapon, it deals an extra {@dice 2d8} bludgeoning damage.
If you attune to the greatclub, it magically shrinks to a size that you can wield effectively.

item.name: Dragon's Blood
entries: Introduced into Sharn by Daask, dragon's blood is a potent and highly addictive stimulant. In addition to inducing euphoria, it can enhance spellcasting ability or even temporarily imbue a user with the ability to cast sorcerer spells. The drug's effects are potentially dangerous and always unpredictable. This isn't something a player character should want to use; adventurers are more likely to interfere with Daask smugglers or deal with an addict who accidentally casts a {@spell 火球術} in a crowded street. The specific effects of dragon's blood are up to you, but you can take inspiration from the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}.

item.name: 龍棋套組
entries: （譯註：由加里·吉蓋克斯在是1985年推出的西洋棋變體規則，參見{@link 龍棋|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragonchess}。）

item.name: Dragongleam
entries: This spear is enchanted with 10 charges of a {@spell 晝明術} spell for use in twilight or dark forest underbrush. The command phrase is "Tiamat's eyes shine," written in Draconic runes on the spear's crossguard.

item.name: Dragonguard
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

This +1 breastplate has a gold dragon motif worked into its design. Created for a human hero of Neverwinter named Tergon, it grants its wearer advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of creatures that have the dragon type.

item.name: Dragonstaff of Ahghairon
entries: While holding the dragonstaff of Ahghairon, you have advantage on saving throws against the spells and breath weapons of dragons, as well as the breath weapons of other creatures of the dragon type (such as dragon turtles).

A creature of the dragon type that you touch with the staff can move through the city of Waterdeep, ignoring Ahghairon's dragonward (see "Ahghairon's Dragonward," in the Introduction). This effect lasts until the creature is touched again by the staff or until a time you proclaim when you confer the benefit.

The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell 命令術} spell. If you target a dragon with this casting, the dragon has disadvantage on its saving throw. The staff regains {@dice 1d10} charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Dragontooth Dagger
entries: A dagger fashioned from the tooth of a dragon. While the blade is obviously a fang or predator's tooth, the handle is leather wrapped around the root of the tooth, and there is no crossguard.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. On a hit with this weapon, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} acid damage.

entries.name: Draconic Potency
entries: Against enemies of the Cult of the Dragon, the dagger's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to 2, and the extra acid damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.

item.name: 可怖頭盔
entries: 這個令人害怕的鋼鐵頭盔會讓你在穿戴它時使你的雙眼發出紅光。

item.name: Dreamlily
entries: A psychoactive liquid that smells and tastes like your favorite beverage, essence of dreamlily is a Sarlonan opiate. First imported to help manage pain during the Last War, it's now the most commonly abused substance in Sharn. Though dreamlily isn't illegal if used for medicinal purposes, it's heavily taxed, and thus most dreamlily is smuggled in and sold on the black market. Dreamlily dens can be found across the lower wards. Consuming dreamlily causes disorienting euphoria and brings about remarkable resistance to pain. A creature under the effects of dreamlily is {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature is immune to fear, and the first time it drops to 0 hit points without being killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead. A dose of dreamlily costs around 1 gp, or up to ten times that if purchased through legal channels. There are many varieties of the drug, however, and the duration or the price might vary accordingly.

item.name: 漂浮光球
entries: 這個厚玻璃製成的小型球體的重量為1磅。若你距離它60呎內，你可以說出它的命令語並使它發揮出{@spell 光亮術}或{@spell 晝明術}法術。一旦被使用，{@spell 晝明術}的效果直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。
你能夠以一個動作說出另一個命令語，使這個發光球體飛到空中，並漂浮在距離地面不超過5呎的位置。這個球體將以這個方式浮空直到你或另一個生物將它抓住。若你移動離開浮空球體超過60呎的距離，它將跟隨你移動直到它處於距離你60呎內的位置。它將沿著最短路徑以跟隨你移動。若它的移動遭到妨礙，則它將緩緩落到地面並停止活動，且它的光芒將熄滅。

item.name: 卓爾毒藥
entries: 這種毒藥通常只由{@creature 卓爾}精靈製作，且只能在遠離陽光的場所製作而成。受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時。若此豁免檢定的結果與目標值差距5點或更多，則目標在{@condition 中毒}的同時也將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態。該生物將在它受到傷害，或另一個生物使用一個動作將它搖醒時清醒。

item.name: 水溺
entries: 這是一把鋼製三叉戟，在它柄的上部裝飾有青銅藤壺，柄的末端有一顆海綠色的寶石和一個銀色的貝殼。如果它掉到水面上，它會浮在水面上而非沉下去；如果它被留在水下，它會懸浮在原地。三叉戟的觸感總是冰涼的，且它不會因為暴露在水中而受到任何傷害。水溺內部蘊含著{@creature Olhydra|pota|奧莉德拉}——邪惡的水元素女親王——的碎片。
你在使用這把武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。當你用它造成傷害時，目標將會額外受到{@dice 1d8}寒冰傷害。

entries.name: 水元素掌控
entries: 當你持握水溺時，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你能流利地說水族語。
你對寒冷傷害具有抗性。
你可以對{@creature 水元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}(DC 17)。一旦你這麼做，水溺的這個能力直到下次日出前都無法再被使用。

entries.name: 無盡痛苦之淚
entries: 當位於一個水元素節點內時，你可以施展一個名為「無盡痛苦之淚」的儀式，使用水溺來創建一個{@item 毀滅法球(水)|PotA}。一旦你執行了這個儀式，水溺直到下次日出前都不能再被用於施展這個儀式。

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: 水溺會使其持用者變得貪婪。當你與該武器同調時，你獲得以下缺陷：「我要求且理應得到最大份額的戰利品，我拒絕放棄任何屬於我的東西」。此外，如果你與水溺同調並持續了24小時以上，你的皮膚上將會長出藤壺。這些藤壺可以藉由{@spell 高等復原術}法術或類似的魔法移除，但無法在你與該武器同調的狀態下被移除。

item.name: 地城探險家套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 背包|phb}
一根{@item 撬棍|phb}
一把{@item 鐵鎚|phb}
10根{@item 岩釘|phb}
10支{@item 火炬|phb}
一個{@item 打火匣|phb}
10天份的{@item 口糧(1天份)|phb|口糧}
一個{@item 水袋|phb}
{@item 麻繩(50呎)|phb|50呎的麻繩}

item.name: Duplicitous Manuscript
entries: To you, this book is a magical spellbook. To anyone else, the book appears to be a volume of verbose romance fiction. As an action, you can change the book's appearance and alter the plot of the romance.
When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell 幻景}, {@spell 強效幻影}, {@spell 鏡影術}, {@spell 假象術}, {@spell 涅斯圖魔法靈光}, {@spell 魅影之力}, and {@spell 無聲幻影}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the illusion school.

When a creature you can see makes an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern the true nature of an illusion spell you cast, or makes a saving throw against an illusion spell you cast, you can use your reaction and expend 1 charge to impose disadvantage on the roll.

item.name: Duskcrusher
entries: This item takes the form of a leather-wrapped metal rod emblazoned with the symbol of Pelor, the Dawn Father. While grasping the rod, you can use a bonus action to cause a warhammer head of crackling radiance to spring into existence. The warhammer's radiant head emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. You can use an action to make the radiant head disappear.

While the radiant head is active, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and attacks with the weapon deal radiant damage instead of bludgeoning damage. An undead creature hit by the weapon takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.

While you are holding Duskcrusher and its radiant head is active, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 烈日光束} spell (save DC 15) from the weapon, and this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Dust of Deliciousness
entries: This reddish brown dust can be sprinkled over any edible substance to greatly improve the flavor. The dust also dulls the eater's senses: anyone eating food treated with this dust has disadvantage on Wisdom ability checks and Wisdom saving throws for 1 hour. There is enough dust to flavor six servings.

item.name: 無蹤塵
entries: 被裝於袋中，這些粉末是由非常細緻的沙塵所組成。其分量僅足夠一次使用。當你使用一個動作將這些粉塵灑向空中，你和每個距離你10呎內的生物和物體都將變得{@condition 隱形}長達{@dice 2d4}分鐘。其持續時間對所有受影響的目標而言都是相同的，且這些粉塵將在它的魔法發揮效果時被消耗。若一個被這些粉塵影響的生物進行攻擊或施放法術，則該生物的隱形效果將會隨之終止。

item.name: 乾燥塵
entries: 這個小袋中裝有{@dice 1d6+4}搓粉塵。你可以使用一個動作將一搓這些粉塵灑到水面上。這些粉塵將會使15呎邊長立方體的水體轉變成一顆彈珠大小的珠子，並漂浮或停留在粉塵被灑下的位置附近。這個珠子的重量可以忽略不計。
某個生物可以使用一個動作將這顆珠子砸向一片堅硬表面，使這顆珠子粉碎並釋放出這些粉塵所吸收的水份。這麼做將會結束這顆珠子的魔法。
一個身體大部分由水組成的元素生物在暴露於一搓這些粉塵時，必須進行一次DC 13的體質豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 10d6}死靈傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

item.name: 噴嚏窒息塵
entries: 被裝於小型容器中，這些粉末是由非常細緻的沙塵所組成。它看起來就像是{@item 無蹤塵}，且一個{@spell 鑑定術}法術也會顯示這樣的結果。其分量僅足夠一次使用。
當你使用一個動作將一把這些粉塵灑向空中，你和每個距離你30呎內且需要呼吸的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則將因為不停打噴嚏而無法呼吸。一個被這種方式影響的生物將陷入{@condition 無力}狀態並窒息。只要它還意識清醒，該生物就可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。{@spell 次級復原術}法術也可以結束這個效果對一個生物的影響。

item.name: Dust of the Mummy
entries: This poison is created during a mummy's embalming process, distilled from the dead creature's removed organs. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed creature can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell 移除詛咒} spell or similar magic.

item.name: 矮人板甲
entries: 當穿著此護甲時，你的AC獲得+2加值。此外，若一個效果將在違背你的意願的情況下使你沿著地面移動，則你可以使用你的反應以減少你被移動的距離最多10呎。

item.name: 矮人飛錘
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+3加值。它具有投擲屬性，正常射程為20呎，且最大射程為60呎。當你使用這把武器並以一次遠程攻擊命中時，它將造成額外的{@dice 1d8}傷害，或者若目標為一個巨人，則造成額外的{@dice 2d8}傷害。緊接在該攻擊之後，這把武器將會飛回你的手中。

item.name: 炸藥(一根)
entries: 以一個動作，一個生物可以點燃一根炸藥並將它投擲到最多60呎遠的一點。每個距離該點5呎內的生物都必須進行一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 3d6}鈍擊傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。
角色可以將好幾根炸藥綑在一起以讓它們在同時爆炸。每根額外的炸藥都會使傷害增加{@dice 1d6}點（最多至{@dice 10d6}），並使爆炸半徑增加5呎（最遠至20呎）。
炸藥可以透過使用更長的導火線以在一段時間之後引爆，通常延遲1到6輪。為該炸藥骰先攻。在設定的輪數經過之後，該炸藥會在其先攻順序爆炸。

item.name: Dyrrn's Tentacle Whip
entries: This long, whip-like strand of tough muscle bears a sharp stinger at one end. To attune to this symbiotic weapon, you wrap the whip around your wrist for the entire attunement period, during which time the whip painfully embeds its tendrils into your arm.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic whip, but attack rolls made against aberrations with this weapon have disadvantage. A creature hit by this weapon takes an extra {@dice 1d6} psychic damage. When you roll a 20 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll with this weapon, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
As a bonus action, you can sheathe the whip by causing it to retract into your arm, or draw the whip out of your arm again.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The whip can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the whip ends, and it detaches from you.

item.name: Eagle Whistle
entries: While you blow an eagle whistle continuously, you can fly twice as fast as your walking speed. You can blow the whistle continuously for a number of rounds equal to 5 + five times your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 round) or until you talk, hold your breath, or start suffocating. A use of the whistle also ends if you land. If you are aloft when you stop blowing the whistle, you fall. The whistle has three uses. It regains expended uses daily at dawn.

item.name: 助聽耳角
entries: 當將這個號角舉在你的耳邊，它將會抑制{@condition 耳聾}狀態對你的影響，讓你得以如常聽見聲音。

item.name: Earworm
entries: To attune to this symbiont, you must hold it against the skin behind your ear for the entire attunement period, whereupon it burrows into your head and bonds to your skull. While the earworm is inside you, you can speak, read, and write Deep Speech.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The earworm has 4 charges. You can cast the following spells from it, expending the necessary number of charges (spell save DC 15): {@spell 偵測思想} (2 charges) or {@spell 噪音暗語} (1 charge). Each time you use the earworm to cast the {@spell 偵測思想} spell, it sends the information gleaned to the nearest daelkyr, or to the next nearest earworm until it reaches a daelkyr.
The earworm regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The earworm can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the earworm ends, and it exits your body.

item.name: 火巨靈囚瓶
entries: 這個彩繪的黃銅瓶子重1磅。當你使用一個動作以拔除其瓶塞時，一團濃煙將從瓶子中流出。在你的回合結束時，這陣濃煙將隨著一陣無害火焰的閃現而消失，且一個{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將出現在距離你30呎內的一處未被佔據空間。
當這個瓶子第一次被打開時，DM將擲骰隨機決定發生什麼事。

rows: 該{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將攻擊你。在進行5輪的戰鬥之後，{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將會消失，且這個瓶子將失去它的魔力。

該{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將服侍你長達1小時，依照你的命令行事。接著該{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將會返回這個瓶子，且一個新的瓶塞將把它再次封印。這個瓶塞在24小時內都無法被拔除。在這之後二次，當這個瓶子被打開時，將會發生同樣的效果。若這個瓶子被打開第四次，該{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}將逃脫並消失，且這個瓶子將失去它的魔力。
該{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}可以為你施放三次{@spell 祈願術}法術。它會在1小時之後，或當它為你實現最後一個願望時消失，且這個瓶子接著將失去它的魔力。

item.name: 火巨靈鏈甲
entries: 當穿著此護甲時，你的AC獲得+3加值，你免疫於火焰傷害，且你可以理解並說原初語。此外，你可以站立並行走於熔岩上，如同其為固態地表一樣。

item.name: Elder Cartographer's Glossography
entries: When you attain rank 4, you gain a small tome that is an uncommon magic item. The elder cartographer's glossography grants advantage on Intelligence or Wisdom checks related to geographical features or locations.

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo depicts clawlike forms and other jagged shapes.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Magical Strikes
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, your unarmed strikes are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with unarmed strikes.

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: As a bonus action, you can empower the tattoo for 1 minute. For the duration, each of your melee attacks with a weapon or an unarmed strike can reach a target up to 15 feet away from you, as inky tendrils launch toward the target. In addition, your melee attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit. Once used, this bonus action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: This tattoo depicts clawlike forms and other jagged shapes. While the tattoo is on your skin, your unarmed strikes are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with unarmed strikes.

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: As a bonus action, you can empower the tattoo for 1 minute. For the duration, each of your melee weapon attacks can reach a target up to 30 feet away from you, as tendrils of ink launch from your weapon or unarmed strike toward the target. In addition, your melee weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit. Once used, this bonus action can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: 珀金幣(ep)
entries: 一般的貨幣會有數個不同的幣值單位在市面上流通，且其面額會根據鑄造它們所使用的金屬的相對價值來決定。三種最常見的貨幣是金幣(gp)、銀幣(sp)、和銅幣(cp)。
一枚金幣，可以讓一個角色購買一個腰包、50呎的優質繩索、或一頭山羊。一名純熟（但並不傑出）的工匠每天可以賺取一枚金幣。儘管金幣本身並不常被直接使用，但黃金仍然是衡量財富的標準單位。當商人們商談著的交易涉及價值千百金幣的貨物或服務，其交易本身通常不會涉及貨幣的交換。更確切的說，金幣只是衡量價值的標準，而實際交易中使用的則是金條、信用狀、或其他值錢的商品。
一枚金幣值十枚銀幣，銀幣是普通人之間最盛行的貨幣。一枚銀幣可以僱傭一名勞動者工作一整天、購買一扁瓶的燈油、或是在簡陋旅館的一夜休眠。
一枚銀幣值十枚銅幣，銅幣則常見於勞動者和乞丐之間。一枚銅幣能買一根蠟燭、一支火炬、或是一支粉筆。
除此之外，使用其他貴重金屬鑄造的罕見貨幣有時也會出現在寶藏中。珀金幣(ep)和鉑金幣(pp)源自於衰落帝國和失落的王國，且當它們被用於交易時也偶爾會引起猜忌與懷疑。一枚珀金幣價值五枚銀幣，而一枚鉑金幣則價值十枚金幣。
一枚標準貨幣的重量約為三分之一盎司，所以五十枚貨幣重約一磅。

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

Roll a {@dice d4} and consult the Elemental Essence Shards table to determine the shard's essence and property. When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.caption: Elemental Essence Shards
rows: Air
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Air)|TCE}
Earth
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)|TCE}
Fire
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)|TCE}
Water
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Water)|TCE}

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Air)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You can immediately fly up to 60 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You gain resistance to a damage type of your choice until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: One target of the spell that you can see catches fire. The burning target takes {@damage 2d10} fire damage at the start of its next turn, and then the flames go out.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Water)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You create a wave of water that bursts out from you in a 10-foot radius. Each creature of your choice that you can see in that area takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage and must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be pushed 10 feet away from you and fall {@condition prone}.

item.name: 元素寶石，藍寶石
entries: 這顆寶石含有微量的元素能量。當你使用一個動作將這顆寶石打破時，一個{@creature 氣元素}將被召喚，就如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣，且這顆寶石中的魔法將隨之消散。

item.name: 元素寶石，翡翠
entries: 這顆寶石含有微量的元素能量。當你使用一個動作將這顆寶石打破時，一個{@creature 水元素}將被召喚，就如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣，且這顆寶石中的魔法將隨之消散。

item.name: 元素寶石，紅剛玉
entries: 這顆寶石含有微量的元素能量。當你使用一個動作將這顆寶石打破時，一個{@creature 火元素}將被召喚，就如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣，且這顆寶石中的魔法將隨之消散。

item.name: 元素寶石，黃鑽石
entries: 這顆寶石含有微量的元素能量。當你使用一個動作將這顆寶石打破時，一個{@creature 土元素}將被召喚，就如同你施放了{@spell 召喚元素生物}法術一樣，且這顆寶石中的魔法將隨之消散。

item.name: 健康靈藥
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，它將治癒任何折磨你的疾病，並移除{@condition 目盲}、{@condition 耳聾}、{@condition 麻痺}、和{@condition 中毒}狀態。這瓶清澈的紅色液體中有著發光的微小氣泡。

item.name: 精靈鏈甲
entries: 你在穿著此護甲時AC獲得+1加值。即使你不熟練於中甲，你仍被視作熟練於這個護甲。

rows: A small notebook that causes anything written in it to disappear after 1 hour
A crystal lens made of ivory and gold that causes anything observed through it to appear to be surrounded by motes of multicolored light
A small golden pyramid inscribed with elven symbols and about the size of a walnut
A cloak pin made from enamel in the shape of a butterfly; when you take the pin off, it turns into a real butterfly, and returns when you are ready to put your cloak back on again
A golden compass that points toward the nearest portal to the Feywild within 10 miles
A small silver spinning top that, when spun, endlessly spins until interrupted
A small songbird made of enamel, gold wire, and precious stone; uttering the songbird's name in Elvish causes the trinket to emit that bird's birdsong
A small enamel flower that, when put in one's hair, animates, tying back the wearer's hair with a living vine with flowers; plucking a single flower from this vine returns it to its inanimate form

item.name: 鑲有珠寶片的繡花絲綢手套
item.ENG_name: Embroidered glove set with jewel chips

item.name: 繡花絲綢和天鵝絨編織並鑲有許多月長石的披風
item.ENG_name: Embroidered silk and velvet mantle set with numerous moonstones

item.name: 綠寶石
entries: 深翠綠色的透光寶石。

entries.items: One card in this deck is enchanted to appear as whatever specific card its owner commands. This magic works only 25 percent of the time, but the deck is worth 500 gp to any serious gambler who doesn't mind the risk—or who isn't told about it.

item.name: 不朽法術書
entries: 這本法術書，以及任何被寫在其書頁上的內容，都不會因為火焰或浸泡於水中而被傷害。此外，這本法術書不會隨著時間而磨損衰敗。

item.name: 表演家套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 背包|phb}
一個{@item 睡袋|phb}
2套{@item 戲服|phb}
5根{@item 蠟燭|phb}
5天份的{@item 口糧(1天份)|phb|口糧}
一個{@item 水袋|phb}
一套{@item 易容工具組|phb}

item.name: Ephixis, Bow of Nylea
entries: Nylea wields the shortbow Ephixis, the bow whose arrows herald the turning of the seasons. Nylea is quick to let her favored followers borrow her bow, particularly when they intend to use it to perform great deeds, put an end to foul creatures, or cast down the arrogant.

entries.name: Bow of the Wild
entries: This divine weapon includes a shortbow and a quiver with four arrows, each tied to one of the four seasons. You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this bow, and you suffer no disadvantage when attacking at the weapon's long range. Additionally, Ephixis scores a critical hit on a {@dice d20} roll of 19 or 20.

entries.name: Blessing of the Wild
entries: If you are a worshiper of Nylea, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Nylea, the bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Arrows of the Seasons
entries: The four arrows—each associated with a season—that accompany this bow can be fired only from it. Each arrow disappears immediately after it's used, and it reappears in the quiver at the next dusk. The save DC against spells cast with the arrows is 18. Each arrow has a unique property:

entries.name: Spring
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow, targeting a beast or a plant creature you can see within 320 feet of you. On a hit, the arrow deals no damage, and the target gains the benefits of the {@spell 啟蒙術} spell for 8 hours.

entries.name: Summer
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at an unoccupied space on the ground that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required. A Nyxborn lynx is summoned in that space (use the stat block for a {@creature tiger} with the {@book Nyxborn traits|MOT|6|Nyxborn Creatures} from chapter 6). The lynx understands your verbal commands and obeys them as best it can, and it takes its turns immediately after yours. The emissary remains for 1 hour before fading away.

entries.name: Autumn
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at a space on the ground that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell 棘牆術} spell there.

entries.name: Winter
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at a space that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell 冰風暴} spell there.

entries.name: Destroying the Bow
entries: The bow can't be destroyed without first destroying all its arrows. The winter arrow must be fed to a cerberus on the winter solstice. The spring arrow must be planted at the base of a Black Oak of Asphodel on the spring equinox. The summer arrow must be broken by a sea giant on the summer solstice. Then the autumn arrow must be shot into the carcass of a hydra on the autumnal equinox. When all four arrows are destroyed, the bow and quiver dissolve into dust.

item.name: 人造義眼
entries: 這個人造眼球可以代替一顆失去或被移除的真正的眼球。當人造義眼鑲嵌在你的眼眶中，它就不會被除了你以外的人給移除，且你可以透過這個微型球體看見事物，就如同它是正常的眼睛一樣。

item.name: 乙太香精
entries: 受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達8小時。陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態的生物同時也將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態。該生物將在它受到傷害，或另一個生物使用一個動作將它搖醒時清醒。

item.name: Everbright Lantern
entries: This bullseye lantern contains an Eberron dragonshard that sheds light comparable to that produced by a {@spell 不滅明焰} spell. An everbright lantern sheds light in a 120-foot cone; the closest 60 feet is bright light, and the farthest 60 feet is dim light.

item.name: 無盡煙壺
entries: 煙霧會從這個黃銅瓶被鉛製瓶塞堵住瓶口滲出，且其重量為1磅。當你使用一個動作拔除該瓶塞時，一團厚重的煙霧雲團將從中湧出，並蔓延至瓶子周圍60呎半徑的範圍。這團煙霧籠罩的範圍被重度遮蔽。當這個瓶子在煙霧中且保持開啟，則每過1分鐘，煙霧的半徑就會再增加10呎，直至其達到最大120呎半徑。
只要這個瓶子保持開啟，這團煙霧就會持續存在。關上這個瓶子需要你以一個動作說出它的命令語。一旦這個瓶子被關上，這團煙霧將在10分鐘之後消失。一陣和風（時速11到20哩）可以在1分鐘之後將這團煙霧吹散，而一陣強風（時速21哩或更高）可以在1輪後將其吹散。

item.name: 異種鞍座
entries: 異種鞍座是騎乘任何水生或飛行坐騎的必要品。

item.name: Explosive Seed
entries: This acorn-sized sphere of brass contains a small amount of blasting powder and a clockwork trigger. An explosive seed can be thrown up to 30 feet as an action, detonating on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding seed must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: 眼狀瑪瑙
entries: 灰色、白色、棕色、藍色、或綠色的半透明圓形寶石。

item.name: Eye of Vecna
entries: Seldom is the name of Vecna spoken except in a hushed voice. Vecna was, in his time, one of the mightiest of all wizards. Through dark magic and conquest, he forged a terrible empire. For all his power, Vecna couldn't escape his own mortality. He began to fear death and take steps to prevent his end from ever coming about.

{@creature Orcus|MTF}, the demon prince of undeath, taught Vecna a ritual that would allow him to live on as a {@creature lich}. Beyond death, he became the greatest of all liches. Even though his body gradually withered and decayed, Vecna continued to expand his evil dominion. So formidable and hideous was his temper that his subjects feared to speak his name. He was the Whispered One, the Master of the Spider Throne, the Undying King, and the Lord of the Rotted Tower.

Some say that Vecna's lieutenant Kas coveted the Spider Throne for himself, or that the sword his lord made for him seduced him into rebellion. Whatever the reason, Kas brought the Undying King's rule to an end in a terrible battle that left Vecna's tower a heap of ash. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly artifacts that still seek to work the Whispered One's will in the world.

The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a mummified and shriveled left extremity.

To attune to the eye, you must gouge out your own eye and press the artifact into the empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. Once in place, the eye transforms into a golden eye with a slit for a pupil, much like that of a cat. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

To attune to the hand, you must lop off your left hand at the wrist and the press the artifact against the stump. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} each have the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Eye
entries: Your alignment changes to neutral evil, and you gain the following benefits:

items: You have {@sense truesight}.
You can use an action to see as if you were wearing a {@item ring of X-ray vision}. You can end this effect as a bonus action.

The eye has 8 charges. You can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 銳眼術} (2 charges), {@spell 瘋狂冠冕} (1 charge), {@spell 解離術} (4 charges), {@spell 支配怪物} (5 charges), or {@spell 攝心目光} (4 charges). The eye regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Each time you cast a spell from the eye, there is a {@chance 5} chance that Vecna tears your soul from your body, devours it, and then takes control of the body like a puppet. If that happens, you become an NPC under the DM's control.

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: If you are attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

items: You are immune to disease and poison.
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition exhaustion}.
You experience premonitions of danger and, unless you are {@condition incapacitated}, can't be surprised.
If you start your turn with at least 1 hit point, you regain {@dice 1d10} hit points.

If a creature has a skeleton, you can attempt to turn its bones to jelly with a touch of the {@item Hand of Vecna}. You can do so by using an action to make a melee attack against a creature you can reach, using your choice of your melee attack bonus for weapons or spells. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
You can use an action to cast {@spell 祈願術}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: If the Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} are both attached to the same creature, and that creature is slain by the {@item Sword of Kas}, both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed forever. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the artifact reappears in one of Vecna's many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.

item.name: 鑲有藍寶石和月長石的單邊眼罩
item.ENG_name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone

item.name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone (Brazen Coalition)
魅惑鏡片
entries: 這對水晶鏡片適合被穿戴在眼睛上。它們含有3發充能。當穿戴它們時，只要你與一個距離你30呎內的類人生物可以看見彼此，你就能夠以一個動作消耗1發充能以對該目標施放{@spell 魅惑人類}法術（豁免DC 13）。這對鏡片會在每天日出時恢復所有以消耗的充能。

item.name: 微視鏡片
entries: 這對水晶鏡片適合被穿戴在眼睛上。當穿戴它們時，你可以更清晰地看見1呎範圍內的事物。在這個範圍內，當你在搜尋區域或研究一個物體時，你將在依賴於視覺的智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定中具有優勢。

item.name: 鷹眼鏡片
entries: 這對水晶鏡片適合被穿戴在眼睛上。當穿戴它們時，你在依賴於視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。在有著清晰視野的情況下，你可以分辨出位於極遠距離，最小2呎寬的生物和物體的細節。

item.name: Failed Experiment Wand
entries: This wand has 2 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast either a green-flamed {@spell 火球術} or a blue {@spell 閃電束} at random from it (save DC 15).
For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Falkir's Helm of Pigheadedness
entries: This steel helm is shaped like the head of a boar. Once you don the helm, it can't be removed until you die or until a {@spell 移除詛咒} spell or similar magic is cast on it. If you wear the helm and are a humanoid, you gain the following flaw until the helm is removed: "I'm exceedingly stubborn and think I'm right all the time." (This flaw supersedes any conflicting flaw.)

item.name: Fane-Eater
item.reqAttune: by an evil cleric or paladin
entries: Fane-Eater is a battleaxe belonging to {@creature Arkhan the Cruel|BGDIA}.

You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls with Fane-Eater. If you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra {@dice 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken.

item.name: Far Gear
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Charisma saving throws, and you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

entries.name: Aberrant Ally
entries: You can conjure an aberrant creature from the chaos of the multiverse to serve you. This functions as the {@spell 召喚天界生物} spell (no concentration required), except the creature you summon is an aberration of challenge rating 4 or lower. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Unnatural Bane
entries: You can cast the {@spell 災禍術} spell (save DC 15), which affects any number of creatures within range for 1 minute. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: Far Realm Shard
entries: This writhing crystal is steeped in the warped essence of the Far Realm. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can cause a slimy tentacle to rip through the fabric of reality and strike one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC or take {@damage 3d6} psychic damage and become {@condition frightened} of you until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Feather of Diatryma Summoning
entries: This bright plume is made from the feather of a {@creature diatryma|wdh} (pronounced dee-ah-TRY-mah), a Large, colorful, flightless bird native to the Underdark. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the feather into a Large unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you, the feather becomes a living diatryma for up to 6 hours, after which it reverts to its feather form. It reverts to feather form early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching the bird.
When the diatryma reverts to feather form, the magic of the feather can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

The diatryma uses the statistics of an {@creature axe beak}, except that its beak deals piercing damage instead of slashing damage. The creature is friendly to you and your companions, and it can be used as a mount. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the diatryma defends itself but takes no other actions.

item.name: Feather Token
entries: This small metal disk is inscribed with the image of a feather. When you fall at least 20 feet while the token is on your person, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling. The token's magic is expended after you land, whereupon the disk becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Feathered mantle with emerald clasp (Sun Empire)
Feywild Shard
entries: This warm crystal glints with the sunset colors of the Feywild sky and evokes whispers of emotional memory. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}. If the result is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamagic, and if it normally requires concentration, it doesn't require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.
If you don't have the Wild Magic Sorcerous Origin, once this property is used to roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 異能塑像，青銅獅鷲
entries: 異能塑像為一尊小到剛好可以塞進口袋的野獸雕像。若你使用一個動作說出它的命令語，並將塑像丟到距離你60呎內地面上的一點，該塑像將會變成一隻活生生的生物。若該生物將要出現的空間已經被其他生物或物體給佔據，或者若該空間不足以容納該生物，則這個塑像將不會變成生物。
該生物對你和你的同伴友善。它將理解你的語言並服從你所說的命令。若你不對它們交代任何指令，則它們將在面對敵對生物時自我防衛，除此之外不採取其他動作。
該生物存在的持續時間根據塑像類型而有所不同。在其持續時間結束時，該生物將變回它的塑像型態。它會在生命值歸零、或你在觸碰它的同時使用一個動作再次說出它的命令語時提前恢復塑像型態。當該生物重新變回塑像時，它的這個特性直到特定時間經過之前都不能再被使用。其重置時間根據塑像類型而有所不同。
{@creature 獅鷲|mm|青銅獅鷲}.
這尊青銅雕像呈現出一隻張牙舞爪的獅鷲。它可以變成一個{@creature 獅鷲}最多長達6小時，且它直到經過5天之前都不能再被使用。

{@creature 騎用馬|mm|象牙旅行山羊}.
{@creature 巨山羊|mm|象牙苦力山羊}.
{@creature 巨山羊|mm|象牙驚駭山羊}.
這幾尊山羊外型的象牙雕像總是三個一組被製造。這些山羊各自都有著獨特的外觀和不同的功能。它們的特性如下所述：

items: 旅行山羊可以變成一個大型的山羊，使用與{@creature 騎用馬}相同的數據。它含有24發充能，且它處於野獸型態時每經過小時或不足一小時都將消耗1發充能。只要它還含有充能．你就可以隨意的使用它。當它的充能被耗盡，它將變回一尊雕像且直到經過7天，它恢復它所有的充能之前都不能再被使用。
苦力山羊可以變成一個{@creature 巨山羊}最多長達3小時。一旦被使用，則它直到經過30天之前都不能再被使用。

驚駭山羊可以變成一個{@creature 巨山羊}最多長達3小時。這個山羊不能攻擊，但你可以移除它的羊角並將它們做為武器使用。其中一根羊角將變成一把{@item 騎槍+1}，而另一根將變成一把{@item 長劍+2}。將一根羊角移除需要花費一個動作，且當這個山羊回復其塑像型態時，該武器將會消失且山羊角將恢復原狀。此外，當你騎乘牠時，這個山羊將散發出30呎半徑的恐懼靈光。任何與你敵對，且在該區域中開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的睿知豁免，否則將因該山羊而陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘，或直到該山羊回復其塑像型態。陷入{@condition 恐懼}的生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，若豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。一旦它成功對抗這個效果，該生物將免疫於這個山羊的恐懼靈光長達24小時。一旦這尊雕像被使用，則它直到經過15天之前都不能再被使用。

這尊大理石雕像的長度和高度大約4吋。它可以變成一個{@creature 象}最多長達24小時。一旦被使用，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
item.ENG_name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant

item.name: 異能塑像，黑曜石駒
entries: 異能塑像為一尊小到剛好可以塞進口袋的野獸雕像。若你使用一個動作說出它的命令語，並將塑像丟到距離你60呎內地面上的一點，該塑像將會變成一隻活生生的生物。若該生物將要出現的空間已經被其他生物或物體給佔據，或者若該空間不足以容納該生物，則這個塑像將不會變成生物。
該生物對你和你的同伴友善。它將理解你的語言並服從你所說的命令。若你不對它們交代任何指令，則它們將在面對敵對生物時自我防衛，除此之外不採取其他動作。
該生物存在的持續時間根據塑像類型而有所不同。在其持續時間結束時，該生物將變回它的塑像型態。它會在生命值歸零、或你在觸碰它的同時使用一個動作再次說出它的命令語時提前恢復塑像型態。當該生物重新變回塑像時，它的這個特性直到特定時間經過之前都不能再被使用。其重置時間根據塑像類型而有所不同。
{@creature 夢魘|mm|黑曜石駒}.
這尊光滑的黑曜石馬可以變成一個{@creature 夢魘}最多長達24小時。這個{@creature 夢魘}只會為了自我防衛而戰鬥。一旦被使用，則它直到經過5天之前都不能再被使用。
若你為善良陣營，則這尊塑像在你每次使用它的時候都有{@chance 10}％的機率會無視你的命令，包括變回它的塑像型態。若你在這個{@creature 夢魘}無視你命令的時候騎乘牠，你和{@creature 夢魘}都將在瞬間被傳送到哈迪斯(Hades)位面中的一個隨機位置，而{@creature 夢魘}也將在該處變回塑像型態。
item.ENG_name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Obsidian Steed

item.name: 異能塑像，瑪瑙犬

{@creature 獒犬|mm|瑪瑙犬}.
這尊犬外型的瑪瑙雕像可以變成一個{@creature 獒犬}最多長達6小時。這個{@creature 獒犬}具有8點智力值且可以說通用語。牠也具有60呎的黑暗視覺，且可以看見任何該範圍內的{@condition 隱形}生物和物體。一旦被使用，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
item.ENG_name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Onyx Dog

{@creature 巨貓頭鷹|mm|蛇紋石貓頭鷹}.
這尊貓頭鷹外型的蛇紋石雕像可以變成一個{@creature 巨貓頭鷹}最多長達8小時。一旦被使用，則它直到經過2天之前都不能再被使用。若你和這個貓頭鷹處於相同的存在位面，則它可以在任何距離下與你透過心靈感應溝通。
item.ENG_name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Serpentine Owl

{@creature 渡鴉|mm|白銀渡鴉}.
這尊渡鴉外型的白銀雕像可以變成一個{@creature 渡鴉}長達最多12小時。一旦被使用，則它直到經過2天之前都不能再被使用。當處於渡鴉型態，這尊雕像將允許你對它隨意施放{@spell 動物信使}法術。
item.ENG_name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven

item.name: Finder's Goggles
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Finding
entries: The lenses of these garish goggles are carved from Siberys dragonshards. While wearing these lenses, you gain the following benefits:

items: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the check.

As an action, you can use the goggles to examine an object to identify the aura of the last creature that touched it. Make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a DC of 13 + the number of days since the last contact occurred. On a success, you learn the creature's type and can immediately use the goggles to cast {@spell 生物定位術} to find that creature. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 鑲有火蛋白石的純金鍊條
item.ENG_name: Fine gold chain set with a fire opal

item.name: Fine gold chain with fire opals (Legion of Dusk)
Fine robe with dinosaur feathers and silver embroidery (Sun Empire)
Fine steel rapier with gold filigree hilt (Legion of Dusk)
Fire Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: 火蛋白石
entries: 火紅色的透光寶石。

item.name: 釣魚用具
entries: 這套工具組包括了一根木質長竿、絲綢線、栓木浮標、鐵鉤、鉛墜、羽絨釣餌、以及細網。

item.name: Flame Tongue Shortsword of Greed
entries: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra {@dice 2d6} fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.
While you are attuned to this sword you can use an action to mentally command it to detect gems and jewels. You learn the kind and number of such objects within 60 feet of the sword.

item.name: 扁瓶
entries: 一個扁瓶可以容納1品脫的液體。

item.name: Flensing Claws (Huge)
entries: Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one melee weapon attack with the claws. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Strength modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Strength modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws.
