The spinning, whirring, and clicking accelerates as the distance to the target lessens, reaching maximum velocity and volume when a nimblewright other than Nim is within 30 feet of the device.

item.name: 諾澤爾的驚奇顏料
entries: 這些顏料通常會被發現於{@dice 1d4}個罐子內，並被與一支畫筆一起裝在一個精美的木製盒子內（總重1磅）。這些顏料讓你能夠藉由使用它們在二次元平面上繪畫以創造出三次元的物體。當你專注於你所想物體的形象時，顏料將從筆刷流繪而出，並形成該物體。
每罐顏料都足以覆蓋一個1,000平方呎的表面，並讓你創造出最大10,000立方呎的無生命物體或地形特徵，例如一扇門、一個坑洞、花朵、樹木、隔間、房室、或是武器。繪製100平方呎的東西將會花費10分鐘的時間。
當你完成一次繪畫時，你所描繪的物體或地形特徵將會變為真實、非魔法的物體。因此繪製在牆上的門將會創造出一扇真正的門，並可以被正常打開並被通過。繪製在地板上的坑洞將會創造出一個真實的坑洞，且其深度將被計入你創造物體的空間總體積中。
藉由這些顏料所創造的事物無法具有超過25金幣的價值。若你繪製一件有著在這支上價值的物體（例如鑽石或金塊），則儘管該物體看起來真實可信，但仔細觀察便會揭露它是由石膏、骨頭、或其他不值錢的材料所製成。
若你繪製出某種形式的能量（像是火焰或閃電），則其能量將會在你完成繪製的那一瞬間出現並立刻消散，且不會對任何事物造成傷害。

item.name: 誓仇弓
entries: 當你將箭搭在這把弓上時，它將以精靈語悄聲低語：「速殲我敵。」當你使用這把武器以進行一次遠程攻擊，你可以做為命令語誦唸：「速亡負我之人。」直到它死亡、或直到七日後的日出之前，你所攻擊的目標將成為你的仇敵。你同時只能擁有一個這樣的仇敵。當你的仇敵死亡，你可以在下次日出之後再選擇一個新的仇敵。
當你使用這把武器對你的仇敵進行一次遠程攻擊檢定，你在該檢定中具有優勢。此外，你的目標將無法得益於全掩護以外的掩護，且你不會因為長射程而承受劣勢。若該攻擊命中，你的仇敵將受到額外的{@dice 3d6}穿刺傷害。
只要你的仇敵仍然活著，你將在使用所有其他武器的攻擊檢定中具有劣勢。

item.name: 黑曜石
entries: 黑色的不透光寶石。

item.name: Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to poison damage while you wear this armor. In addition, you gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on yourself.

item.name: 鑲有金飾和嵌物的黑曜石雕像
item.ENG_name: Obsidian statuette with gold fittings and inlay

item.name: Obviator's Lenses
entries: Also at rank 2, you gain the use of an uncommon magic item taking the form of a pair of spectacles, a spyglass, a monocle, or any other device with one or two lenses. When you look through the obviator's lenses, you use a bonus action to make them function as {@item eyes of minute seeing} or {@item eyes of the eagle}. Once you make this choice, it cannot be changed until the next dawn.

entries.name: Enhanced Lenses
entries: At rank 4, your obviator's lenses gain additional power and become a rare magic item. The lenses now function as both {@item eyes of the eagle} and {@item eyes of minute seeing}.

Additionally, you can focus the power of the lenses to gain accuracy in combat, gaining advantage on a weapon attack roll (no action required). If that attack hits, roll one additional weapon damage die. This property of the lenses can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Occultant Abacus
entries: Head office grants you the use of a unique item known as an occultant abacus (sometimes just referred to as an occultant), whose beads resemble tiny skulls.

entries.name: Read the Kill
entries: Also at rank 1, your occultant abacus not only tracks your franchise's kills, it helps you determine the impact of those kills on the franchise's fate. Over a period of 1 minute, you can study a creature killed by someone in your franchise within the last 24 hours, then grant the character who slew it a {@dice d10}. Once within the next hour, that character can add the {@dice d10} to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. If it's not clear who administered the killing blow, you grant this benefit to a random creature involved in the fight. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

rows: Using a tiny bellows to pump one last breath into a corpse.
Reading the entrails with special reading-the-entrails glasses.
Burning a small piece of the body and looking for shapes in the smoke.
A cautious, reasoned, professional guesstimate.
Careful measurements. The distance between nostrils. The difference between the index finger and the middle finger. The elasticity of the ear lobe.
You take a long, careful look, and then decide based on which fellow franchisee has been nice to you lately.

entries.name: Eldritch Occultant
entries: Starting at rank 2, your occultant abacus becomes an uncommon magic item that can track lives both eliminated and saved. While holding your occultant abacus within 5 feet of a creature killed within the past 24 hours, you can cast the {@spell 卜筮} spell. The course of action you inquire about with the spell does not need to have any connection to the dead creature. This property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Bring Out Your Dead
entries: Also at rank 2, you regain the use of your Read the Kill feature after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Bead of Instant Karma
entries: At rank 3, one of the beads on your occultant abacus channels the power of instant karma, turning the occultant abacus into a rare magic item. As a reaction, you can target one creature you can see that is about to attempt an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, either granting advantage or imposing disadvantage on the roll. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Bead of Diverted Karma
entries: At rank 4, one of the beads on your occultant abacus allows you to divert karma to where it's needed, turning the occultant abacus into a very rare magic item. While the bead is unused, you know automatically when any creature you can see is about to make an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with disadvantage. When such a roll is made, you can use a reaction to grant a {@dice d10} to a different creature you can see. That creature can add the {@dice d10} to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next minute. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Correct the Balance
entries: As a rank 4 occultant, you learn that sometimes the death of a creature has unintended consequences. Within seven days of a creature's death, you can use your occultant abacus to divine ways to reverse or mitigate events resulting from that death. As an action, make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check. On a success, you learn the relevant information based on the nature of the creature and its place in the world.
If you fail the check, this property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn. If you succeed on the check, this property can't be used again until dawn seven days later.

item.name: 燈油(扁瓶裝)
entries: 燈油通常以可以容納1品脫的陶製扁瓶販售。以一個動作，你可以將燈油潑在一個距離你5呎內的生物上、或投擲它最遠20呎，讓它在衝擊中破碎。對一個目標生物或物體進行一次遠程攻擊，將燈油視作臨時武器。若命中，目標被燈油覆蓋。若目標在燈油乾涸之前（約1分鐘）受到任何火焰傷害，則目標將因燃燒的燈油而受到額外的5點火焰傷害。你也可以將扁瓶中的燈油倒在地面，只要該表面為平面，燈油將可以覆蓋一塊5呎平方的區域。若被點燃，則燈油將燃燒持續2輪，並對任何進入該區域或在該區域結束它回合的生物造成5點火焰傷害。一個生物每回合只會受到此傷害一次。

item.name: 乙太化之油
entries: 這瓶混濁的灰色油珠會在容器外成形並迅速蒸發。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一個體型為中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和攜帶的裝備（體型每比中型大一級，就需要再額外使用一瓶）。塗抹乙太化之油需要花費10分鐘的時間。被影響的生物將獲得{@spell 跨入乙太界}法術的效果，持續1小時。

item.name: 鋒銳之油
entries: 這瓶透明的膠狀油中閃爍著微小、極細的銀色碎片。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一把劈砍或穿刺武器、或最多5發劈砍或穿刺彈藥。塗抹這瓶油膏需要花費1分鐘的時間。持續1小時，被塗抹的物品將變為魔法物品，且在攻擊檢定和傷害骰中具有+3加值。

item.name: 滑溜之油
entries: 這瓶黏稠的黑色油膏在容器內顯得厚實而沉重，但在傾倒時卻會輕快的流動。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一個體型為中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和攜帶的裝備（體型每比中型大一級，就需要再額外使用一瓶）。塗抹這瓶油膏需要花費10分鐘的時間。被影響的生物將獲得{@spell 行動自如術}法術的效果，持續8小時。
或者，這瓶油膏能夠以一個動作被倒在地上，覆蓋一片10呎平方的區塊，並在該區域內複製{@spell 油膩術}法術的效果，持續8小時。

item.name: 腐精油
entries: 受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達24小時。陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態的生物同時也將陷入{@condition 昏迷}狀態。該生物將在它受到傷害時清醒。

item.name: Olisuba Leaf
entries: These dried leaves of the Olisuba tree, when steeped to make a tea, can help a body recover from strenuous activity. If you drink a dose of Olisuba tea during a long rest, your {@condition exhaustion} level is reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of that long rest.

item.name: 縞瑪瑙
entries: 黑白相間、純黑、或純白的不透光寶石。

item.name: 蛋白石
entries: 帶綠和金點的淡藍色透光寶石。

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild (fire) rune shimmers within its core, causing it to be slightly warm to the touch. The opal has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Ignite
entries: As an action, you can ignite an object within 10 feet of you. The object must be flammable, and the fire starts in a circle no larger than 1 foot in diameter.

entries.name: Fires Friend
entries: You have resistance to cold damage.

entries.name: Fire Tamer
entries: As an action, you can extinguish any open flame within 10 feet of you. You choose how much fire to extinguish in that radius.

entries.name: Gift of Flame
entries: You can transfer the opal's magic to a nonmagical item—a weapon or a suit of armor—by tracing the ild rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the opal is destroyed, and the rune appears in red on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Weapon.
items.entry: The weapon is now an uncommon magic weapon. It deals an extra {@dice 1d6} fire damage to any target it hits.

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. You have resistance to cold damage while wearing the armor.

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild rune—the rune of fire—shimmers within its core. Grasping this object causes a split second of searing, fiery pain to pass through you. That pain quickly fades, giving way to a warming glow.

entries.name: Ignite (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the ild rune using ash onto a flammable object. That object immediately bursts into flame. While it burns, the fire extends 1 foot out from the rune you scribed.

entries.name: Fire Tamer (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you touch an open flame and scribe the ild rune within it with a hand motion. This causes the flame to immediately extinguish. For a large blaze, the fire is extinguished in a 10-foot radius around you. You can extend this distance by expending a spell slot when using the ild rune in this manner. The radius extends by 20 feet per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Fire's Friend (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you have resistance to cold damage.

entries.name: Combustion (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune using ash onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature automatically takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage plus {@damage 1d10} fire damage per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Flame Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using ash onto a melee or ranged weapon, or onto up to 20 pieces of ammunition. The weapon or ammunition gains a ghostly aura of yellow flame and deals fire damage instead of piercing, slashing, or bludgeoning damage.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon or ammunition a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Flame Stoker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, your fire attacks are deadlier. Whenever you roll fire damage from an attack or a spell you cast, you can reroll that damage and use the higher result.

item.name: 方向寶珠
entries: 當持握這個寶珠時，你可以使用一個動作以得知哪個方向是北邊。這個特性只會在物質位面發揮效果。

item.name: Orb of Dragonkind
entries: Ages past, on the world of Krynn, elves and humans waged a terrible war against evil dragons. When the world seemed doomed, the wizards of the Towers of High Sorcery came together and worked their greatest magic, forging five Orbs of Dragonkind (or Dragon Orbs) to help them defeat the dragons. One orb was taken to each of the five towers, and there they were used to speed the war toward a victorious end. The wizards used the orbs to lure dragons to them, then destroyed the dragons with powerful magic.

As the Towers of High Sorcery fell in later ages, the orbs were destroyed or faded into legend, and only three are thought to survive. Their magic has been warped and twisted over the centuries, so although their primary purpose of calling dragons still functions, they also allow some measure of control over dragons.
Each orb contains the essence of an evil dragon, a presence that resents any attempt to coax magic from it. Those lacking in force of personality might find themselves enslaved to an orb.
An orb is an etched crystal globe about 10 inches in diameter. When used, it grows to about 20 inches in diameter, and mist swirls inside it.

While attuned to an orb, you can use an action to peer into the orb's depths and speak its command word. You must then make a DC 15 Charisma check. On a successful check, you control the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it. On a failed check, you become {@condition charmed} by the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it.

While you are {@condition charmed} by the orb, you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it, and the orb casts {@spell 暗示術} on you at will (save DC 18), urging you to work toward the evil ends it desires. The dragon essence within the orb might want many things: the annihilation of a particular people, freedom from the orb, to spread suffering in the world, to advance the worship of Takhisis ({@creature Tiamat|RoT|Tiamat's} name on Krynn), or something else the DM decides.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: An Orb of Dragon kind has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries.name: Spells
entries: The orb has 7 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you control the orb, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 治療傷勢} (5th-level version, 3 charges), {@spell 晝明術} (1 charge), {@spell 防死護咒} (2 charges), or {@spell 探知} (3 charges). You can also use an action to cast the {@spell 偵測魔法} spell from the orb without using any charges.

entries.name: Call Dragons
entries: While you control the orb, you can use an action to cause the artifact to issue a telepathic call that extends in all directions for 40 miles. Evil dragons in range feel compelled to come to the orb as soon as possible by the most direct route. Dragon deities such as {@creature Tiamat|RoT} are unaffected by this call. Dragons drawn to the orb might be hostile toward you for compelling them against their will. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again for 1 hour.

entries.name: Destroying an Orb
entries: An Orb of Dragonkind appears fragile but is impervious to most damage, including the attacks and breath weapons of dragons. A {@spell 解離術} spell or one good hit from a +3 magic weapon is sufficient to destroy an orb, however.

item.name: Orb of Gonging
entries: This common wondrous item is a hollow, 5-inch-diameter orb that weighs 5 pounds. Its outer shell is composed of notched bronze rings, which can be turned so that the notches line up. Aligning the notches requires an action, and doing so causes the orb to gong loudly until the notches are no longer aligned. The sounds are spaced 6 seconds apart and can be heard out to a range of 600 feet.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This orb of granite is about the size of an adult human's fist. The stein (stone) rune appears on it in the form of crystalline veins that run across the surface. The orb has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Indomitable Stand
entries: As an action, you can channel the orb's magic to hold your ground. For the next minute or until you move any distance, you have advantage on all checks and saving throws to resist effects that force you to move. In addition, any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be unable to move any farther this turn.

entries.name: Stone Soul
entries: You can't be {@condition petrified}.

entries.name: Earthen Step
entries: You can cast {@spell 融身入石} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Stone
entries: You can transfer the orb's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a pair of boots—by tracing the stein rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the orb is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Shield.
items.entry: The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While you wield it, you have resistance to all damage dealt by ranged weapon attacks.

items.name: Boots.
items.entry: The pair of boots is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. While you wear the boots, you have advantage on Strength saving throws, and you can use your reaction to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This spherical chunk of granite is about the size of a human fist. The stein rune—the rune of stone—appears on the orb as crystalline veins that play across its surface. When first grasped, the stone feels impossibly heavy, as if even a titan could not lift it. That feeling passes after a moment, allowing you to carry the stone with ease.

entries.name: Indomitable Stand (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the stein rune onto the ground at your feet. Until you move, you have advantage on all ability checks and saving throws to resist effects that would force you to move. In addition, any creature that moves within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have its movement immediately end.

entries.name: Stone Soul (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot be {@condition petrified}.

entries.name: Stone's Secrets (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune onto a stone wall or floor. You learn the location and size of all creatures standing on or touching that surface within 30 feet of you, though only for the moment when the property is used.

entries.name: Crushing Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using dirt or crushed stone onto one weapon that deals bludgeoning damage. The weapon gains a ghostly brown aura, and bludgeoning damage dealt by the weapon ignores resistance and immunity. If you roll the maximum on the weapon's damage die or dice, the target of your attack is knocked {@condition prone} if it is a creature.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Earthen Step (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast meld into stone as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

entries.name: Overwhelming Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune using dirt or crushed rock onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 12 + the level of the expended spell slot). On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage per level of the expended spell slot and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Orb of the Veil
entries: This onyx sphere bears deep, spiraling grooves and dangles from an iron chain. While the orb is on your person, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score.
You gain {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, the orb increases its range by 60 feet.
You have advantage on Wisdom checks to find hidden doors and paths.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The orb is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the orb, keeping it on your person at all times. All nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you automatically extinguish, and fire damage dealt by you is halved.

item.name: 時間寶珠
entries: 當持握這個寶珠時，你可以使用一個動作以得知外面現在的時間是早晨、下午、傍晚、還是午夜。這個特性只會在物質位面發揮效果。

item.name: Orc Stone
entries: I saved the life of an orc, who gave me a stone with the symbol of the Many-Arrows tribe (a humanoid skull pierced by three arrows) carved into it. The stone is an uncommon magic item that requires attunement, and only I can attune to it.

As an action, I can use the stone to summon the spirit of an orc warrior, which appears within 30 feet of me. The spirit uses the {@creature orc war chief} stat block in the Monster Manual and disappears after 10 minutes or when reduced to 0 hit points. The spirit understands any language I speak and obeys my commands.
After the stone is used three times, it turns to dust. (See Appendix B of Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden)

item.name: 獸人肢解者
item.reqAttune: by a dwarf, fighter, or paladin of good alignment
entries: 獸人肢解者是矮人國王托希爾德·火舌(Torhild Flametongue)很久以前揮舞的一把威力巨大的斧頭。乍一看，它是一件看起來不起眼的武器。它的頭上用矮人符文雕刻著「獸人」（ORC）字樣，但符文上有一個缺口或一條斜線，使得獸人這個詞從字面上被分成了兩半。
當你持握此魔法武器時，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你在使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+2加值。
當你用該武器對{@creature 獸人}所進行的攻擊檢定骰出20時，該獸人必須成功通過一次DC 17的體質豁免，否則生命值將直接歸零。
當你未處於{@condition 無力}狀態時，你不會被獸人突襲。此外，你能夠意識到距離你120呎內，且不在全掩護後方的獸人的存在，儘管你不會因此知道他們的位置。
你和距離你30呎內的任何盟友在你未{@condition 無力}時都不會陷入{@condition 恐懼}。

entries.name: 智能
entries: 獸人肢解者是一把守序善良的智能魔法武器，它具有6點智力、15點睿知、和10點魅力值。它具有聽覺和120呎範圍的黑暗視覺。它能夠透過傳遞情緒的方式與其持用者進行交流，但在罕見的情況下，它會透過有限的心靈感應為持用者的心靈帶來一段古代矮人詩歌的對句或小節。

entries.name: 個性
entries: 獸人肢解者冷酷、沉默、頑固。它只懷有一個小小的願望，就是在戰鬥中對付獸人，並服務於勇敢且正義的持用者。它蔑視懦夫，以及任何形式的口是心非、欺騙或不忠。該武器的目的是保護矮人，並作為矮人決心的象徵。它憎恨所有的矮人仇敵——巨人、哥布林、以及其中最重要的，獸人，並會在戰鬥中無聲地敦促它的主人與這些生物相遇。

item.name: Order of the Silver Dragon +2 Shield
entries: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

The shield is emblazoned with a stylized silver dragon that is the emblem of the Order of the Silver Dragon (see {@adventure {@i Curse of Strahd}, chapter 7|CoS|7|The Order of the Silver Dragon}). The shield whispers warnings to its bearer, granting a +2 bonus to initiative if the bearer isn't incapacitated.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

item.name: Orrery of the Wanderer
entries: This delicate and exquisitely crafted clockwork orrery features multiple geared components whose sweeping hands and dials represent the complex interplay of planar and magical realms. Standing two feet high, the orrery housing is a wondrous device imbued with magic of its own, but the power of its six clockwork components makes the artifact even more potent.

The Orrery of the Wanderer was created by a renowned clockwork mage known only as Lottie. She crafted the relic as a means of tapping into the power of the planes, and to channel the divination and foretelling powers of the stars. But Lottie soon realized that her creation was far more powerful than she had intended. As it tapped into planar magic, the orrery began to manifest the darkness and malevolence inherent to some of the planes. Eventually, it would impress upon its owner a desire to open portals into the most cursed and dangerous worlds, including the Far Realm.

To prevent the orrery from ever being so used, Lottie scattered the components that powered it, secreting them across the world. But the orrery's instinct for survival is strong, and its components have a way of inexorably coming together over decades or centuries, found by treasure hunters, stolen by monsters, found and stolen again—and moving closer to each other all the time.
Random Properties. The orrery has the following randomly determined properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries: The random properties of the orrery might function only when all its components are installed, or might function sporadically if any components are missing.

entries.name: The Sum of Its Parts
entries: Each of the six components that powers the Orrery of the Wanderer is a powerful magic relic in its own right:

items: The {@item chronolometer|AI}
The {@item dimensional loop|AI}
The {@item far gear|AI}
The {@item rotor of return|AI}
The {@item timepiece of travel|AI}
The {@item wheel of stars|AI}

entries: Creatures can attune to the orrery's components individually. If attuned to an individual component, a creature must hold the component to make use of its features. A creature can also attune to the orrery and all the components installed in it. Attuning to an installed component doesn't count against the number of magic items you can normally attune to.
While a component is not installed in the orrery, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

entries.name: Future Echoes
entries: With or without its components, the orrery lets you catch momentary glimpses of the future that warn you of danger. As long as the orrery is within 30 feet of you, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Into the Void
entries: With or without its components, the attuned orrery infuses your spirit with the tumultuous energy of the planes. Over time, your alignment changes to chaotic neutral, and you are compelled to engage with and explore the most dangerous planar realms.

entries.name: Master of Travel
entries: While all six components of the Orrery of the Wanderer are installed, the artifact has 7 charges. While touching the orrery, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): {@spell 異界探知} (3 charges), {@spell 創造半位面} (6 charges), {@spell 異界之門} (7 charges), {@spell 異界傳送} (5 charges), or {@spell 傳送法陣} (3 charges). The orrery regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Orzhov Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Orzhov, allows you to cast {@spell 命令術}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Orzhov's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Orzhov Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Orzhov guild
entries: This keyrune is carved from white marble with veins of black. The end is shaped like a thrull's head, with a gold faceplate affixed. On command, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR} for up to 2 hours. If you don't come from an Orzhov oligarch family, it serves you grudgingly, clownishly aping your movements and mannerisms while carrying out your orders.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Dodge} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

Roll a {@dice d4} and consult the Outer Essence Shards table to determine the shard's essence and property. When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.caption: Outer Essence Shards
rows: Lawful
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Lawful)|TCE}
Chaotic
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Chaotic)|TCE}
Good
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Good)|TCE}
Evil
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Evil)|TCE}

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Chaotic)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: Choose one creature who takes damage from the spell. That target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks made before the start of your next turn.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Evil)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: Choose one creature who takes damage from the spell. That target takes an extra {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Good)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: You or one creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you gains {@dice 3d6} temporary hit points.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Lawful)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. As an action, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: You can end one of the following conditions affecting yourself or one creature you can see within 30 feet of you: {@condition charmed}, {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition poisoned}, or {@condition stunned}.

item.name: Oversized Longbow
entries: This unique weapon can be used only by a Medium or larger creature that has a Strength of 18 or higher. The bow shoots oversized arrows that deal piercing damage equal to 2d6 + the wielder's Strength modifier.

item.name: 畫家設備
additionalEntries: Proficiency with painter's supplies represents your ability to paint and draw. You also acquire an understanding of art history, which can aid you in examining works of art.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Painter's supplies include an easel, canvas, paints, brushes, charcoal sticks, and a palette.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History, Religion
entries: Your expertise aids you in uncovering lore of any sort that is attached to a work of art, such as the magical properties of a painting or the origins of a strange mural found in a dungeon.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: When you inspect a painting or a similar work of visual art, your knowledge of the practices behind creating it can grant you additional insight.

additionalEntries.name: Painting and Drawing
entries: As part of a short or long rest, you can produce a simple work of art. Although your work might lack precision, you can capture an image or a scene, or make a quick copy of a piece of art you saw.

additionalEntries.caption: Painter's Supplies
rows: Paint an accurate portrait
Create a painting with a hidden message

item.name: Pair of engraved bone dice (Brazen Coalition)
蒼白酊劑
entries: 受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 16的體質豁免，否則受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素傷害且陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態。陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態的生物每經過24小時都必須再重複進行這個豁免檢定，若豁免失敗則受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素傷害。直到此毒藥結束前，此毒素所造成的傷害無法被任何手段治療。在豁免成功七次後，此毒藥的效果結束，且該生物可以被如常治療。

item.name: 紙(一張)
entries: 紙(一張)

item.name: Paper Bird
entries: After you write a message of fifty words or fewer on this magic sheet of parchment and speak a creature's name, the parchment magically folds into a Tiny paper bird and flies to the recipient whose name you uttered. The recipient must be on the same plane of existence as you, otherwise the bird turns into ash as it takes flight.

The bird is an object that has 1 hit point, an Armor Class of 13, a flying speed of 60 feet, a Dexterity of 16 (+3), and a score of 1 (−5) in all other abilities, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

It travels to within 5 feet of its intended recipient by the most direct route, whereupon it turns into a nonmagical and inanimate sheet of parchment that can be unfolded only by the intended recipient. If the bird's hit points or speed is reduced to 0 or if it is otherwise immobilized, it turns into ash.
Paper birds usually come in small, flat boxes containing {@dice 1d6 + 3} sheets of the parchment.

item.name: 羊皮紙(一張)
entries: 羊皮紙(一張)

item.name: Pariah's Shield
entries: Soldiers of the Boros Legion consider it an honor to bear this shield, even knowing that it might be the last honor they receive. The front of the shield is sculpted to depict a grieving human face.
You gain a +1 bonus to AC for every two allies within 5 feet of you (up to a maximum of +3) while you wield this shield. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.
When a creature you can see within 5 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage, instead of the creature taking it. When you do so, the damage type changes to force.

item.name: Pathfinder's Greataxe
entries: When you wield this +1 greataxe, you always know the way to the nearest passage leading from underground toward the surface, as well as the approximate depth the axe is underground.

item.name: 珍珠
entries: 帶光澤的白色、黃色、或粉紅色不透光寶石。

item.name: 法力再生珍珠
entries: 當你持有這顆珍珠時，你可以使用一個動作以說出它的命令語，並恢復一個已消耗的法術位。若該被消耗法術位的環階為4環或更高，其新法術位的環階將變為3環。一旦你使用這顆珍珠，則它直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Pearl of Undead Detection
entries: This black pearl glows faintly when undead are within 120 feet of it.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This blue pennant is crafted from silk and is five feet long and whips about as if buffeted by a wind. The vind (wind) rune appears on its surface, looking almost like a cloud. The pennant has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Wind Step
entries: As an action, you fly up to 20 feet. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft.

entries.name: Comforting Wind
entries: You can't suffocate.

entries.name: Winds Grasp
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can cause yourself to take no damage from the fall. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Wind Walker
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast {@spell 浮空術} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Wind
entries: You can transfer the pennant's magic to a nonmagical item—a suit of armor, a pair of boots, or a cloak—by tracing the vind rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the pennant is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. You gain a bonus to speed of 5 feet while you wear the armor, and if it normally imposes disadvantage on {@skill Stealth} checks, it no longer does so.

items.name: Boots/Cloak.
items.entry: The pair of boots or cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing the item, you can convert up to 20 feet of your movement on each of your turns into flight. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft. You can also cast {@spell 羽落術} once from the item, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This five-foot-long blue pennant is crafted from silk and whips about as if buffeted by a strong breeze. The vind rune—the rune of wind—flickers across its surface like a shimmering cloud. Grasping the pennant causes you to feel a powerful gust of wind wash over you, tearing at your clothes and gear. Anyone watching you sees nothing out of the ordinary, and the sensation passes after a moment.

entries.name: Comforting Wind (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot suffocate or drown, and you gain advantage on saving throws against poisonous gases, inhaled poisons, and similar effects.

entries.name: Wind Step (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the vind rune in the air around you and immediately fly 20 feet. If you do not land at the end of this flight, you fall.

entries.name: Wind's Grasp (Simple Property)
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can scribe this rune in the air around you to take no damage from the fall.

entries.name: Howling Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune in the air above one ranged weapon. The weapon gains a ghostly blue aura and has its normal and maximum range doubled. The weapon's attacks do not suffer disadvantage due to range.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Shrieking Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune in the air between you and a creature you can see while you expend a spell slot. The creature must make a Strength saving throw (DC 12 + the spell slot's level). On a failure, it takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage per level of the expended spell slot, and is pushed in a straight line directly away from you for 10 feet per level of the expended spell slot. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not pushed away from you.

entries.name: Wind Walker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast levitate as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

item.name: Peregrine Mask
entries: While wearing this winged helm, you have a flying speed of 60 feet. In addition, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

item.name: 迷醉香水
entries: 這個小瓶內裝有魔法香水，分量足夠一次使用。你可以使用一個動作將這瓶香水用在自己身上，且它的效果將持續1小時。在這段持續期間內，你在所有直接對一名挑戰等級為1或更低的類人生物所進行的魅力檢定中具有優勢。這些受到香水效果影響的生物不會意識到他們被魔法所影響。

item.name: 健康護身符
entries: 當穿戴這個墜飾時，你將免疫於感染任何疾病。若你已經染上一種疾病，則該疾病的效果將在你穿戴這個墜飾時被壓抑。

item.name: 辟毒護身符
entries: 這條精緻的銀鍊上掛著一個切工精美的黑色寶石墜飾。當你穿戴它時，毒素將不會對你造成任何影響。你免疫於{@condition 中毒}狀態且免疫於毒素傷害。

item.name: 癒合護身符
entries: 當你穿戴這個墜飾時，每當你在你的回合開始時處於瀕死狀態，你的傷勢將會穩定。此外，每當你骰生命骰以回復生命值時，將它所回復的生命值變為二倍。

item.name: 橄欖石
entries: 貴橄欖綠色的透光寶石。

item.name: Petrified Grung Egg
entries: While this egg is on your person, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you have used the egg, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
Additionally, while you are attuned to the egg, you gain resistance to poison damage.
The egg turns to dust and is destroyed if it leaves the Tomb of the Nine Gods.

item.name: Pewter mug with green spinels (Brazen Coalition)
迷情媚藥
entries: 在你飲用這瓶藥水之後的10分鐘內，你將被你第一眼看見的生物{@condition 魅惑}長達1小時。若該生物是你原本會喜歡的物種和性別，則你將在{@condition 魅惑}期間視它為你的真愛。這瓶藥水冒泡的玫瑰色液體包含著一顆容易被忽略的心形氣泡。

item.name: Piercer
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

A character attuned to the sword regains the maximum possible number of hit points from expended Hit Dice. However, the attuned character must eat twice as much food each day (a minimum of 2 pounds) to avoid {@condition exhaustion} (see "The Environment" in chapter 8 of the Player's Handbook.)

item.name: Pipe of Remembrance
entries: This long, delicate wooden pipe features a bowl made from smooth river stone. When the pipe is lit, smoke exhaled from it does not dissipate, instead lingering around the bearer. After 10 minutes, the smoke forms moving shapes that reenact the bearer's most impressive and heroic achievements for 5 minutes. When this realistic performance is complete, the smoke dissipates. The pipe can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

item.name: 怪物煙斗
entries: 當使用這個煙斗抽煙時，你可以使用一個動作以吐出一團煙霧，並使其呈現一個單一生物的外型，像是一條龍、一個呋嚕、或一隻沼喉怪。這個外型的大小必須足以容納於1呎邊長立方體內，並會在數秒之後失去其外型，消散成一團尋常煙霧。

item.name: 顫慄之笛
entries: 你必須熟練於管樂器才能使用顫慄之笛。顫慄之笛含有3發充能。你可以使用一個動作以演奏它們並消耗1發充能以創造出一陣怪異、含有魔法的旋律。每個距離你30呎內且可以聽見你演奏的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的睿知豁免，否則將因你而陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。若你希望，所有範圍內對你沒有敵意的生物將自動成功通過這個豁免檢定。一個豁免失敗的生物可以在它的每個回合節淑是重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。一個成功通過這個豁免檢定的生物將在接下來24小時內免疫於顫慄之笛的效果。顫慄之笛會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: 喚鼠排笛
entries: 你必須熟練於管樂器才能使用喚鼠排笛。當你同調於喚鼠排笛時，尋常{@creature 老鼠}和{@creature 巨鼠}對你的態度為冷漠，且除非你威脅或傷害牠們，否則牠們將不會主動攻擊你。

喚鼠排笛含有3發充能。若你以一個動作演奏喚鼠排笛，則你可以使用一個附贈動作消耗1到3發充能，只要距離你半哩內的範圍內有足夠的鼠群可以被這樣召喚（由DM決定），則你每消耗1發充能就可以喚來一群{@creature 老鼠群|mm}。若該處沒有足夠的老鼠以形成集群，則該發充能將被浪費。被召喚的老鼠群將以最短可能路徑向著音樂的方向移動，但並不處於你的控制下。喚鼠排笛會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

在你演奏喚鼠排笛的期間，每當一群不處於其他生物控制下的{@creature 老鼠群}來到距離你30呎的範圍內時，你就可以進行一次對抗該集群睿知檢定的魅力檢定。若你在該次對抗中落敗，則該集群將如常行動，且在接下來24小時內都不會被喚鼠排笛給影響。若你在該次對抗中勝出，則該集群將被喚鼠排笛的音樂影響，且只要你在每輪以一個動作持續演奏喚鼠排笛，牠們便會對你和你的同伴友善。一群對你友善的集群將服從你的命令。若你不對它們交代任何指令，則它們將在面對敵對生物時自我防衛，除此之外不採取其他動作。若一群對你友善的集群在開始它的回合時無法聽見喚鼠排笛的音樂，則你對這個集群的控制結束，且該集群將如常行動，且在接下來24小時內都不會再被喚鼠排笛給影響。

item.name: 水罐
entries: 一個水罐可以容納1加侖的液體。

item.name: Piwafwi (Cloak of Elvenkind)
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item cloak of elvenkind}. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Piwafwi of Fire Resistance
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item cloak of elvenkind}. It also grants resistance to fire damage while you wear it. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Pixie Dust
entries: A pinch of this dust can substitute for the material components of any enchantment spell of 3rd level or lower. If a pinch of pixie dust is sprinkled on a creature, roll percentile dice and consult the Pixie Dust table to determine the effect.

entries.caption: Pixie Dust
rows: The creature sprinkled with dust gains a flying speed of 60 feet for 10 minutes.

The creature sprinkled with dust must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 1 minute. The creature awakens if it takes damage or if it is shaken or slapped as an action.
The creature sprinkled with dust must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by a {@spell 困惑術} spell.

The creature sprinkled with dust becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 hour. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on the creature's person. The effect on the creature ends if it attacks, deals any damage, or casts a spell.

item.name: Planecaller's Codex
entries: The pages of this book are bound in fiend hide, and its cover is embossed with a diagram of the Great Wheel of the multiverse. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell 放逐術}, {@spell 尋獲魔寵}, {@spell 異界之門}, {@spell 防護法陣}, {@spell 異界誓縛}, and {@spell summon elemental|TCE}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the conjuration school.
When you cast a conjuration spell that summons or creates one creature, you can expend 1 charge to grant that creature advantage on attack rolls for 1 minute.

item.name: 乙太化板甲
entries: 當你穿著此護甲時，你能夠以一個動作說出它的命令語，並獲得{@spell 跨入乙太界}法術的效果，持續長達10分鐘或直到你移除這件護甲或再次以一個動作說出命令語。此護甲的這個功能直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 鉑金幣(pp)
entries: 一般的貨幣會有數個不同的幣值單位在市面上流通，且其面額會根據鑄造它們所使用的金屬的相對價值來決定。三種最常見的貨幣是金幣(gp)、銀幣(sp)、和銅幣(cp)。
一枚金幣，可以讓一個角色購買一個腰包、50呎的優質繩索、或一頭山羊。一名純熟（但並不傑出）的工匠每天可以賺取一枚金幣。儘管金幣本身並不常被直接使用，但黃金仍然是衡量財富的標準單位。當商人們商談著的交易涉及價值千百金幣的貨物或服務，其交易本身通常不會涉及貨幣的交換。更確切的說，金幣只是衡量價值的標準，而實際交易中使用的則是金條、信用狀、或其他值錢的商品。
一枚金幣值十枚銀幣，銀幣是普通人之間最盛行的貨幣。一枚銀幣可以僱傭一名勞動者工作一整天、購買一扁瓶的燈油、或是在簡陋旅館的一夜休眠。
一枚銀幣值十枚銅幣，銅幣則常見於勞動者和乞丐之間。一枚銅幣能買一根蠟燭、一支火炬、或是一支粉筆。
除此之外，使用其他貴重金屬鑄造的罕見貨幣有時也會出現在寶藏中。珀金幣(ep)和鉑金幣(pp)源自於衰落帝國和失落的王國，且當它們被用於交易時也偶爾會引起猜忌與懷疑。一枚珀金幣價值五枚銀幣，而一枚鉑金幣則價值十枚金幣。
一枚標準貨幣的重量約為三分之一盎司，所以五十枚貨幣重約一磅。

item.name: 鑲有一顆藍寶石的鉑金手鐲
item.ENG_name: Platinum bracelet set with a sapphire

item.name: Platinum headdress with topaz sun symbol (Sun Empire)
Platinum ring with yellow sapphire (Sun Empire)
Platinum staff topped with amber (Sun Empire)
Poison Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: 製毒工具組
entries: 一套製毒工具組包括了若干小瓶、化學材料、以及其他製毒所需的裝備。熟練於這套工具組能讓你將你的熟練加值加到任何你在為了製作或使用毒藥時所進行的屬性檢定中。
此外，{@book 毒藥的製作與提煉|dmg|8|Crafting and Harvesting Poison}中的規則也需要使用到製毒工具組。
additionalEntries: A poisoner's kit is a favored resource for thieves, assassins, and others who engage in skulduggery. It allows you to apply poisons and create them from various materials. Your knowledge of poisons also helps you treat them.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: A poisoner's kit includes glass vials, a mortar and pestle, chemicals, and a glass stirring rod.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: Your training with poisons can help you when you try to recall facts about infamous poisonings.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: Your knowledge of poisons has taught you to handle those substances carefully, giving you an edge when you inspect {@condition poisoned} objects or try to extract clues from events that involve poison.

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: When you treat the victim of a poison, your knowledge grants you added insight into how to provide the best care to your patient.

additionalEntries.name: Nature, Survival
entries: Working with poisons enables you to acquire lore about which plants and animals are poisonous.

additionalEntries.name: Handle Poison
entries: Your proficiency allows you to handle and apply a poison without risk of exposing yourself to its effects.

additionalEntries.caption: Poisoner's Tools
rows: Spot a {@condition poisoned} object
Determine the effects of a poison

item.name: 垂釣長桿
entries: 當持握這把10呎長桿時，你可以說出其命令語並將它轉變為一根附有一個釣鉤、釣線、和卷線軸的釣魚竿。再次說出其命令語將會使這個釣魚竿變回一把尋常的10呎長桿。

item.name: 摺疊長桿
entries: 當持握這把10呎長桿時，你可以使用一個動作以說出其命令語，並使它收縮摺疊成一根1呎長的短棒，以便於收納。這根長桿的重量並不會因此改變。你可以使用一個動作再次說出其命令語以使這根短棒恢復成一把長桿；然而，這根短棒只會伸長至周遭空間所允許的長度範圍。

item.name: 便攜式次元洞
entries: 這塊絲綢般滑順的上好黑色布料在展開時呈現一個6呎直徑的圓形，且最小可以被摺疊成一張手帕的尺寸。
你可以使用一個動作將便攜式次元洞展開，並將它放置或靠在一個固態表面上，這個便攜式次元洞將隨即創造出一個10呎深的異次元孔洞。這個孔洞內的圓柱狀空間存在於一個不同的位面，因此它無法被用以創造一個開放式的通道。在便攜式次元洞開啟時，任何在其內部的生物都可以從中攀爬而出。
你可以使用一個動作，藉由抓住布料的邊緣並將之摺疊以關閉便攜式次元洞。將這塊布料折起將會關閉次元洞，且任何在內部的生物和物體仍會留存在異次元空間。無論裝了什麽，次元洞的重量都可以忽略不計。
若次元洞被折起，次元洞中的生物可以使用一個動作以進行一次DC 10的力量檢定。如果檢定成功，則該生物將強行從中鑽出，並出現在距離次元洞或攜帶它的人5呎內的位置。在關閉的便攜式次元洞中，一名需要呼吸的生物可以存活最多10分鐘，在這之後它將開始窒息。
將便攜式次元洞放入由{@item 次元袋}、{@item 霍華德的便利袋}、或類似物品所創造的異次元空間中，將會立刻摧毀這兩件物品，並打開一道通往星界位面的傳送門。這道傳送門將產生載這兩件物品被放入彼此的位置。任何距離這道傳送門10呎內的生物將被吸進門內，並被送往星界位面中的一處隨機地點。這道傳送門接著將會關閉。這道傳送門僅限單向傳送，且無法再次被開啟。

item.name: 便攜型攻城鎚
entries: 你可以使用便攜型攻城鎚破門。當你這麼做時，你在力量檢定中獲得+4加值。一個其他角色可以協助你使用攻城鎚，讓你在該檢定中獲得優勢。

item.name: Portfolio Keeper
entries: At rank 2, you gain the use of a weathered leather pouch that is an uncommon magic item. The portfolio keeper holds and organizes notes, brochures, and business cards bearing your contact information. It also has an inexhaustible supply of brochures related to your franchise's current branding scheme.

When you meet someone for the first time, their details and a rough sketch are magically stored on a small parchment card in the portfolio keeper. You can access the details of any such stored card as a bonus action.

entries.name: Cards of Sending
entries: At rank 3, the power of your portfolio keeper becomes more potent, making it a rare magic item. When you give out a business card stored in your portfolio keeper, you can choose to have the card allow its recipient to contact you through your {@item sending stone|AI} as if they had cast a {@spell 短訊術} spell. A business card loses this power seven days after it has been given out, and no more than five cards can have this power at one time.

You can also use your {@item sending stone|AI} to cast {@spell 短訊術} and contact anyone who has one of your business cards. Once you use this feature of the stone, you cannot use it again until dawn seven days later.

entries.name: Charming Introduction
entries: Also at rank 4, you are able to make a focused effort to keep a potential customer's attention. When you provide a humanoid with a business card from your portfolio keeper, you can cast {@spell 魅惑人類} on them (save DC 15). The spell ends prematurely if the character loses the business card.

item.name: 啟蒙盆栽
entries: 若你將一株尋常灌木種植在這個10磅重的陶製盆栽中，並讓它生長持續30天，則這株灌木將在這段時間結束時被魔法轉變為一個{@creature 啟蒙灌木}。當這株灌木被啟蒙時，它的根將會破壞這個盆栽，並將之摧毀。
這株啟蒙灌木對你友善。若沒有來自你的命令，則它什麼事都不會做。

item.name: 化獸為友藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你在1小時內將可以隨意施放{@spell 化獸為友}法術（豁免DC 13）。攪動這瓶混濁的液體可以看到裏頭的一些殘渣：魚鱗、蜂鳥的舌頭、貓爪、或松鼠毛。

item.name: Potion of Aqueous Form
entries: When you drink this potion, you transform into a pool of water. You return to your true form after 10 minutes or if you are {@condition incapacitated} or die.
You're under the following effects while in this form:

items.name: Liquid Movement.
items.entry: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet. You can move over or through other liquids. You can enter and occupy the space of another creature. You can rise up to your normal height, and you can pass through even Tiny openings. You extinguish nonmagical flames in any space you enter.

items.name: Watery Resilience.
items.entry: You have resistance to nonmagical damage. You also have advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws.

items.name: Limitations.
items.entry: You can't talk, attack, cast spells, or activate magic items. Any objects you were carrying or wearing meld into your new form and are inaccessible, though you continue to be affected by anything you're wearing, such as armor.

item.name: 銳眼藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 銳眼術}法術的效果。一顆眼球漂浮在這瓶泛黃液體中，但會在藥水被打開時消失無蹤。

item.name: 攀爬藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得等同於你移動速度的攀爬速度，持續1小時。在這段期間，你在進行用於攀爬的力量（{@skill 運動}）檢定中具有優勢。這瓶藥水分離成類似於岩層的褐色、銀色、灰色三層。搖晃這瓶藥水並不會讓這三種顏色混合。

item.name: 雲巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為27，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 雲巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: Potion of Comprehension
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of a {@spell 通曉語言} spell for 1 hour. This liquid is a clear concoction with bits of salt and soot swirling in it.

item.name: 縮小藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 變巨/縮小術}法術的「縮小」效果，持續{@dice 1d4}小時（無須專注）。這瓶藥水內的紅色液體將連續地聚合成一個小球，然後再迅速擴散以將周圍的清澈液體染紅。搖晃這瓶藥水並不會打斷這個過程。

item.name: 火焰吐息藥水
entries: 在飲用這瓶藥水後，你可以使用一個附贈動作向距離你30呎內的一個目標噴吐火焰。目標必須進行一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 4d6}火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這個效果將在你噴出火焰三次、或1個小時過去後結束。這瓶藥水的橙色液體不停閃爍，且濃煙瀰漫在容器頂部，並在容器被打開時飄散而出。

item.name: 火巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為25，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 火巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: 飛行藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得等同於你移動速度的飛行速度且可以懸浮空中，持續1小時。若你在此藥水的效果結束時仍在空中，除非你能夠其他保持浮空的手段，否則你將墜落。這瓶藥水的清澈液體漂浮在容器頂部，且其中飄有些許雲霧狀的白色雜質。

item.name: 霜巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為23，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 霜巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: 氣化形體藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 氣化形體}法術的效果，效果持續1小時（無須專注），或直到你以一個附贈動作結束該效果。這瓶藥水的容器看起來像裝著一團像水般流動和倒出的霧氣。

item.name: Potion of Giant Size
entries: When you drink this potion, you become Huge for 24 hours if you are Medium or smaller, otherwise the potion does nothing. For that duration, your Strength becomes 25, if it isn't already higher, and your hit point maximum is doubled (your current hit points are doubled when you drink the potion). In addition, the reach of your melee attacks increases by 5 feet.

Everything you are carrying and wearing also increases in size for the duration. When rolling damage for weapons enlarged in this manner, roll three times the normal number of dice; for example, an enlarged longsword would deal {@dice 3d8} slashing damage (instead of {@dice 1d8}), or {@dice 3d10} slashing damage (instead of {@dice 1d10}) when used with two hands.

When the effect ends, any hit points you have above your hit point maximum become temporary hit points. This potion is a pale white liquid made from the tongue of a giant clam, with a pungent aroma akin to that of rotting algae. It tastes sweet, however, when consumed.

item.name: 良效治療藥水
entries: 你在飲用此藥水時回復{@dice 4d4+4}點生命值。這瓶藥水的紅色液體會在被搖動時散發微光。

item.name: 成長藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 變巨/縮小術}法術的「變巨」效果，持續{@dice 1d4}小時（無須專注）。這瓶藥水內的紅色液體將連續地從一個小球擴散蔓延，將周圍的清澈液體染紅，然後再迅速聚合成球。搖晃這瓶藥水並不會打斷這個過程。

item.name: 治療藥水
entries: 你在飲用此藥水時回復{@dice 2d4+2}點生命值。這瓶藥水的紅色液體會在被搖動時散發微光。

item.name: 英雄氣概藥水
entries: 在飲用這瓶藥水後的1小時內，你獲得10點臨時生命值以及{@spell 祝福術}法術的效果（無須專注），持續1小時。這瓶藍色的藥水如同沸騰般地冒出氣泡和蒸氣。

item.name: 山丘巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為21，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 山丘巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: 隱形藥水
entries: 這瓶藥水的容器看起來是空的，但仍能感覺像是它裝有液體。當你飲用它時，你將變得{@condition 隱形}持續1小時。任何你穿戴或攜帶的事物也將跟你一起{@condition 隱形}。這個效果將會在你攻擊或施放法術時提早結束。

item.name: 無敵藥水
entries: 在你飲用這瓶藥水後的1分鐘內，你獲得對所有傷害的抗性。這瓶藥水糖漿般的液體看起來就像液化的鋼鐵。

item.name: 延壽藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你的生理年齡將減少{@dice 1d6+6}歲，最小降低至13歲。此後每當你飲用延壽藥水，你都會有累積10%的機率改為增加{@dice 1d6+6}歲。這瓶藥水的琥珀色液體中漂浮著一根蠍子的尾巴、一顆蝰蛇的牙齒、一隻死蜘蛛、以及一顆違反常理跳動著的小型心臟。這些成份將在藥水被打開時消失無蹤。

item.name: Potion of Maximum Power
entries: The first time you cast a damage-dealing spell of 4th level or lower within 1 minute after drinking the potion, instead of rolling dice to determine the damage dealt, you can instead use the highest number possible for each die.
This glowing purple liquid smells of sugar and plum, but it has a muddy taste.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (beast)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell 支配野獸} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect lasts for 1 hour, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition charmed} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (humanoid)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell 支配人類} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect lasts for 1 hour, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition charmed} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (monster)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell 支配怪物} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect lasts for 1 hour, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition charmed} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: 讀心藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 偵測思想}法術的效果（豁免DC 13）。這瓶藥水的濃稠紫色液體中飄浮著一團粉色的卵型雲霧。

item.name: 劇毒藥水
entries: 這瓶藥水無論看起來、聞起來、且嚐起來都和一瓶{@item 治療藥水}或其他有益的藥水一模一樣。然而，它實際上是一瓶被幻術系魔法偽裝的毒藥。一個{@spell 鑑定術}法術將揭露它的本質。

若你飲用它，你將受到{@dice 3d6}毒素傷害，且你必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態。當你因此而處於{@condition 中毒}期間，在你的每個回合開始時，你都將再受到 {@dice 3d6}毒素傷害。在你的每個回合結束時，你可以重複這個豁免檢定。若豁免成功，則你在後續回合內受到的毒素傷害將減少{@dice 1d6}。這個毒素效果將在毒素傷害被降至0時終止。

item.name: Potion of Possibility
entries: When you drink this clear potion, you gain two Fragments of Possibility, each of which looks like a Tiny, grayish bead of energy that follows you around, staying within 1 foot of you at all times. Each fragment lasts for 8 hours or until used.

When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can expend your fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against you, you can expend your fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one you rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, you roll your {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.
While you have one or more Fragments of Possibility from this potion, you can't gain another Fragment of Possibility from any source.

item.name: 速度藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，你將獲得{@spell 加速術}法術的效果，持續1分鐘（無須專注）。這瓶藥水的黃色液體有著黑色紋路，並自行旋轉著。

item.name: 石巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為23，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 石巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: 風暴巨人之力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水後，你的力量值將變為29，持續1小時。若你的力量值等於或大於這個數值，則此藥水不會有任何效果。
這瓶藥水的透明液體中漂浮著一片來自{@creature 風暴巨人}的指甲碎片。

item.name: 強效治療藥水
entries: 你在飲用此藥水時回復{@dice 8d4+8}點生命值。這瓶藥水的紅色液體會在被搖動時散發微光。

item.name: 極效治療藥水
entries: 你在飲用此藥水時回復{@dice 10d4+20}點生命值。這瓶藥水的紅色液體會在被搖動時散發微光。

item.name: 活力藥水
entries: 當你飲用這瓶藥水時，它將移除任何你所承受的{@condition 力竭}狀態，並治癒任何正影響你的疾病或毒素。在接下來的24小時內，你所消耗的任何生命骰都將回復最大量的生命值。這瓶藥水的緋紅液體有節奏地發出微光，讓人聯想到心臟的跳動。

item.name: Potion of Watchful Rest
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the following benefits for the next 8 hours: magic can't put you to sleep, and you can remain awake during a long rest and still gain its benefits. This sweet, amber-colored brew has no effect on creatures that don't require sleep, such as elves.

item.name: 水下呼吸藥水
entries: 你可以在飲用這瓶藥水後在水下呼吸持續1小時。這瓶藥水的渾濁綠色液體聞起來有海水的味道，且有一個水母形狀的氣泡漂浮其中。

item.name: 陶匠工具
additionalEntries: Potter's tools are used to create a variety of ceramic objects, most typically pots and similar vessels.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Potter's tools include potter's needles, ribs, scrapers, a knife, and calipers.

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: Your expertise aids you in identifying ceramic objects, including when they were created and their likely place or culture of origin.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: You gain additional insight when inspecting ceramics, uncovering clues others would overlook by spotting minor irregularities.

additionalEntries.name: Reconstruction
entries: By examining pottery shards, you can determine an object's original, intact form and its likely purpose.

additionalEntries.caption: Potter's Tools
rows: Determine what a vessel once held
Create a serviceable pot
Find a weak point in a ceramic object

item.name: 囊袋
entries: 一個布質或皮製的囊袋可以收納最多20個{@item 投石索彈丸}、50支{@item 吹箭}、或其他東西。一個用以收納法術材料的分類囊袋被稱作{@item 材料包}。一個囊袋可以容納最多⅕立方呎或6磅重的裝備。

item.name: Powered Armor
entries: Powered armor resembles a suit of unusual plate armor, with finely articulated joints connected by an oily, black, leather-like material. The armor has been worked to create the appearance of a heavily muscled warrior, and its great helm is unusual in that it has no openings—only a broad glass plate in the front with a second piece of glass above it. Strange plates, tubing, and large metal bosses adorn the armor in seemingly random fashion. On the back of the armor's left gauntlet is a rectangular metal box, from which projects a short rod tipped with a cone-shaped red crystal.
While wearing this armor, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have a +1 bonus to AC.
Your Strength score is 18 (this has no effect if your Strength is already 18 or higher).
You have advantage on death saving throws.

entries: The armor has further capabilities that can be powered either by energy cells or by your own life energy. You can use a bonus action to draw power from an energy cell or sacrifice hit points to gain one of the following benefits:

items: Emit a force field to gain {@dice 2d6 + 5} temporary hit points (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Activate boosters to gain a flying speed of 15 feet for 1 minute (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Fire arm-mounted laser: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 feet, one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6} radiant damage (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Translate any writing you can see in any nonmagical language, to a total of one thousand words over 1 minute (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Fill the armor with air, allowing you to breathe normally in any environment for up to 1 hour (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Gain {@sense darkvision} to a range of 60 feet for up to 1 hour (1 charge or 5 hit points).

entries: The armor can accept only one energy cell at a time. It is found with one energy cell attached, containing {@dice 2d10} charges.

entries.name: Powered Armor Options
entries: Depending on where and how it appears in the adventure, you might wish to modify the features of Kwalish's legendary powered armor.

entries.name: Automatic Defenses
entries: Unless Kwalish deactivates the suit's automatic defenses, no one can approach the armor without setting those defenses off. Treat the armor as a {@creature shield guardian} that has stored a {@spell 魔法飛彈} spell cast using a 4th-level spell slot. When the armor is reduced to 0 hit points, its defenses are rendered inert and it can be safely approached.

entries.name: Battle of Wills
entries: When donned by a new user, the armor deems itself superior and attempts to take possession of that user. The user must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the armor. While possessed, the user is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body but retains its awareness. The armor uses the possessed user's statistics (as adjusted by the armor), but doesn't gain access to the user's knowledge, features, or proficiencies.

Freeing a creature trapped inside the armor first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). The trapped creature can also attempt a DC 20 Charisma saving throw each day at dawn. On a successful save, the armor no longer controls the creature and can be safely donned by that creature at any time.

entries.name: Stasis
entries: Whenever a creature wearing the armor drops to 0 hit points, the armor places that creature into a state of stasis. While in this state, the creature is stable and does not make death saving throws, but the armor takes control of the creature (as above). Additionally, the armor attempts to assume the identity of the user, assuring their allies that nothing is amiss. Freeing the user first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). A creature in stasis does not make Charisma saving throws to break the armor's control.

entries.name: Alternative Power
entries: Powered armor originally required energy cells to fuel it, but was adapted by Kwalish to be fueled by the life energy of the creature wearing it. You might decide that the armor can also draw power from additional sources, or that energy cells can be recharged with the aid of a tinker, inventor, or artificer. It might also be possible for allies to connect to the armor through the use of magic that generates a conduit something like an astral silver cord. While so connected, a willing ally can give up hit points as a reaction to fuel the armor's abilities.

item.name: Pressure Capsule
entries: This small capsule is made of beeswax blended with sand and a variety of enchanted water plants. A creature who consumes a pressure capsule ignores the effects of swimming at depths greater than 100 feet (see "{@book Unusual Environments|dmg|5|Unusual Environments}" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

item.name: Pride Silk
entries: The hearty silk unique to the region has long been a point of pride with the locals. When processed and woven properly, the resulting cloth is pride silk: an extremely flexible material with the durability of tanned leather. Pride silk has become a favorite cloth for use on military ship sails, war banners, and other utilitarian applications, but has also gained popularity in affluent circles. High-end clothing made from pride silk is both fashionable and protective, leading many nobles and wealthy merchants to seek full outfits and formal gowns made with it. The tailors skilled enough to create such outfits are few and far between, so while pride silk might be expensive as a raw material, outfits made of the cloth are prohibitively expensive for most common folk.

item.name: Pride Silk Outfit
entries: An outfit made of pride silk weighs 4 pounds and costs 500 gp. If you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class is 11 + your Dexterity modifier while wearing it.

item.name: 祭司套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 背包|phb}
一條{@item 毛毯|phb}
10根{@item 蠟燭|phb}
一個{@item 打火匣|phb}
一個善款盒
2塊焚香
一個香爐
一套祭祀服
2天份的{@item 口糧(1天份)|phb|口糧}
一個{@item 水袋|phb}.

item.name: Professor Orb
entries: Each professor orb takes the form of a smooth, solid, 5-pound sphere of smoky gray quartz about the size of a grapefruit. Close examination reveals two or more pinpricks of silver light deep inside the sphere.

A Professor Orb is sentient and has the personality of a scholar. Its alignment is determined by rolling on the alignment table in the "{@book Sentient Magic Items|DMG|7|Sentient Magic Items}" section in chapter 7 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}. Regardless of its disposition, the orb has an Intelligence of 18, and Wisdom and Charisma scores determined by rolling 3d6 for each ability. The orb speaks, reads, and understands four languages, and can see and hear normally out to a range of 60 feet. Unlike most sentient items, the orb has no will of its own and can't initiate a conflict with the creature in possession of it.

A Professor Orb has extensive knowledge of four narrow academic subjects. When making an Intelligence check to recall lore from any of its areas of expertise, the orb has a +9 bonus to its roll (including its Intelligence modifier).
In addition to the knowledge it possesses, a professor orb can cast the {@spell 法師之手} cantrip at will. It uses the spell only to transport itself. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

item.name: Professor Skant
entries: The {@item professor orb|WDMM} owned by Vellynne Harpell and stolen by Nass Lantomir calls itself Professor Skant. It is lawful good, and it has a Wisdom of 11 and a Charisma of 9. It speaks and reads Common, Draconic, Elvish, and Loross (the dead language of the Empire of Netheril). Professor Skant is a chatterbox and assumes all humanoids are dunderheads. When elaborating on its areas of expertise, it adopts an unintentionally patronizing tone. It has the following four areas of expertise:

items: The history of Netheril (see the "{@adventure Fate of Netheril|IDRotF|17|Fate of Netheril}" sidebar)
Vampirism and the traits of vampires
Rituals surrounding the making, bottling, and drinking of Elverquisst (a rare, ruby-colored elven liquor distilled from sunshine and rare summer fruits)
The {@creature tarrasque} (see the Monster Manual)

item.name: Propeller Helm
entries: While worn, the helm allows its wearer to use an action to cast the {@spell 浮空術} spell, requiring no components. The helm's propeller spins and whirs loudly until the spell ends. Each time the spell ends, there is a 50 percent chance that the helm loses its magic and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Prosthetic Limb
entries: This item replaces a lost limb—a hand, an arm, a foot, a leg, or a similar body part. While the prosthetic is attached, it functions identically to the part it replaces. You can detach or reattach it as an action, and it can't be removed against your will. It detaches if you die.

item.name: Prosthetic Limb
entries: This item replaces a lost limb-a hand, an arm, a foot, a leg, or a similar body part. While the prosthetic is attached, it functions identically to the part it replaces. You can detach or reattach it as an action, and it can't be removed against your will. It detaches if you die.

item.name: Protective Verses
entries: This leather-bound spellbook is reinforced with iron and silver fittings and an iron lock (DC 20 to open). As an action, you can touch the book's cover and cause it to lock as if you cast {@spell 祕法鎖} on it. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell 祕法鎖}, {@spell 解除魔法}, {@spell 法術無效結界}, {@spell 守衛銘文}, {@spell 魔鄧肯私人密室}, {@spell protection from evil and good||protection from evil}, and {@spell 徽記術}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the abjuration school.
When you cast an abjuration spell, you can expend 1 charge to grant a creature you can see within 30 feet of you {@dice 2d10} temporary hit points.

item.name: Psi Crystal
item.reqAttune: by a creature with an intelligence score of 3 or higher
entries: This crystal grants you telepathy for as long as you remain attuned to it. See the {@book introduction of the Monster Manual|MM|0|Telepathy} for rules on how this telepathy works.
The crystal also glows with a purplish inner light while you are attuned to it.
The higher your intelligence, the greater the light's intensity and the greater the range of the telepathy (see the Psi Crystal Properties table).

30 feet
Bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet
60 feet
