16 or higher
120 feet
Bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet

item.name: Psychic Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: 紫蟲毒液
entries: 這種毒藥必須從死亡或陷入{@condition 無力}狀態的{@creature 巨紫蠕蟲}身上採集獲取。受害於這種毒藥的生物必須進行一次DC 19的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到42 ({@dice 12d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

item.name: Pyroconverger
entries: A Pyroconverger is an Izzet-made flamethrower. It carries a risk of malfunction each time you use it.

As an action, you can cause the Pyroconverger to project fire in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 4d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Each time you use the Pyroconverger, roll a {@dice d10} and add the number of times you have used it since your last long rest. If the total is 11 or higher, the Pyroconverger malfunctions: you take {@dice 4d6} fire damage, and you can't use the Pyroconverger again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
entries: A creature that touches this ornate wooden vessel for 1 minute gains the benefits of a short rest. That creature also gains the effects of the {@spell 祝福術} spell until the creature finishes a short or long rest. The creature can't gain these benefits again until it finishes a long rest.

If the vessel is opened, roll on the Pyxis of Pandemonium table to determine what happens. Any spells cast by the vessel have a spell save DC of 17. One minute after the vessel is opened, it disappears. It reappears, sealed, in a random location on the same plane of existence 24 hours later.

entries.name: Curse
entries: Any creature that gains the benefit of a short rest from the vessel hears cloying telepathic whispers emanating from it. That creature must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the vessel for 1 hour. The {@condition charmed} creature does everything it can to open the vessel as soon as possible. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the vessel's whispers for 24 hours.

rows: {@b Androphagia.} Each creature within 60 feet of the vessel must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or go berserk for 1 minute. The berserk creature must begin its turn using the {@action Attack} action to make one melee or ranged attack (its choice) against the creature nearest to it. The berserk creature can repeat the save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.
{@b Bile Blight.} The vessel casts the {@spell 傷害術} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.
{@b Flood.} The vessel casts the {@spell 海嘯術} spell at a point of the DM's choice within 120 feet of it.
{@b Medusa's Gaze.} The vessel casts the {@spell 石化術} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.
{@b Labyrinth.} The vessel casts the {@spell 迷宮術} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.

{@b Nightmare.} Tendrils of shadow seep from the vessel and form into {@dice 1d4} {@creature shadow demon||shadow demons} (see the Monster Manual for their stat block), which appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it and are hostile.
{@b Swarming Insects.} The vessel casts the {@spell 疫病蟲群} spell, centered on itself and with a radius of 30 feet.
{@b Unbridled Revel.} The vessel casts the {@spell 奧圖狂舞術} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.

item.name: 誇爾羽符，錨
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 錨
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以用這個羽符觸碰一艘船艇或船艦。在接下來24小時內，這艘船隻將無法被任何方式移動。再次使用這個羽符觸碰該船隻將結束這個效果。當這個效果結束，這個羽符將會消失。

item.name: 誇爾羽符，鳥
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 鳥
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以將這個羽符投向空中5呎距離。這個羽符將會消失，且一個巨大、色彩繽紛的鳥類將出現在該位置。這隻鳥使用{@creature 鵬鳥}的數據，它將服從你下達的簡單命令，但不會攻擊。它在以它的最高速度飛行時可以攜帶最多500磅的重量（以每小時16哩的速度，且每日最多飛行144哩。每飛行3小時需要一小時的休息時間。），或以半速飛行時則可以攜帶最多1,000磅的重量。這隻鳥會在飛行達到一天的最大距離、或它的生命值歸零時消失。你能夠以一個動作將這隻鳥解消。

item.name: 誇爾羽符，扇
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 扇
entries: 若你正處於一艘船艇或船艦上，你可以使用一個動作以將這個羽符投向空中10呎距離。這個羽符將會消失，且一個巨大撲振的風扇將出現在該位置。這個風扇將漂浮並創造出風力足以讓一艘船滿帆的強風，使其增加每小時5哩的船速長達8小時。你能夠以一個動作將這個風扇解消。

item.name: 誇爾羽符，天鵝船
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 天鵝船
entries: 你可以使用一個動作用這個羽符觸碰一片直徑至少60呎的水體。這個羽符將會消失，且一個50呎長、20尺寬，天鵝外型的船將會出現在該位置。這艘船可以自行航行，並以每小時6哩的速度在水上移動。當在這艘船上時，你可以使用一個動作以命令它移動、或向著最多90度的範圍內轉向。這艘船可以搭載最多32個體型為中型或更小的生物。一個大型生物將被計為四個中型生物，一個巨型生物則計為九個中型生物。這艘船會持續存在長達24小時，並在這之後消失。你能夠以一個動作將這艘船解消。

item.name: 誇爾羽符，樹
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 樹
entries: 你必須在戶外才能夠使用這個羽符。你可以使用一個動作用這個羽符觸碰一處地面上的未被佔據空間。這個羽符將會消失，且一棵非魔法橡樹將會出現在它的位置。這棵樹有60呎高，樹幹寬度為5呎直徑，且它的頂端的樹冠以20呎半徑展開。

item.name: 誇爾羽符，鞭
entries: 這個微型物體看起來就像是一根羽毛。

entries.name: 鞭
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以將這個羽符投向距離你10呎內的一點。這個羽符將會消失，且一把漂浮的長鞭將會出現在該位置。你可以使用一個附贈動作以對一個距離這把鞭子10呎內的生物進行一次近戰法術攻擊，攻擊加值為{@hit 9}。若命中，該目標將受到{@dice 1d6+5}力場傷害。
在你的回合以一個附贈動作，你可以引導該鞭子飛行最多20呎距離，並對一個距離它10呎內的生物重複進行該攻擊。這把鞭子會在經過1小時後、你使用一個動作將它解消、或當你陷入{@condition 無力}或死亡時消失。

item.name: 石英
entries: 白色、煙灰色、或黃色的透光寶石。

item.name: 箭袋
entries: 一個箭袋可以容納最多20枝箭。

item.name: 艾羅娜的箭袋
entries: 這個箭袋的三個囊袋都各自連接著一個異次元空間，讓這個箭袋得以容納大量物體而始終維持不超過2磅的重量。最短的囊袋可以容納最多六十支箭、弩矢、或其他類似的物體。中型的囊袋可以容納最多十八個標槍或類似物體。最長的囊袋則可以容納最多六個長型物體，像是弓、長棍、或矛。
你可以如同從普通的箭袋或劍鞘一樣從這個箭袋中將任何它所收納的物體取出。

item.name: Radiant Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Rain Catcher
entries: A rain catcher is a simple contraption consisting of a 5-foot-square leather tarp and a wooden frame with legs. When the tarp is stretched across the wooden frame, it forms a basin that can catch 2 gallons of drinking water per inch of rainfall and hold up to 8 gallons. The tarp and wooden frame fold up for easy transport.

item.name: Rakdos Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Rakdos, allows you to cast {@spell 煉獄叱喝}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Rakdos' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Rakdos Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Rakdos guild
entries: This dark granite keyrune is marbled with scarlet veins and carved with the leering visage of a mischievous demon. When activated, it transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR} for up to 1 hour.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Dodge} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Rakdos Riteknife
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Its blade is cruelly serrated, and its hilt resembles a demonic head and wings. Whenever you slay a creature with an attack using the dagger, the creature's soul is imprisoned inside the dagger, and that creature can be restored to life only by a {@spell 祈願術} spell. The dagger can hold a maximum of five souls.

For each soul imprisoned in the dagger, your attacks with it deal an extra {@dice 1d4} necrotic damage on a hit. While the dagger is within 5 feet of you, your dreams are haunted by whispers from the trapped souls.
The dagger has the following additional properties.

entries.name: Siphon Vitality
entries: As a bonus action, you can release any number of stored souls from the dagger to regain {@dice 1d10} hit points per soul released.

entries.name: Annihilation
entries: If the dagger holds five souls, you can use this property: As a reaction immediately after you hit a creature with the dagger and deal damage to that target, you can release all five souls. If the target now has fewer than 75 hit points, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or die. If the target dies, you can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: 口糧(1天份)
entries: 口糧是由適合長途旅行的乾燥食物所組成，包括肉乾、果乾、硬麵餅、和堅果。

item.name: Red Dragon Mask
entries: This mask of glossy crimson has swept-back horns and spiked cheek ridges. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: You have resistance against fire damage. If you already have resistance to fire damage from another source, you instead have immunity to fire damage. If you already have immunity to fire damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to fire damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Charisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense blindsight} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Draconic. You also have advantage on any Charisma check you make against Red Dragons.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/Day) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Dragon Fire
entries: If you deal fire damage to a creature or flammable object, it starts burning. At the start of each of its turns, a creature burning in this way takes {@dice 1d6} fire damage. A creature that can reach the burning target can use an action to extinguish the fire.

item.name: 紅龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿著這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對火焰傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30哩內最近的紅龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Reincarnation Dust
entries: When this small pouch of purple dust is sprinkled on a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid, the dust is absorbed by the remains. If willing, the dead creature returns to life with a new body as if the {@spell 轉生術} spell had been cast on the remains.

item.name: 雷祖爾之匕
entries: 你在使用這把武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值，且這把武器在命中及切割時不會發出噪音。
匕首的鞍上刻有「雷祖爾」的名稱。 如果持有者說出了名字，那麼刀刃會發出淡淡的冷光，散發出10呎半徑的微光光照，並持續直到持有者再次說出名字。

item.name: Reveler's Concertina
entries: While holding this concertina, you gain a +2 bonus to the saving throw DC of your bard spells.
As an action, you can use the concertina to cast {@spell 奧圖狂舞術} from the item. This property of the concertina can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 紅紋石
entries: 淺粉紅色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 命令氣元素戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你在對來自氣元素位面的元素生物所進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，且它們對你進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。此外，你將獲得源自氣元素位面的性質。
這枚戒指含有5發充能。它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4+1}發已消耗的充能。從這枚戒指施放的法術的豁免DC為17。
你可以消耗這枚戒指的2發充能以對一個{@creature 氣元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}。此外，當你墜落時，你將以每輪60呎的速度下降，且不會受到任何來自墜落的傷害。你也可以理解並說氣族語。
若你在同調於這枚戒指時協助殺死了一個{@creature 氣元素}，則你將獲得下列額外的性質：

items: 你具有對閃電傷害的抗性。
你具有等同於你步行速度的飛行速度，且可以浮空。
你可以從這枚戒指施放下列法術，消耗必要數量的充能：{@spell 連環閃電}(3發充能)、{@spell 造風術}(2發充能)、或{@spell 風牆術}(1發充能)。

item.name: 支配動物戒指
entries: 這枚戒指含有3發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。當穿戴此戒指時，你可以使用一個動作以消耗其中1發充能，並施放下列其中一個法術：

items: {@spell 化獸為友}(豁免DC 13)
{@spell 恐懼術}(豁免DC 13)，只能選擇智力值為3或更低的野獸做為目標
{@spell 動物交談術}

item.name: 氣巨靈召喚戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你能夠以一個動作說出它的命令語，以從氣元素位面召喚出一個特定的{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)}。這個{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}將出現在距離你120呎內一處你所選擇的未被佔據空間。只要你維持專注（如同專注於法術），它就會持續存在長達最多1小時，或直到它的生命值歸零。在這之後它將返回它的原生位面。
當被召喚時，該{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}將對你和你的同伴友善。無論你使用什麼語言，它都會服從任何你交代它的口頭指令。若你不對該生物交代任何指令，則該{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}將在面對敵對生物時自我防衛，除此之外不採取其他動作。
在該{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}離開後，它在接下來24小時內都不能再被召喚，且若該{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}死亡，這枚戒指將變為非魔法物品。

item.name: 命令土元素戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你在對來自土元素位面的元素生物所進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，且它們對你進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。此外，你將獲得源自土元素位面的性質。
這枚戒指含有5發充能。它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4+1}發已消耗的充能。從這枚戒指施放的法術的豁免DC為17。
你可以消耗這枚戒指的2發充能以對一個{@creature 土元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}。此外，你可以在瓦礫、岩石、或泥土構成的困難地形中將其視作正常地形移動。你也可以理解並說土族語。
若你在同調於這枚戒指時協助殺死了一個{@creature 土元素}，則你將獲得下列額外的性質：

items: 你具有對酸蝕傷害的抗性。
你可以移動穿過堅實的地面或岩石，就如同這些區域是困難地形一樣。如果你在該區域內結束你的回合，你將被推到最近一處你最後曾佔據過的未被佔據空間。
你可以從這枚戒指施放下列法術，消耗必要數量的充能：{@spell 塑石術}(2發充能)、{@spell 石膚術}(3發充能)、或{@spell 石牆術}(3發充能)。

item.name: 閃避戒指
entries: 這枚戒指含有3發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。當你在穿戴此戒指時於一次敏捷豁免中失敗，你可以使用你的反應以消耗其中1發充能，並將該豁免檢定的結果改為成功。

item.name: 羽落戒指
entries: 當你在穿戴此戒指時墜落時，你將以每輪60呎的速度下降，且不會受到任何來自墜落的傷害。

item.name: 命令火元素戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你在對來自火元素位面的元素生物所進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，且它們對你進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。此外，你將獲得源自火元素位面的性質。
這枚戒指含有5發充能。它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4+1}發已消耗的充能。從這枚戒指施放的法術的豁免DC為17。
你可以消耗這枚戒指的2發充能以對一個{@creature 火元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}。此外，具有對火焰傷害的抗性。你也可以理解並說火族語。
若你在同調於這枚戒指時協助殺死了一個{@creature 火元素}，則你將獲得下列額外的性質：

items: 你免疫於火焰傷害。
可以從這枚戒指施放下列法術，消耗必要數量的充能：{@spell 燃燒之手}(1發充能)、{@spell 火球術}(2發充能)、或{@spell 火牆術}(3發充能)。

item.name: 自由行動戒指
entries: 當你穿戴此戒指時，困難地形將不會消耗你額外的移動速度。此外，魔法無法降低你的移動速度，也無法使你陷入{@condition 麻痺}或{@condition 束縛}狀態。

item.name: 隱身戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你能夠以一個動作變得{@condition 隱形}。任何你所穿戴或攜帶的事物都將隨著你一起{@condition 隱形}。你將維持{@condition 隱形}直到此戒指被移除、直到你攻擊或施放法術、或直到你以一個附贈動作變得可見。

item.name: 跳躍戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以隨意以一個附贈動作從它施放{@spell 跳躍術}法術，但當你這麼做時只能選擇自己為目標。

item.name: 心靈護盾戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你將免疫於那些讓其他生物得以閱讀你的思想、辨別你是否說謊、知曉你的陣營、或知曉你的生物類型的魔法效果。其他生物只能在你同意的情況下與你透過心靈感應溝通。
你可以使用一個動作讓此戒指{@condition 隱形}，直到你使用另一個動作讓它變得可見，或直到你移除此戒指、或直到你死亡。
若你在穿戴這枚戒指時死亡，除非它內部已經居住著一個靈魂，否則你的靈魂將得以進入其中。你可以待在戒指內或從中離開以前往來生。只要你的靈魂還待在戒指內，你就可以和任何穿戴它的生物透過心靈感應溝通。穿戴者無法拒絕這種來自寄居靈魂的心靈感應溝通。

item.name: Ring of Obscuring
entries: This band of iron resembles a skull and is cold to the touch. It has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. As an action while wearing the ring, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell 雲霧術} spell from it, with the following changes: the cloud is centered on you when it first appears, and the spell lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

item.name: 防護戒指
entries: 你在穿戴此戒指時於AC和豁免檢定中獲得+1加值。

item.name: 再生戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，只要你還擁有至少1點生命值，則你每10分鐘將回復{@dice 1d6}點生命值。若你失去一個身體部位，且你整段期間都維持有至少1點生命值，則這枚戒指將在{@dice 1d6+1}天後讓你重新長出失去的身體部位並使其恢復完整功能。

item.name: 流星戒指
entries: 當在微光或黑暗環境中穿戴此戒指時，你可以從這枚戒指隨意施放{@spell 舞光術}和{@spell 光亮術}。從這枚戒指施放其中任何一個都需要一個動作。
這枚戒指含有6發充能以用做下列用途。這枚戒指會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d6}發已消耗的充能。

entries.name: 妖火
entries: 你能夠以一個動作消耗1發充能，以從這枚戒指施放{@spell 妖火術}。

entries.name: 球型閃電
entries: 你能夠以一個動作消耗2發充能，以創造出一到四個3呎直徑閃電法球。你創造的閃電球越多，則每個閃電球各自的威力就會越小。
閃電球將各自出現在距離你120呎內且你所能看見的未被佔據空間。只要你還維持專注（如同專注於法術），這些閃電球就會持續存在最多長達1分鐘。每個閃電球都會散發出30呎半徑的微光光照。

以一個附贈動作，你可以將每個閃電球各自移動最多30呎距離，但不能讓他們遠離你超過120呎。當一個除了你以外的生物與閃電球距離5呎之內，該閃電球將會對該生物釋放出閃電並消失。該生物必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將受到閃電傷害，其傷害值將根據你所創造閃電球的數量決定。（4顆閃電球={@dice 2d4}；3顆閃電球={@dice 2d6}；2顆閃電球={@dice 5d4}；1顆閃電球={@dice 4d12}）

entries.name: 流星
entries: 你能夠以一個動作消耗1到3發充能。你每消耗一發充能，你就能從這枚戒指向著距離你60呎內你所能看見一點發射出一個光點。每個在以該點為中心的15呎邊長立方體範圍內的生物都將沐浴在重重火花之中，且必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 5d4}火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

item.name: 法術儲存戒指
entries: 這枚戒指可以將對它施放的法術儲存起來，保存它們直到與它同調的穿戴者使用它們。這枚戒指可以同時存有環階總和最多為5環的法術。當被發現時，它已經存有總共{@dice 1d6-1}環，由DM所選的法術。
透過在施放法術時觸碰這枚戒指，任何生物都可以將一個1環到5環的法術施放在這枚戒指上。這個法術當下並不會發揮任何效果，而是被儲存進這枚戒指中。若這枚戒指無法容納該法術，則該法術將被浪費而不會發揮任何效果。用以施放該法術的法術位環階將會決定它在戒指中所使用的空間。
當穿戴此戒指時，你可以從它施放任何它所儲存的法術。該法術將使用其原本施法者所使用的法術位環階、法術豁免DC、法術攻擊加值、和施法屬性，但除此之外，它仍被視作是由你施放了該法術。從這枚戒指施放的法術將不再被儲存於戒指中，並釋放它原本佔據的空間。

item.name: 法術反轉戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你在對抗任何只以你為目標的法術（而非影響你所在的區域）時所進行的豁免檢定具有優勢。此外，若你在該豁免檢定中骰出了20，且該法術為7環或更低，則該法術對你將不會發揮任何效果，且改為以其施法者做為目標，並使用該施法者所使用的法術位環階、法術豁免DC、法術攻擊加值、和施法屬性。

item.name: 游泳戒指
entries: 你在穿戴此戒指時具有40呎的游泳速度。

item.name: 心靈遙控戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以隨意施放{@spell 心靈遙控}法術，但只能以未被穿戴或攜帶的物體做為目標。

item.name: Ring of Temporal Salvation
entries: If you die while wearing this gray crystal ring, you vanish and reappear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the space you left (or the nearest unoccupied space). You have a number of hit points equal to {@dice 3d6} + your Constitution modifier. If your hit point maximum is lower than the number of hit points you regain, your hit point maximum rises to a similar amount. If you have any levels of {@condition exhaustion}, reduce your level of {@condition exhaustion} by 1. Once the ring is used, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: 公羊戒指
entries: 這枚戒指含有3發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。當穿戴此戒指時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗其中1到3發充能，以對一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見的生物進行攻擊。這枚戒指將產生出一個靈體般的公羊頭，並以+7命中加值進行其攻擊檢定。若命中，則你每消耗一發充能，目標就會受到{@dice 2d10}力場傷害並被推離你5呎距離。
或者，你可以使用一個動作並消耗其中1到3發充能，以嘗試破壞一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見，未被穿戴或攜帶的物體。這枚戒指將進行一次力量檢定，且你每消耗一發充能便能使其在該檢定中獲得+5的加值。

item.name: 三願戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗它3發充能中的其中1發，以從它施放{@spell 祈願術}法術。當你使用這枚戒指的最後一發充能時，這枚戒指將變為非魔法物品。

item.name: Ring of Truth Telling
entries: While wearing this ring, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks to determine whether someone is lying to you.

item.name: 溫暖戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你將具有寒冰傷害的抗性。此外，你和你所穿戴或攜帶的所有東西都不會被最低華氏-50度的低溫給傷害。

item.name: 命令水元素戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你在對來自水元素位面的元素生物所進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，且它們對你進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。此外，你將獲得源自水元素位面的性質。
這枚戒指含有5發充能。它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4+1}發已消耗的充能。從這枚戒指施放的法術的豁免DC為17。
你可以消耗這枚戒指的2發充能以對一個{@creature 水元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}。此外，你可以站立並行走在液體表面上，就如同它們是堅硬地表一樣。你也可以理解並說水族語。
若你在同調於這枚戒指時協助殺死了一個{@creature 水元素}，則你將獲得下列額外的性質：

items: 你可以在水下呼吸，且具有等同於你步行速度的游泳速度。
你可以從這枚戒指施放下列法術，消耗必要數量的充能：{@spell 造水/枯水術}(1發充能)、{@spell 操控水體}(3發充能)、{@spell 冰風暴}(2發充能)、或{@spell 冰牆術}(3發充能)。

item.name: 水行戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以在任何液體表面上站立或行走，就如同它們是固體表面一樣。

item.name: Ring of Winter
entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA} has kept this item in his possession for over a century. The Ring of Winter is a golden band that resizes to fit snugly on the finger of its wearer. A thin layer of frost coats the outside of the ring, which normal heat can't melt. The ring feels ice cold to the touch and initially numbs the hand that wears it, but this cold ceases to be felt by one who is attuned to this ring.

The Ring of Winter is sentient and tries to take control of any creature that wears it (see "Sentient Magic Items" chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). If it succeeds, the ring compels its wearer to cause undue harm to everyone and everything around it, in a cold-hearted attempt to incur the wrath of enemies and bring the wearer's doom.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Ring of Winter is a sentient chaotic evil item with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 17. The ring communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it, and it has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The ring craves destruction, and it likes inflicting indiscriminate harm on others.

entries.name: Nondetection
entries: The Ring of Winter defies attempts to magically locate it. Neither the ring nor its wearer can be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

entries.name: Frozen Time
entries: As long as you wear the ring, you don't age naturally. This effect is similar to suspended animation, in that your age doesn't catch up to you once the ring is removed. The ring doesn't protect its wearer from magical or supernatural aging effects, such as the Horrifying Visage of a {@creature ghost}.

entries.name: Cold Immunity
entries: While attuned to and wearing the ring, you have immunity to cold damage and don't suffer any ill effects from extreme cold (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon's Master Guide).

entries.name: Magic
entries: The Ring of Winter has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

items: You can expend 1 charge as an action and use the ring to lower the temperature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you can see within 300 feet of you. The temperature in that area drops 20 degrees per minute, to a minimum of -30 degrees Fahrenheit. Frost and ice begin to form on surfaces once the temperature drops below 32 degrees. This effect is permanent unless you use the ring to end it as an action, at which point the temperature in the area returns to normal at a rate of 10 degrees per minute.

You can cast one of the following spells from the ring (spell save DC 17) by expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell 畢格比之掌} (2 charges; the hand is made of ice, is immune to cold damage, and deals bludgeoning damage instead of force damage as a clenched fist), {@spell 寒冰錐} (2 charges), flesh to ice (3 charges; as {@spell 石化術} except that the target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone), {@spell 冰風暴} (2 charges), {@spell 歐提路克冰凍法球} (3 charges), {@spell 雪雨暴} (1 charge), {@spell 荊棘叢生} (1 charge; the spikes are made of ice), or {@spell 冰牆術} (2 charges).

You can expend the necessary number of charges as an action and use the ring to create either an inanimate ice object (2 charges) or an animated ice creature (4 charges). The ice object can't have any moving parts, must be able to fit inside a 10-foot cube, and has the density and durability of metal or stone (your choice). The ice creature must be modeled after a beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: {@condition charmed}, {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition poisoned}. The ice creature obeys only its creator's commands. The ice object or creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of you. It melts into a pool of normal water after 24 hours or when it drops to 0 hit points. In extreme heat, it loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points per minute as it melts. Use the guidelines in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide to determine the hit points of an inanimate object if they become necessary.

entries.name: Other Properties
entries: The Ring of Winter is rumored to possess other properties that can be activated only by an evil being whose will the ring can't break. Frost giants have long believed that the ring can be used to freeze entire worlds, while a {@creature djinni} in the service of a Calishite pasha once claimed that the ring could be used to summon and control white dragons, as well as the mighty ice primordial named Cryonax.

entries.name: Destroying the Ring
entries: The ring is nigh indestructible, resisting even the most intense magical heat. If it is placed on the finger of the powerful archfey known as the Summer Queen, the ring melts away and is destroyed forever.

item.name: X光視覺戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以使用一個動作以說出它的命令語。當你這麼做時，你在1分鐘內將可以看穿並看透固體物質。這個視覺具有30呎半徑。對你而言，在這個半徑範圍內的固態物體將呈現透明，且不會阻礙光線的通過。這個視覺可以穿透1呎厚的石頭、1吋厚的尋常金屬、或最多3呎厚的木頭或泥土給阻擋。更厚的物質以及一層薄薄的鉛都將阻礙這個視覺。
每當你在完成一次長休之前再次使用這枚戒指，你將必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則獲得一級{@condition 力竭}。

item.name: Rings of Shared Suffering
entries: These rings come in linked pairs. If you possess the Mark of Sentinel, you can use a bonus action to form a link to the creature attuned to the other ring; from then on, whenever that creature suffers damage, they only suffer half of that damage and you take the rest. This effect continues until you end it as a bonus action or until you or the other creature removes their ring. This effect isn't limited by range. A creature cannot be attuned to more than one ring of shared suffering.

item.name: 百眼法袍
entries: 這件長袍被飾以許多眼睛一般的圖紋。當你穿著這件長袍時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 這件長袍讓你得以看見所有方向，且你在依賴於視覺的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中具有優勢。
你具有120呎範圍的黑暗視覺。
你可以看見120呎範圍內，{@condition 隱形}的生物和物體，你也可以看見該範圍內位於乙太位面的事物。

entries: 這件長袍上的眼睛無法被閉上或轉移視線。儘管你可以閉上或移開你自己的雙眼，但當你穿著這件長袍時，你永遠不會被視作閉上或移開了眼睛。
施放於該長袍的{@spell 光亮術}法術、或施放於距離該長袍5呎內的{@spell 晝明術}法術，都會使你陷入{@condition 目盲}狀態長達1分鐘。在你的每個回合結束時，你可以進行一次體質豁免（{@spell 光亮術}的話DC 11，{@spell 晝明術}的話則DC 15），豁免成功則解除{@condition 目盲}狀態。

item.name: 虹光法袍
entries: 這件法袍含有3發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。當你穿著它時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能以使這件衣物散發出奪目鮮豔的變幻圖紋，持續直到你的下個回合結束。在這段期間，這件長袍將散發出30呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30呎的微光光照。可以看見你的生物將在對你進行的攻擊檢定中具有劣勢。此外，在這件長袍的能力被啟動期間，任何處於其明亮光照中且可以看見你的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的睿知豁免，否則將被{@condition 震懾}直到該效果結束。

item.name: Robe of Serpents
entries: A robe of serpents is a stylish silk garment that is popular among wealthy nobles and retired assassins. The robe is emblazoned with {@dice 1d4 + 3} stylized serpents, all brightly colored.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can transform one of the robe's serpents into a {@creature giant poisonous snake}. The snake instantly falls from the robe, slithers into an unoccupied space next to you, and acts on your initiative count. The snake can tell friendly creatures from hostile ones and attacks the latter. The snake disappears in a harmless puff of smoke after 1 hour, when it drops to 0 hit points, or when you dismiss it (no action required). Once detached, a snake can't return to the robe. When all of the robe's snakes have detached, the robe becomes a nonmagical garment.

item.name: 星辰法袍
entries: 這件黑色或暗藍色的長袍上繡著許多白色或銀色的星星。當你穿著它時，你在豁免檢定中獲得+1加值。
在這件長袍的前襟附近，有著六顆特別大的星星。當穿著這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作將其中一個這些星星摘下，並使用它以一個5環法術施放{@spell 魔法飛彈}。在每天日落時，{@dice 1d6}顆被摘逐的星星將會重新出現在這件長袍上。
當你穿戴這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作以和任何你所穿戴和攜帶的事物一起進入星界位面。你將持續待在該處，直到你使用一個動作返回你原本所在的位面。你將重新出現在你之前佔據的空間，或若該空間已經被佔據，則出現在最近的一處未被佔據空間。

item.name: Robe of Summer
entries: This elegant garment is made from fine cloth in hues of red, orange, and gold. While you wear the robe, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you are comfortable as if the temperature were that of a balmy day, so you suffer no ill effects from the weather's temperature extremes.

item.name: 大法師法袍
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 這件優雅的衣物是由白色、灰色、或黑色的精緻布料製成，並飾以銀色的符文。這件長袍的顏色反映著這個物品被創造時所對應的陣營。白色長袍代表善良，灰色代表中立，而黑色代表邪惡。你無法與不符合你陣營的大法師長袍同調。
你在穿著這件長袍時獲得下列好處：

items: 若你未穿戴護甲，則你的基本護甲等級為15+你的敏捷調整值。
你在對抗法術或其他魔法效果所進行的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
你的法術豁免DC和法術攻擊加值各自增加2點。

item.name: 雜貨法袍
entries: 這件長袍上打有各種顏色和形狀的補丁。當穿著這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作撕下其中一塊補丁，使它變成它所呈現的物體或生物。一旦最後一塊補丁被撕下，這件長袍將變為一件普通的衣物。
這件長袍有著以下每種補丁各兩個：

items: {@item 匕首|phb}
{@item 牛眼提燈|phb}（裝滿燈油且被點燃）
{@item 鋼面小鏡|phb}
{@item 長桿(10呎)|phb|10呎長桿}
{@item 麻繩(50呎)|phb|麻繩}(50呎, 盤繞狀態)
{@item 麻袋|phb}

entries: 此外，這件長袍有著{@dice 4d4}塊其它補丁，由DM選擇隨機決定這些補丁的種類。

rows: 裝有100金幣的錢袋
價值500金幣的銀製箱櫃（1呎長，6吋寬度和深度）
一扇鐵門（最多10呎寬，10呎高，其中一側有著門閂），你可以將其放置在一處你所能觸及的通路開口；它將改變形狀以適應於該通道，貼合，並將自己拴起
10顆價值各100金幣的寶石
木製長梯(24呎長)
一個附有{@item 鞍囊|phb}的{@creature 騎用馬}
陷坑(一個10呎邊長立方體)。你可以將其放置在距離你10呎內的地面上
4瓶{@item 治療藥水|dmg}
一艘{@item 划艇}(12呎長)
寫有一個1到3環法術的{@item 法術卷軸}
2隻{@creature 獒犬|mm}
一扇窗戶(2呎x4呎，最多2呎深)，你可以將其放置在所能觸及的垂直表面上
一個{@item 便攜型攻城鎚|phb}

item.name: 吸收權杖
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用你的反應以吸收一個只以你為目標，且不具備範圍效果的法術時。被吸收的法術效果將被取消，且該法術的能量（而非法術本身）將被儲存進這把權杖之中。這股能量有著等同該法術被施放時所用的環階。這把權杖從它製成到毀滅總共只能吸收最多50環階的能量。一旦這把權杖吸收了50環階的能量，它將無法再吸收任何能量。若你被一個這把權杖無法儲存的法術做為目標，則這把權杖將不會對該法術產生任何效果。
當你與這把權杖同調時，你將知曉這把權杖已經吸收了總共多少環階的能量，以及它現在正儲存著多少環階的法術能量。
若你是一個正持握這把權杖的施法者，你可以將這把權杖內儲存的能量轉變成法術位，以用來施放你已準備或已知的法術。你創造出法術位的環階只能等於或低於你所擁有法術位環階，且最高為5環。你仍如原本一樣施法，只是改為消耗這把權杖儲存的能量代替你的法術位。舉例來說，你可以用這把權杖儲存的3環能量以作為一個3環的法術位。
這種權杖在被發現時已經存有總共{@dice 1d10}環階的法術能量。當一把權杖無法再吸收法術能量，且沒有任何剩餘能量時，它將變為非魔法物品。

item.name: 警示權杖
entries: 這把權杖有著附有凸緣的端頂，且具有下列特性。

entries.name: 警示
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你在睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定和先攻檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 法術
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放下列其中一個法術：{@spell 偵測善惡}、{@spell 偵測魔法}、{@spell 偵測毒素或疾病}、或{@spell 識破隱形}。

entries.name: 防護靈光
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將這把權杖的手柄末端插在地上，這把權杖的端頂將散發出60呎半徑的明亮光照和再延伸60呎的微光光照。當處於其明亮光照範圍時，你和任何對你友善的生物將在AC和豁免檢定上獲得+1加值，且可以察覺到任何同樣處於該明亮光照內，{@condition 隱形}的敵意生物所在的位置。
這把權杖的端頂將在10分鐘之後、或當一個生物使用一個動作將權杖從地面拔起時停止發光，並結束這個效果。這個特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 王者力量權杖
entries: 這把權杖有著一個附有凸緣的端頂，且它具有如同一把{@item 硬頭錘+3|phb|魔法硬頭錘}的功能，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。這把權杖具有一系列關聯於沿著其杖柄設置的六個按鈕的特性。它也具備其他三個特性，細節如下。

entries.name: 六個按鈕
entries: 你能夠以一個附贈動作按下這把權杖六個按鈕中的其中一個。一個按鈕的效果將持續直到你按下另一個不同的按鈕，或直到你再次按下同個按鈕，並讓這把權杖恢復其原本的型態。
若你按下按鈕1：這把權杖將隨著烈焰刀刃迸發自權杖凸緣端頂的另一端，而變為一把{@item 焰舌}（由你選擇這把劍的類型）。
若你按下按鈕2：這把權杖的凸緣端頂將摺疊收起並長出兩片新月形的斧刃，將這把權杖轉變成一把{@item 戰斧+3|dmg|魔法戰斧}，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。
若你按下按鈕3：這把權杖的凸緣端頂將摺疊收起，從權杖尖端伸出矛尖，並讓權杖的手柄伸長成6呎長的杖柄，將這把權杖轉變成一把{@item 矛+3|dmg|魔法矛}，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。
若你按下按鈕4：這把權杖將變形成一根長度由你指定，但最多50呎長的爬桿。在它如花崗岩般堅硬的表面上，其底端的岩釘和頂端的三個爪鉤可以把爬桿牢牢固定住。爬桿上每隔1呎的距離都會伸出一根3吋長的水平橫槓，構成了一個梯子。這個爬桿可以承受最多4,000磅的重量。超重或是失去固定點將會使這把權杖變回其原本的型態。
若你按下按鈕5：這把權杖將變形成一把手持式戰鬥攻城鎚，並附與其使用者在用以破壞門、路障、或其他障礙物時所進行的力量檢定中獲得+10加值。
若你按下按鈕6：這把權杖將變回或維持其原本的型態，並指出地磁北極的方向（若權杖在使用這個功能時所在的位置並沒有地磁北極，則什麼事都不會發生。）。這把權杖同時會使你知曉你自己在地下或地上的大致深度或高度。

entries.name: 汲取生命
entries: 當你使用這把權杖以一次近戰攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以強迫該目標進行一次DC 17的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將受到額外的{@dice 4d6}死靈傷害，且你回復等同於該死靈傷害一半的生命值。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

entries.name: 麻痺
entries: 當你使用這把權杖以一次近戰攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以強迫該目標進行一次DC 17的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將陷入{@condition 麻痺}狀態長達1分鐘。目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

entries.name: 驚駭
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作以強迫每個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物進行一次DC 17的睿知豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將因你而陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。陷入{@condition 恐懼}的目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 復活權杖
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: 這把權杖含有5發充能。當你持握它時，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放下列其中一個法術：{@spell 治癒術}(消耗1發充能)或{@spell 復活術}(消耗5發充能)。
這把權杖會在每天日出時恢復1發已消耗的充能。若這把權杖內的充能被減少到0發，骰一顆{@dice d20}。若結果為1，則這把權杖將在一陣強光中消失無蹤。

item.name: Rod of Retribution
entries: This adamantine rod is tipped with a glowing crystalline eye. The rod has 3 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn.

When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you damages you while you are holding this rod, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of the rod's charges to force the creature to make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: 統治權杖
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以展示這把權杖，並命令每個距離你120呎內，你所選擇且你能看見的生物服從於你。每個目標都必須成功通過一次DC 15的睿知豁免，否則被你{@condition 魅惑}長達8小時。當被這個方式{@condition 魅惑}時，該生物將把你視為它所信賴的領導者。若目標被你或你的同伴傷害、或被命令去執行某項違反它天性的行為、則這個{@condition 魅惑}結束。這把權杖直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 庇護權杖
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作去啟動它。這把權杖接著將立刻把你和其他最多199個你所能看見的自願生物傳送到一個位於異位面空間的樂園福地。由你決定這個樂園呈現的樣貌，它可以是寧靜的花園、迷人的林間空地、熱鬧的酒館、無垠的宮殿、熱帶海島、幻想嘉年華會、或任何你所能想像到的美景。無論其環境性質如何，這座樂園都含有足夠其訪問者維生所需的水和食物。除此之外，所有樂園內可互動的事物都只能在這個異位面空間中存在。舉例來說，在樂園的花園中摘下的花朵將在被帶出異位面空間時消失。
訪問者在樂園中每度過一小時，就會如同它消耗了1顆生命骰一樣回復生命值。同時，儘管樂園中的時間會如常流動，但在樂園中的生物並不會因此老化。訪問者們可以待在樂園中的時間等同於200天除以在場生物的數量（向下取整）。
當停留時間用盡，或你使用一個動作結束它時，所有訪問者將重新出現它們在你啟動這把權杖時所佔據的位置，或另一處距離該位置最近的未被佔據空間。這把權杖直到經過10天之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Rod of the Vonindod
entries: The {@creature fire giant} Duke Zalto hired a wizard to craft several of these adamantine rods. Each measures 4 feet long, weighs 100 pounds, and is sized to fit comfortably in a {@creature fire giant||fire giant's} hand. The rod has two prongs at one end and a molded handle grip on the opposite end.

The rod has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dawn. As an action, you can grasp it by the handle and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell 物品定位術} spell from it. When the rod is used to detect objects made of adamantine, such as fragments of the Vonindod construct, its range increases to 10 miles.

item.name: 攀爬繩
entries: 這條60呎長的絲質繩索重3磅，且可以承受最多3,000磅的重量。若你持握繩索的其中一端並使用一個動作說出其命令語，繩索將會活化。以一個附贈動作，你可以命令繩索的另一端向著你所選擇的目的地移動。繩索的另一端將在你第一次命令它的回合移動10呎距離，並在你接下來的每個回合時移動10呎，直到它抵達目的地、伸展至它的最大長度、或直到你命令它停止。你也可以命令這個繩索牢牢綁住一個物體或是將自己鬆綁、自己打結或解結、或將自己盤起以方便你攜帶。
若你命令這個繩索打結，它將以1呎的間距沿著自己打好幾個大結。打完結後，這個繩索的長度將會縮短至50呎，且讓用於攀爬它的檢定獲得優勢。
這個繩索具有AC 20和20點生命值。只要它還具有最少1點生命值，繩索每過5分鐘就可以回復1點生命值。若繩索的生命值歸零，則它將被摧毀。

item.name: 糾纏繩
entries: 這條繩索長30呎且重3磅。若你持握繩索的其中一端並使用一個動作說出其命令語，則它的另一端將射向並纏繞住一個距離你20呎內且你所能看見的生物。該目標必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則將被{@condition 束縛}。
你可以藉由使用一個附贈動作並說出另一個命令語以釋放該生物。被這條繩索{@condition 束縛}的目標也可以使用一個動作以進行一次DC 15的力量或敏捷檢定（由目標決定）。若檢定成功，則該生物將掙脫這條繩索的{@condition 束縛}。
這個繩索具有AC 20和20點生命值。只要它還具有最少1點生命值，繩索每過5分鐘就可以回復1點生命值。若繩索的生命值歸零，則它將被摧毀。

item.name: 縫接繩
entries: 你可以將這條50呎長的麻繩切成任意數量個較小的繩段，並接著使用一個動作說出一個命令語，並使這些繩段縫接為一體。這些繩段必須彼此連接，否則將無法使用。若其中一個繩段被遺失或摧毀，則這條縫接繩將因此永遠比原本短一截。

item.name: Rotor of Return
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws. You periodically receive flashbacks of old memories, and you can unerringly recall any event that took place within the previous 30 days.

entries.name: Borrow Object
entries: You name a mundane item with a value of 50 gp or less and it appears in your hand or at your feet. This can be any item that appears in chapter 5, "{@book Equipment|PHB|5}," of the Player's Handbook, or any similar item selected with the DM's permission. The summoned item is transported to you from somewhere else in the world, but it is generic in nature, so that you might call for a longsword but you cannot borrow a specific creature's longsword. The item vanishes 10 minutes after it appears. Once you use this feature of the rotor of return, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Recall Code
entries: As an action, you can set your current location as a point of return locked to the rotor. Anytime thereafter, you can use a bonus action to teleport to the rotor's point of return as long as you are within 500 feet of that point. Once you use the rotor of return to teleport, this feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 划艇
entries: 龍骨船和划艇主要被用於湖泊和河川。若順流而行，將水流的速度（通常為每小時3哩）加到這個載具的速度中。這些載具無法溯著任何顯著的逆流而行，但可以藉由岸邊的動物被拖到上游。假如冒險者打算將划艇攜帶上陸，則一艘划艇的重量為100磅。

item.name: 紅寶石
entries: 透紅色到深緋色的透光寶石。

item.name: 戰法師紅石
entries: 蝕刻著怪異符紋，這個1吋直徑的紅寶石讓你得以使用一把簡易或軍用武器做為你法術的法器。要使這個特性發揮效果，你必須藉由將這顆紅寶石按壓在該武器上長達至少10分鐘，以使它附著於該武器上。在這之後，除非你以一個動作摘下它、或該武器被摧毀，否則這顆紅寶石將不會被從武器上被移除。即使是{@spell 反魔法結界}也無法使其掉落。若你終止與這顆紅寶石的同調，則這顆紅寶石將從該武器上掉落。

item.name: Ruin's Wake
entries: This spear is made from the ivory bone of an ancient gold dragon and carved with an Orc hymn to Gruumsh.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruin's Wake is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 22. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Orc.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A slaughter-loving {@creature balor} named Yarrowish lives within Ruin's Wake. The weapon desires only to draw blood and pushes its wielder to solve problems with violence.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The spear grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal and Orc.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to any target it hits. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it flies back to your hand.

As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can make a melee attack with Ruin's Wake with advantage against the attacker. You can't use this property again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the spear reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra piercing damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 2d8}.

When you hurl the spear and speak a command word, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to a creature you can see within 120 feet of you. Each creature in the line, excluding you, must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Ruin's Wake then returns to your hand. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the spear reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.

While holding the spear, you can let out a battle cry as a bonus action. Each creature you choose within 30 feet of you gains advantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with an attack from the spear, you can regain hit points equal to the damage you dealt with the attack. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Ruinblade
entries: Ruinblade is a unique weapon possessed by {@creature Moghadam|IMR}, the architect of the Tomb of Horrors. A symbol of his authority, Moghadam carries the weapon during the time frame of the adventure to intimidate the tomb's workers. (In later years, after {@creature Acererak|ToA} trapped Moghadam in the completed tomb as an undead archwraith, Moghadam was able to use the weapon as his own phylactery.)

A small jade version of the green devil face of the Tomb of Horrors is fashioned into the hilt of the weapon, with the blade extending from its open mouth. The blade always appears ruined and rusting, and causes its surroundings to appear reflected in the blade as if in a state of decay.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with it, the attack deals an extra {@dice 1d8} force damage.
In addition, the weapon has the following properties:

entries.name: Blighted Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell 枯萎術} spell from the weapon (DC 15). Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until the next dawn.

entries.name: Destructive Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell 解離術} spell from the weapon, but can target only a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force. Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until dawn seven days later.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a remove curse spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon.
The weapon must take direct part in the destruction of 1,000 gp worth of materials and objects every seven days, or a conflict arises between you and the weapon at the end of the seventh day.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruinblade is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 15, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is a rough, ruined echo. While you are attuned to it, Ruinblade also understands every language you know.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Ruinblade speaks either with a dolorous or frenetic tone, depending on its mood. That mood improves when the sword is actively engaged in acts of destruction, but worsens if the blade is left inactive too long.

The weapon's purpose is to ruin and unmake existing objects, so that its owner can rebuild the world from a blank slate. It thus encourages its wielder to engage in constant destruction, claiming that this will allow the creation of a more superior vision from the ruin of what came before.

item.name: Ruinstone
entries: A fiery red crystal the size of a human palm.

Once per day as a bonus action, a villain can activate the ruinstone to undo one deed they have performed. The possibilities here are broad, but in combat it's simplest to allow them the opportunity to "rewind" one action and take it again, or to reroll a failed saving throw (if it can still take actions).

Each use of the artifact has a terrible side effect: someone known to the wielder is also erased from reality. After the villain uses the ruinstone, roll a {@dice d20}: on a 5-20, one of their allies disintegrates, on an 1-4, one of the player characters disintegrates.

If a creature bound its soul to the ruinstone in the "Thalivar's Beacon" quest, the artifact explodes when used and the creature who is bound to it disintegrates, disappearing from reality and can only be brought back with a {@spell 祈願術} spell, or similar magic.

item.name: Ryath Root
entries: Any creature that ingests a ryath root gains {@dice 2d4} temporary hit points. A creature that consumes more than one ryath root in a 24-hour period must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer the {@condition poisoned} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: 麻袋
entries: 一個麻袋可以容納最多1立方呎或30磅重的裝備。

item.name: 騎兵鞍座
entries: 當騎乘於配有這副鞍座的坐騎時，只要你的意識清醒，你就不會在非自願的情況下落馬，且對該坐騎所進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。

item.name: Saint Markovia's Thighbone
entries: Saint Markovia's thighbone has the properties of a {@item mace of disruption}. If it scores one or more hits against a {@creature vampire} or a {@creature vampire spawn} in the course of a single battle, the thighbone crumbles into dust once the battle concludes.

As a youth, Markovia followed her heart and became a priest of the Morninglord soon after her eighteenth birthday. She proved to be a charismatic proselytizer and, before the age of thirty, had gained a reputation for allowing no evil to stand before her.

Markovia had long considered Strahd a mad tyrant, but only after his transformation into a {@creature vampire} did she dare to challenge him. As she rallied her followers and prepared to march on Castle Ravenloft, Strahd sent a group of {@creature vampire spawn} to her abbey. They confronted Markovia and were destroyed to a one.

Suffused with confidence born of a righteous victory, Markovia advanced on Castle Ravenloft. A great battle raged from the catacombs to the parapets. In the end, Markovia never returned to Barovia, and Strahd long afterward walked with a limp and a grimace of pain. It is said that he trapped Markovia in a crypt beneath his castle, and her remains linger there yet.
The essence of Markovia's saintliness passed partly into her bones as the rest of her body decomposed. Her remaining thighbone is imbued with power that inflicts grievous injury on the undead.

{@item Mace of Disruption}. When you hit a fiend or an undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra {@dice 2d6} radiant damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.
While you hold this weapon, it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

item.name: 紅縞瑪瑙
entries: 紅白帶狀紋路的不透光寶石。

item.name: 防護聖甲蟲
entries: 若你將這個甲蟲外型的徽章持握在手中長達1輪，它的表面將會浮現出銘文，並揭示出它的魔法性質。當你擁有它時，它將提供二個好處：

items: 你在對抗法術的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
這個聖甲蟲含有12發充能。若你在一次對抗死靈法術或源自於不死生物的傷害性效果的豁免檢定中失敗，你可以使用你的反應以消耗1發充能，並使該失敗的豁免變為豁免成功。這個聖甲蟲會在它的最後一發充能被消耗時被摧毀並粉碎成塵。

item.name: 學者套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 背包|phb}
一本{@item 書|phb|學科書}
一瓶{@item 墨水(1盎司小瓶裝)|phb|墨水}
一支{@item 墨水筆|phb}
10張{@item 羊皮紙(一張)|phb|羊皮紙}
一小袋沙
一把小刀

item.name: 急速彎刀
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+2加值。此外，你可以在你的每個回合以一個附贈動作使用它進行一次攻擊。

item.name: Scorpion Armor
entries: This suit of plate armor is fashioned from {@creature giant scorpion} chitin. While wearing this armor, you gain the following benefits:

items: The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff it, you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 100 ({@dice 10d10 + 45}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Only a {@spell 祈願術} spell can remove the armor's curse.

item.name: Scribe's Pen
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Scribing
entries: You can use this pen to write on any surface. You decide whether the writing is visible or {@condition invisible}, but the writing is always visible to a person with the Mark of Scribing.
Any creature with the Mark of Scribing can use an action to touch the {@condition invisible} writing, making it visible to all.
If you use the pen to write on a creature that isn't a construct, the writing fades after 7 days.

item.name: 防護異怪卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞著你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5呎半徑、10呎高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止異怪類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你為中心隨著你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個異怪將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。
